engChrName: Temporary placement to check event progression. Once night activities and quests have been officially added, please delete.
engSearchText:
Temporary placement to check event progression.
Once night activities and quests have been officially
added, please delete.
jpnChrName: イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。 ※夜行動やクエスト・マップ移動等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
イベント進行確認用に仮配置しています。
※夜行動やクエスト・マップ移動等が正式入力しましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: For general mob character checks. There is a possibility that events will not function correctly if used, so please be careful. *Please delete if not needed.
engSearchText:
For general mob character checks. There is a
possibility that events will not function correctly if
used, so please be careful. *Please delete if
not needed.
jpnChrName: 一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが 正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
一般・モブ確認用です。こちらを使用した場合、イベントが
正常に進行しなくなる場合がありますのでご注意ください。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
engSearchText: ★DEBUG: Select one additional member to accompany Agnès.
jpnChrName: ★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に 一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。
jpnSearchText:
★DEBUG：アニエスと一緒に
一時離脱するメンバーを選んでください。

engChrName: I'm afraid I can't share anything regarding the uproar at the Quincy Company.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid I can't share anything regarding the uproar
at the Quincy Company.
jpnChrName: ……クインシー社の方の騒動に関しては 自分から言える事は何も無い。
jpnSearchText:
……クインシー社の方の騒動に関しては
自分から言える事は何も無い。

engChrName: All you need to know is that the police and the CID have the situation under control.
engSearchText:
All you need to know is that the police and the CID
have the situation under control.
jpnChrName: 既に事態の鎮静化のために警察もＣＩＤも 然るべき対応を始めている、それだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
既に事態の鎮静化のために警察もＣＩＤも
然るべき対応を始めている、それだけだ。

engChrName: For the last three days, we've been ordered to ignore all the jaegers that are strolling about town.
engSearchText:
For the last three days, we've been ordered to ignore
all the jaegers that are strolling about town.
jpnChrName: それにしても、非常事態宣言とは別口の この警戒態勢……不安になる警官も多いようでな。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、非常事態宣言とは別口の
この警戒態勢……不安になる警官も多いようでな。

engChrName: A lot of my fellow officers are a little on edge, and I don't blame them one bit.
engSearchText:
A lot of my fellow officers are a little on edge, and I
don't blame them one bit.
jpnChrName: 猟兵などを見かけても干渉するな……こんな指令が 三日も続けば無理もないとは思うが……
jpnSearchText:
猟兵などを見かけても干渉するな……こんな指令が
三日も続けば無理もないとは思うが……

engChrName: But orders are orders—and I hear they come from the CID. Best to just do as we're told.
engSearchText:
But orders are orders—and I hear they come from
the CID. Best to just do as we're told.
jpnChrName: まあ、ＣＩＤの意向とも聞くしな…… 下手に関わるべきではないのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ＣＩＤの意向とも聞くしな……
下手に関わるべきではないのだろう。

engChrName: Some people from one of the anti-immigrant factions have been stirring up trouble again. When will they ever learn their lesson?
engSearchText:
Some people from one of the anti-immigrant factions
have been stirring up trouble again. When will they
ever learn their lesson?
jpnChrName: また反移民団体の者が騒ぎを起こしたと聞く…… 連中も相変わらず懲りないものだな。
jpnSearchText:
また反移民団体の者が騒ぎを起こしたと聞く……
連中も相変わらず懲りないものだな。

engChrName: Why must they do a demonstration now of all times...?
engSearchText:
Why must they do a demonstration now of all
times...?
jpnChrName: だが……この状況でデモでも起こされたら、 我々警察としても面倒な事になる……
jpnSearchText:
だが……この状況でデモでも起こされたら、
我々警察としても面倒な事になる……

engChrName: If I could get a warrant, I'd happily put those bastards in cuffs, but unfortunately, they're being protected by some friends in high places...
engSearchText:
If I could get a warrant, I'd happily put those bastards
in cuffs, but unfortunately, they're being protected by
some friends in high places...
jpnChrName: 令状が出れば動きたいものだが…… 連中の背後には……もどかしい。
jpnSearchText:
令状が出れば動きたいものだが……
連中の背後には……もどかしい。

engChrName: One of our very own bracers died fighting that mafia group...
engSearchText:
One of our very own bracers died fighting that
mafia group...
jpnChrName: 村一つの消滅に遊撃士の犠牲……かのマフィアは、 聞いていた以上に怖ろしい相手のようだ。
jpnSearchText:
村一つの消滅に遊撃士の犠牲……かのマフィアは、
聞いていた以上に怖ろしい相手のようだ。

engChrName: Actually, I don't think the term 'mafia group' fits them anymore. They're terrorists, plain and simple.
engSearchText:
Actually, I don't think the term 'mafia group' fits
them anymore. They're terrorists, plain and simple.
jpnChrName: いや、最早マフィアなどという言葉で 片付けて良いのかもわからん……
jpnSearchText:
いや、最早マフィアなどという言葉で
片付けて良いのかもわからん……

engChrName: They must be stopped at all costs...
engSearchText: They must be stopped at all costs...
jpnChrName: だが……いざとなれば、ＣＩＤの 特務部隊も動いてくれるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
だが……いざとなれば、ＣＩＤの
特務部隊も動いてくれるだろう。

engChrName: ...and I believe the CID's Special Ops division can take them out once and for all!
engSearchText:
...and I believe the CID's Special Ops division can
take them out once and for all!
jpnChrName: 彼らの練度ならば、もしもの事があっても きっと解決してくれるはずだ……！
jpnSearchText:
彼らの練度ならば、もしもの事があっても
きっと解決してくれるはずだ……！

engChrName: Those terrorists are still at large, so we have to do our utmost to protect the citizenry.
engSearchText:
Those terrorists are still at large, so we have to do our
utmost to protect the citizenry.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、そのような犯罪組織が野放しになって いる以上、引き締めが肝要なのも事実だろう。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、そのような犯罪組織が野放しになって
いる以上、引き締めが肝要なのも事実だろう。

engChrName: We also have many tourists coming into our city every day.
engSearchText:
We also have many tourists coming into our city
every day.
jpnChrName: オラシオンは観光地でもあるし、 人の流入はそれなりに激しいからな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンは観光地でもあるし、
人の流入はそれなりに激しいからな。

engChrName: I promise that we won't let you people down.
engSearchText: I promise that we won't let you people down.
jpnChrName: 我々としても、出入りする訪問者への 注意は怠らないつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
我々としても、出入りする訪問者への
注意は怠らないつもりだ。

engChrName: Over the past few days, I've noticed a fair number of bracers and shady-looking individuals out and about.
engSearchText:
Over the past few days, I've noticed a fair number of
bracers and shady-looking individuals out and about.
jpnChrName: フン、それにしてもこの数日は妙に 遊撃士やら、妙に威圧的な連中も多いな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、それにしてもこの数日は妙に
遊撃士やら、妙に威圧的な連中も多いな。

engChrName: Also, the air feels a tad thicker with the police on high alert. They are harming the calming ambience of the city.
engSearchText:
Also, the air feels a tad thicker with the police on
high alert. They are harming the calming ambience of
the city.
jpnChrName: 警察も件の事件で厳戒態勢というが、 このままではオラシオンの風情も壊れる。
jpnSearchText:
警察も件の事件で厳戒態勢というが、
このままではオラシオンの風情も壊れる。

engChrName: Our not-so-competent 'boys in blue' are nothing like the royal guards of old.
engSearchText:
Our not-so-competent 'boys in blue' are nothing like
the royal guards of old.
jpnChrName: 警備をするにしても、王国時代の近衛を 参考にするくらいの事は出来んのかね？
jpnSearchText:
警備をするにしても、王国時代の近衛を
参考にするくらいの事は出来んのかね？

engChrName: I cannot say I am too pleased with our current state of affairs. People have grown too accustomed to a society where nobles are not in power.
engSearchText:
I cannot say I am too pleased with our current state
of affairs. People have grown too accustomed to a
society where nobles are not in power.
jpnChrName: フン、最近ではこの街も貴族制の無い 不自然さに慣れた者が多く嘆かわしい！
jpnSearchText:
フン、最近ではこの街も貴族制の無い
不自然さに慣れた者が多く嘆かわしい！

engChrName: Perhaps we really should consider allying with the more conservative nobles in the Empire...
engSearchText:
Perhaps we really should consider allying with the
more conservative nobles in the Empire...
jpnChrName: やはり帝国の保守派とも協力すべきか……貴族の 権益を護持したい者はかの国にもいると聞く。
jpnSearchText:
やはり帝国の保守派とも協力すべきか……貴族の
権益を護持したい者はかの国にもいると聞く。

engChrName: If noble power were to be restored internationally, then we may be able to bring Calvard back to its former glory.
engSearchText:
If noble power were to be restored internationally,
then we may be able to bring Calvard back to its
former glory.
jpnChrName: 国際的に貴族制の復古が流行すれば、カルバードでも 本来あるべき姿も受け入れられやすくなろう。
jpnSearchText:
国際的に貴族制の復古が流行すれば、カルバードでも
本来あるべき姿も受け入れられやすくなろう。

engChrName: But whether we can make that a reality largely falls to them...
engSearchText:
But whether we can make that a reality largely falls
to them...
jpnChrName: もっとも……そこまで大きく動くかは “あの方々”のご意向にもよるだろうがな……
jpnSearchText:
もっとも……そこまで大きく動くかは
“あの方々”のご意向にもよるだろうがな……

engChrName: Fortunately for us, Mayor Audran is sympathetic to our cause.
engSearchText:
Fortunately for us, Mayor Audran is sympathetic to
our cause.
jpnChrName: もっとも、今のフィルナン市長が高貴の 何たるかをわかっとるのは救いだな。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、今のフィルナン市長が高貴の
何たるかをわかっとるのは救いだな。

engChrName: I have met him at many social events and the like, and I can attest to his respect for the old ways of the nobility.
engSearchText:
I have met him at many social events and the like,
and I can attest to his respect for the old ways of
the nobility.
jpnChrName: 我輩も社交界でお会いした事があるが、 彼の見識と伝統への敬意は確かなものだ。
jpnSearchText:
我輩も社交界でお会いした事があるが、
彼の見識と伝統への敬意は確かなものだ。

engChrName: We have to ensure he stays in office.
engSearchText: We have to ensure he stays in office.
jpnChrName: 我輩たちも存分に後押ししていかねばな。
jpnSearchText: 我輩たちも存分に後押ししていかねばな。

engChrName: Jacobin's group always gets things done. We must get our message out to the ignorant masses.
engSearchText:
Jacobin's group always gets things done. We must get
our message out to the ignorant masses.
jpnChrName: フン、ジャコバンらの“団体”もやりおるわ。 庶民どもの意識は鼓舞していかねばな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ジャコバンらの“団体”もやりおるわ。
庶民どもの意識は鼓舞していかねばな。

engChrName: ...Hmm? Why are you giving me those looks? Do you perhaps think that I'm up to something suspicious?
engSearchText:
...Hmm? Why are you giving me those looks? Do you
perhaps think that I'm up to something suspicious?
jpnChrName: フン、何だその目は？　我輩が何か 後ろ暗い事をしてるとでも？
jpnSearchText:
フン、何だその目は？　我輩が何か
後ろ暗い事をしてるとでも？

engChrName: Then allow me to set the record straight: I'm just doing my duty as a descendant of the old Calvard nobility.
engSearchText:
Then allow me to set the record straight: I'm just
doing my duty as a descendant of the old
Calvard nobility.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが、我輩はカルバード貴族の 末裔として為すべき事をしておるだけなのだぞ？
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが、我輩はカルバード貴族の
末裔として為すべき事をしておるだけなのだぞ？

engChrName: And that duty is the eradication of the filth that seeks to destroy the customs of old.
engSearchText:
And that duty is the eradication of the filth that seeks
to destroy the customs of old.
jpnChrName: 古来の伝統や家系の尊厳が希薄になりつつある時代、 それを破壊する者は排除せねばならん。
jpnSearchText:
古来の伝統や家系の尊厳が希薄になりつつある時代、
それを破壊する者は排除せねばならん。

engChrName: Mark my words. We WILL cleanse our city of those vile immigrants. Equality of all races be damned!
engSearchText:
Mark my words. We WILL cleanse our city of those
vile immigrants. Equality of all races be damned!
jpnChrName: 異民族などはまさにその筆頭だ、平等だの博愛だの 綺麗事を言っとる場合ではない。
jpnSearchText:
異民族などはまさにその筆頭だ、平等だの博愛だの
綺麗事を言っとる場合ではない。

engChrName: (I...can't believe what I'm hearing. He's not even trying to hide his contempt.)
engSearchText:
(I...can't believe what I'm hearing. He's not even
trying to hide his contempt.)
jpnChrName: （なんというか……まったく悪びれない上に   隠そうともしていないというか……）
jpnSearchText:
（なんというか……まったく悪びれない上に
隠そうともしていないというか……）

engChrName: (You don't often see people be so outwardly racist these days. This guy legit doesn't think he's doin' anything wrong.)
engSearchText:
(You don't often see people be so outwardly racist
these days. This guy legit doesn't think he's doin'
anything wrong.)
jpnChrName: （ここまで露骨なのは流石に珍しいが……本気で、   恨まれる理由も理解しない手合いもいるもんだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（ここまで露骨なのは流石に珍しいが……本気で、
恨まれる理由も理解しない手合いもいるもんだ。）

engChrName: I will never understand why our noble ancestors were stripped of their power.
engSearchText:
I will never understand why our noble ancestors were
stripped of their power.
jpnChrName: そもそも、我輩は貴族制の廃止自体どうして 受け入れられたのかと思うがね。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、我輩は貴族制の廃止自体どうして
受け入れられたのかと思うがね。

engChrName: I know the royal family was overthrown in the revolution, but the classist system could have prevailed.
engSearchText:
I know the royal family was overthrown in the
revolution, but the classist system could
have prevailed.
jpnChrName: いくら王家が革命で倒されたと言えど、 格式に裏付けされた秩序も必要だろうに。
jpnSearchText:
いくら王家が革命で倒されたと言えど、
格式に裏付けされた秩序も必要だろうに。

engChrName: It didn't have to be upended to make way for these filthy immigrants.
engSearchText:
It didn't have to be upended to make way for these
filthy immigrants.
jpnChrName: それもこれも、流入し続ける異民族共に 合わせているためなのじゃあないかね？
jpnSearchText:
それもこれも、流入し続ける異民族共に
合わせているためなのじゃあないかね？

engChrName: Please just give me another chance! I want to attend this event with you!
engSearchText:
Please just give me another chance! I want to attend
this event with you!
jpnChrName: 何故だシャルレーヌ、もう一度チャンスを…… 一緒にこの素敵なイベントを……！
jpnSearchText:
何故だシャルレーヌ、もう一度チャンスを……
一緒にこの素敵なイベントを……！

engChrName: I won't act like I did yesterday! I swear!
engSearchText: I won't act like I did yesterday! I swear!
jpnChrName: 昨日みたいな事はもうしないから、 そこを何とか……！
jpnSearchText:
昨日みたいな事はもうしないから、
そこを何とか……！

engChrName: I cannot believe she's taking the side of some filthy dirt-poor brat!
engSearchText:
I cannot believe she's taking the side of some filthy
dirt-poor brat!
jpnChrName: シャルレーヌ……シャルレーヌがまさか 小汚い貧民の子に肩入れするなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
シャルレーヌ……シャルレーヌがまさか
小汚い貧民の子に肩入れするなんて……！

engChrName: I was planning to frame him for theft so I could impress Charlene with my sharp wit and intellect! Where did I go wrong?!
engSearchText:
I was planning to frame him for theft so I could
impress Charlene with my sharp wit and intellect!
Where did I go wrong?!
jpnChrName: くそ、あの浮浪児をスリか何かに仕立てて 男を見せようと思ったのに何故こんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
くそ、あの浮浪児をスリか何かに仕立てて
男を見せようと思ったのに何故こんな事に……

engChrName: Hmph. Who would have thought my fiancée would be so demanding? Father made an interesting choice, that's for sure...
engSearchText:
Hmph. Who would have thought my fiancée would
be so demanding? Father made an interesting choice,
that's for sure...
jpnChrName: フン、お父様もなかなか良いご令嬢を僕の 婚約者に用意してくれたというものだ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、お父様もなかなか良いご令嬢を僕の
婚約者に用意してくれたというものだ。

engChrName: But no matter. I will do whatever I must to make my future bride's dreams come true!
engSearchText:
But no matter. I will do whatever I must to make my
future bride's dreams come true!
jpnChrName: どうにもお姫様に憧れているようだが、 僕の家なら叶えてあげられるさ……
jpnSearchText:
どうにもお姫様に憧れているようだが、
僕の家なら叶えてあげられるさ……

engChrName: How'd you enjoy your meal? One of Father's regular clients invested in that restaurant, you know.
engSearchText:
How'd you enjoy your meal? One of Father's regular
clients invested in that restaurant, you know.
jpnChrName: 先のコースはどうだったかいシャルレーヌ。 あれはお父様のお得意様が出資元の店で……
jpnSearchText:
先のコースはどうだったかいシャルレーヌ。
あれはお父様のお得意様が出資元の店で……

engChrName: It was acceptable, I suppose, but I'd much rather receive a gift in the form of a princess' dress and tiara rather than cuisine.
engSearchText:
It was acceptable, I suppose, but I'd much rather
receive a gift in the form of a princess' dress and tiara
rather than cuisine.
jpnChrName: まあまあね、悪くはないと思うわ。 それより王制末期のお姫様のドレスは知っていて？
jpnSearchText:
まあまあね、悪くはないと思うわ。
それより王制末期のお姫様のドレスは知っていて？

engChrName: It's every girl's dream to travel the world while being dressed like the princesses of the old kingdom.
engSearchText:
It's every girl's dream to travel the world while being
dressed like the princesses of the old kingdom.
jpnChrName: わたくし、あのようなドレスとティアラを纏って 諸国を漫遊させてもらいたいですの！
jpnSearchText:
わたくし、あのようなドレスとティアラを纏って
諸国を漫遊させてもらいたいですの！

engChrName: O-Oh, well... I'm sure we can make that happen! I'll ask Father right away!
engSearchText:
O-Oh, well... I'm sure we can make that happen!
I'll ask Father right away!
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……僕の家なら多分その望みも 叶えられるさ、お父様に相談してみよう。
jpnSearchText:
あ、ああ……僕の家なら多分その望みも
叶えられるさ、お父様に相談してみよう。

engChrName: I'll make your dreams come true! Promise!
engSearchText: I'll make your dreams come true! Promise!
jpnChrName: はは、この僕に任せておくがいいさ！
jpnSearchText: はは、この僕に任せておくがいいさ！

engChrName: Don't make promises you don't know you can keep. I think I'll keep my expectations in check.
engSearchText:
Don't make promises you don't know you can keep.
I think I'll keep my expectations in check.
jpnChrName: ふーん、それなら別に良いけれど。 なーんだか頼りないですわねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、それなら別に良いけれど。
なーんだか頼りないですわねぇ……

engChrName: I am so disappointed in you, Manuel. So very disappointed.
engSearchText:
I am so disappointed in you, Manuel. So
very disappointed.
jpnChrName: いや……先ほどの所業……正直、 流石にどうかと思いますの……
jpnSearchText:
いや……先ほどの所業……正直、
流石にどうかと思いますの……

engChrName: You had no right to treat him like that. Your behavior was unbecoming of someone of your standing.
engSearchText:
You had no right to treat him like that. Your behavior
was unbecoming of someone of your standing.
jpnChrName: いくらあなたと言えど、相手が貧民の子といえ、 わたくしたちに相応しくない振る舞いですわ……
jpnSearchText:
いくらあなたと言えど、相手が貧民の子といえ、
わたくしたちに相応しくない振る舞いですわ……

engChrName: I shall have my father call off our marriage.
engSearchText: I shall have my father call off our marriage.
jpnChrName: マニュエルとの縁談のお話、 お父様にも考え直してもらいますわ。
jpnSearchText:
マニュエルとの縁談のお話、
お父様にも考え直してもらいますわ。

engChrName: Wh-What...? But why?! That disgusting little vermin got near you, so I had to—
engSearchText:
Wh-What...? But why?! That disgusting little vermin
got near you, so I had to—
jpnChrName: な、何故なんだシャルレーヌ！ あの臭い浮浪児が君に寄ってきたから……
jpnSearchText:
な、何故なんだシャルレーヌ！
あの臭い浮浪児が君に寄ってきたから……

engChrName: He only asked if you wanted your shoes shined. All you had to do was politely decline his offer.
engSearchText:
He only asked if you wanted your shoes shined.
All you had to do was politely decline his offer.
jpnChrName: 靴磨きに誘っただけでしょう、そういう時は エレガントに距離を取ってお断りするだけですわ。
jpnSearchText:
靴磨きに誘っただけでしょう、そういう時は
エレガントに距離を取ってお断りするだけですわ。

engChrName: But you bullied him instead. If you were trying to impress me by acting tough, you failed miserably.
engSearchText:
But you bullied him instead. If you were trying to
impress me by acting tough, you failed miserably.
jpnChrName: わたくしの目にはあなたが強がるために あの貧民をいじめていたようにしか見えませんわ。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの目にはあなたが強がるために
あの貧民をいじめていたようにしか見えませんわ。

engChrName: N-No, I... Th-This is all a misunderstanding!
engSearchText: N-No, I... Th-This is all a misunderstanding!
jpnChrName: そ、そんな……シャルレーヌ、 何故わかってくれないというんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんな……シャルレーヌ、
何故わかってくれないというんだ！？

engChrName: Well, well. This little event sounds most intriguing. And it's made possible by foreign royalty, no less.
engSearchText:
Well, well. This little event sounds most intriguing.
And it's made possible by foreign royalty, no less.
jpnChrName: ふふん、よもや異国の高貴な筋から こんなサプライズがあるとは面白いですわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふん、よもや異国の高貴な筋から
こんなサプライズがあるとは面白いですわね。

engChrName: Now I truly will feel like a traveling princess. How could I refuse?
engSearchText:
Now I truly will feel like a traveling princess.
How could I refuse?
jpnChrName: なかなかどうして、お姫様の漫遊気分の 一端を味わえそうなものですの。
jpnSearchText:
なかなかどうして、お姫様の漫遊気分の
一端を味わえそうなものですの。

engChrName: S-Surely you'll need someone to accompany you, yes? I'll be more than happy to—
engSearchText:
S-Surely you'll need someone to accompany you, yes?
I'll be more than happy to—
jpnChrName: そ、そうだね……それなら、何なら僕と一緒に…… 昨晩の件はほら、僕も反省しているし……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだね……それなら、何なら僕と一緒に……
昨晩の件はほら、僕も反省しているし……

engChrName: While it's true that I'll have to mingle with children of lower classes, I can also meet people from other distinguished families as well.
engSearchText:
While it's true that I'll have to mingle with children
of lower classes, I can also meet people from other
distinguished families as well.
jpnChrName: ふふ、庶民の子も一緒なのは少々面倒ですけど…… 他の名家の子との社交の場にもなりますわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、庶民の子も一緒なのは少々面倒ですけど……
他の名家の子との社交の場にもなりますわ。

engChrName: It'll be nice to go out and enjoy this. By myself.
engSearchText: It'll be nice to go out and enjoy this. By myself.
jpnChrName: たまには一人で行楽に耽るのも悪くないですわ、 そういう意味では。
jpnSearchText:
たまには一人で行楽に耽るのも悪くないですわ、
そういう意味では。

engChrName: Nooooooooo!
engSearchText: Nooooooooo!
jpnChrName: 何故だシャルレーヌ、何故だぁぁあああ！
jpnSearchText: 何故だシャルレーヌ、何故だぁぁあああ！

engChrName: Now that I think about it, Father did say he wanted to develop connections with the people of House Mourtier.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, Father did say he wanted
to develop connections with the people of
House Mourtier.
jpnChrName: そういえばお父様、モルティエ家の方々とも 関係を深めたいとおっしゃっておりましたわね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばお父様、モルティエ家の方々とも
関係を深めたいとおっしゃっておりましたわね。

engChrName: I wonder if their eldest son will be attending. I think I'll greet him if he's present.
engSearchText:
I wonder if their eldest son will be attending. I think
I'll greet him if he's present.
jpnChrName: モルティエ家の嫡男も参加されるのかしら、 それならご挨拶の機会にするのも良さそうですわ。
jpnSearchText:
モルティエ家の嫡男も参加されるのかしら、
それならご挨拶の機会にするのも良さそうですわ。

engChrName: Manuel showed his true colors. He's not a gentleman at all, much less the prince of my dreams.
engSearchText:
Manuel showed his true colors. He's not a gentleman
at all, much less the prince of my dreams.
jpnChrName: まあ、薄々予感はしていたけれど、 マニュエル……見苦しいですわね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、薄々予感はしていたけれど、
マニュエル……見苦しいですわね……

engChrName: I think it would be best if Father called off our marriage.
engSearchText:
I think it would be best if Father called off
our marriage.
jpnChrName: わたくしの求めるプリンスとは言えませんわね、 お父様にも考え直してもらいますわ。
jpnSearchText:
わたくしの求めるプリンスとは言えませんわね、
お父様にも考え直してもらいますわ。

engChrName: It's every girl's dream to be a princess. They're prim, proper, elegant, beautiful, and intelligent.
engSearchText:
It's every girl's dream to be a princess. They're prim,
proper, elegant, beautiful, and intelligent.
jpnChrName: やはり女の子として憧れるのはお姫様ですわよね、 高貴で綺麗で、それでいて賢くて……
jpnSearchText:
やはり女の子として憧れるのはお姫様ですわよね、
高貴で綺麗で、それでいて賢くて……

engChrName: But most importantly, they always have a dashing prince by their side. Can Manuel really be the prince of my dreams?
engSearchText:
But most importantly, they always have a dashing
prince by their side. Can Manuel really be the prince
of my dreams?
jpnChrName: 何より傍らには素敵なプリンスがいてこそですの。 マニュエルにその力はあるのかしらね？
jpnSearchText:
何より傍らには素敵なプリンスがいてこそですの。
マニュエルにその力はあるのかしらね？

engChrName: Yeah, there's no way they're only facing a 'little bit of trouble.' One look at Dupont can tell me that much.
engSearchText:
Yeah, there's no way they're only facing a 'little bit
of trouble.' One look at Dupont can tell me
that much.
jpnChrName: 補填……デュポン氏の様子を見るに、 普通に想定される支出ではなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
補填……デュポン氏の様子を見るに、
普通に想定される支出ではなさそうだが……

engChrName: I'm sure doing business in this city isn't easy, but I wonder if there's something deeper going on...
engSearchText:
I'm sure doing business in this city isn't easy, but I
wonder if there's something deeper going on...
jpnChrName: この街は同調圧力も強いしなぁ。 何かタブーでもあるのだろうか……
jpnSearchText:
この街は同調圧力も強いしなぁ。
何かタブーでもあるのだろうか……

engChrName: I can never quite level with the wealthy clientele here. Their priorities and sensibilities are just so different from mine.
engSearchText:
I can never quite level with the wealthy clientele here.
Their priorities and sensibilities are just so different
from mine.
jpnChrName: ……相変わらず上流階級様の顧客に 合わせるのは胃に悪い……
jpnSearchText:
……相変わらず上流階級様の顧客に
合わせるのは胃に悪い……

engChrName: I'm worried their pride will eventually lead to a collapse not unlike the one the old kingdom saw.
engSearchText:
I'm worried their pride will eventually lead to a
collapse not unlike the one the old kingdom saw.
jpnChrName: あの人たち、あまりにも我々と 感覚が違い過ぎるからなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
あの人たち、あまりにも我々と
感覚が違い過ぎるからなぁ……

engChrName: You know the old saying, 'pride comes before a fall'? Well, I don't think the upper-class people here do.
engSearchText:
You know the old saying, 'pride comes before a fall'?
Well, I don't think the upper-class people here do.
jpnChrName: まあ、あの慢心の末にかつての王国のような 没落が待っていないか、心配するばかりだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あの慢心の末にかつての王国のような
没落が待っていないか、心配するばかりだ。

engChrName: *sigh* As always, Oración is at the mercy of the whims of the upper class.
engSearchText:
*sigh* As always, Oración is at the mercy of the
whims of the upper class.
jpnChrName: ふう……オラシオンは相変わらずの 貴族趣味というか何というか……
jpnSearchText:
ふう……オラシオンは相変わらずの
貴族趣味というか何というか……

engChrName: While the capital has adopted a number of technological advancements, this place is stuck in the past, and the people seem content with that.
engSearchText:
While the capital has adopted a number of
technological advancements, this place is stuck in the
past, and the people seem content with that.
jpnChrName: 首都に比べて経済成長率が鈍いとは言うが…… こうして見ていると危機感も無さそうだよな。
jpnSearchText:
首都に比べて経済成長率が鈍いとは言うが……
こうして見ていると危機感も無さそうだよな。

engChrName: And of course, the people at the bottom of the social ladder are the ones who suffer the most as a result...
engSearchText:
And of course, the people at the bottom of the social
ladder are the ones who suffer the most as a result...
jpnChrName: まあ、その分割を食っている人も どこか陰にいるのだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その分割を食っている人も
どこか陰にいるのだろうけど……

engChrName: I hate taking business trips to this place... I just want to be back home already.
engSearchText:
I hate taking business trips to this place... I just want
to be back home already.
jpnChrName: 何にせよこの地の出張は疲れる…… さっさと終わらせて帰るとしよう……
jpnSearchText:
何にせよこの地の出張は疲れる……
さっさと終わらせて帰るとしよう……

engChrName: Okay, so here's the list of investments for Oración businesses from people in the capital, and here's the brokerage firm analysis data.
engSearchText:
Okay, so here's the list of investments for Oración
businesses from people in the capital, and here's the
brokerage firm analysis data.
jpnChrName: それで、首都の投資家のオラシオン企業への 投資がこちら、証券会社の分析資料がこちらで……
jpnSearchText:
それで、首都の投資家のオラシオン企業への
投資がこちら、証券会社の分析資料がこちらで……

engChrName: Oh, dear. This is not good. I don't think those among the social elites are aware of how bad things are.
engSearchText:
Oh, dear. This is not good. I don't think those among
the social elites are aware of how bad things are.
jpnChrName: 困りましたね……少々困った。 危機感のない資産家もいるから本当に……
jpnSearchText:
困りましたね……少々困った。
危機感のない資産家もいるから本当に……

engChrName: If we can't make up for that deficit...
engSearchText: If we can't make up for that deficit...
jpnChrName: この分では……例年通りの“補填”が できないようならどうなる事か……
jpnSearchText:
この分では……例年通りの“補填”が
できないようならどうなる事か……

engChrName: Wait. What deficit?
engSearchText: Wait. What deficit?
jpnChrName: 補填、ですか……？
jpnSearchText: 補填、ですか……？

engChrName: I haven't heard anything about this.
engSearchText: I haven't heard anything about this.
jpnChrName: そのような問題については 聞いていなかったのですが。
jpnSearchText:
そのような問題については
聞いていなかったのですが。

engChrName: Ah, there's nothing to be worried about. The Oración Trust Bank is just facing a little bit of trouble.
engSearchText:
Ah, there's nothing to be worried about. The Oración
Trust Bank is just facing a little bit of trouble.
jpnChrName: ああ、いえ……こちらの話ですよ。 オラシオン信託銀行にも色々とありまして……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いえ……こちらの話ですよ。
オラシオン信託銀行にも色々とありまして……

engChrName: But we'll rebound in time, I'm sure.
engSearchText: But we'll rebound in time, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: まあ、お気になさらず……
jpnSearchText: まあ、お気になさらず……

engChrName: President Daltie is a very busy man, you see, so he doesn't have a complete grasp on what Lucio has been up to.
engSearchText:
President Daltie is a very busy man, you see, so he
doesn't have a complete grasp on what Lucio has
been up to.
jpnChrName: ダルティエ社長はご多忙な事もあり、 お坊ちゃまの事を把握しきれておりません。
jpnSearchText:
ダルティエ社長はご多忙な事もあり、
お坊ちゃまの事を把握しきれておりません。

engChrName: But perhaps it's time to let him know.
engSearchText: But perhaps it's time to let him know.
jpnChrName: とはいえ……そうした家族間の交流の 不足が此度の事件を引き起こしたのなら……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ……そうした家族間の交流の
不足が此度の事件を引き起こしたのなら……

engChrName: If a lack of familial communication is what resulted in this incident, then the only remedy is for them to talk things out.
engSearchText:
If a lack of familial communication is what resulted in
this incident, then the only remedy is for them to talk
things out.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃまのお気持ちや素行などをお伝えし、 少しばかり考えていただきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃまのお気持ちや素行などをお伝えし、
少しばかり考えていただきましょうか。

engChrName: I don't think I can entrust this task to the police or the guild.
engSearchText:
I don't think I can entrust this task to the police or
the guild.
jpnChrName: ……やはり、警察やギルドにも 相談する訳にはいきませんか……
jpnSearchText:
……やはり、警察やギルドにも
相談する訳にはいきませんか……

engChrName: I have no choice but to reach out to those fixers. I must ensure his safety at any cost.
engSearchText:
I have no choice but to reach out to those fixers.
I must ensure his safety at any cost.
jpnChrName: 噂の裏解決屋の力を借りて 安否の確認を急ぐほかなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
噂の裏解決屋の力を借りて
安否の確認を急ぐほかなさそうですね。

engChrName: (Huh? Did he say something about fixers?)
engSearchText: (Huh? Did he say something about fixers?)
jpnChrName: （……？   今、裏解決屋って聞こえたような？）
jpnSearchText:
（……？
今、裏解決屋って聞こえたような？）

engChrName: Even after everything that's happened, he's prioritizing his meeting with the president of the Quincy Company over checking up on me.
engSearchText:
Even after everything that's happened, he's
prioritizing his meeting with the president of the
Quincy Company over checking up on me.
jpnChrName: こんな事になってもクインシー社の社長との 会食の方が僕より大事なのか……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になってもクインシー社の社長との
会食の方が僕より大事なのか……

engChrName: Fine. I'd rather spend my time with the High Bloods over him anyway!
engSearchText:
Fine. I'd rather spend my time with the High Bloods
over him anyway!
jpnChrName: フン、なら僕だってそんなジジイより ハイブラッズの仲間達の方が大事だ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、なら僕だってそんなジジイより
ハイブラッズの仲間達の方が大事だ！

engChrName: Well, that was...distressing.
engSearchText: Well, that was...distressing.
jpnChrName: ……本当に酷い目に遭った、まったく 何なんだあの連中は……
jpnSearchText:
……本当に酷い目に遭った、まったく
何なんだあの連中は……

engChrName: Who in the hell were those people? And what are they plotting...?
engSearchText:
Who in the hell were those people? And what are
they plotting...?
jpnChrName: しかし、あんな奴らがこのオラシオンにいるとは もしかして陰でとんでもない事が──
jpnSearchText:
しかし、あんな奴らがこのオラシオンにいるとは
もしかして陰でとんでもない事が──

engChrName: No, I must purge this matter from my mind! I'm better off pretending this never happened!
engSearchText:
No, I must purge this matter from my mind!
I'm better off pretending this never happened!
jpnChrName: いや、これ以上考えるのはやめよう！ もう二度と関わりたくない……！
jpnSearchText:
いや、これ以上考えるのはやめよう！
もう二度と関わりたくない……！

engChrName: We won't let these fools run wild on our turf.
engSearchText: We won't let these fools run wild on our turf.
jpnChrName: まったく、僕らのホームで勝手な事をする 連中がいるとは不快極まりないね。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、僕らのホームで勝手な事をする
連中がいるとは不快極まりないね。

engChrName: It shouldn't be hard to crush them, should it come to that.
engSearchText:
It shouldn't be hard to crush them, should it come
to that.
jpnChrName: まあ、最悪多少の騒ぎになっても 揉み消すのは容易い事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、最悪多少の騒ぎになっても
揉み消すのは容易い事だしな。

engChrName: Perhaps this is a good opportunity to show people that we mean business—and that we're far superior to the old High Bloods gang.
engSearchText:
Perhaps this is a good opportunity to show people
that we mean business—and that we're far superior to
the old High Bloods gang.
jpnChrName: たまには僕らが動いてみても良いだろう、 “先代”との違いを示すためにもね。
jpnSearchText:
たまには僕らが動いてみても良いだろう、
“先代”との違いを示すためにもね。

engChrName: What? There are fools making a mess of the underground areas?
engSearchText:
What? There are fools making a mess of the
underground areas?
jpnChrName: なに？　僕らの麗しの故郷、オラシオンで 地下遺跡を荒らす輩がいるって？
jpnSearchText:
なに？　僕らの麗しの故郷、オラシオンで
地下遺跡を荒らす輩がいるって？

engChrName: Yeah, I saw them myself! We can't let them screw around on OUR home turf!
engSearchText:
Yeah, I saw them myself! We can't let them screw
around on OUR home turf!
jpnChrName: ああ、確かに見たぜ！　許せねぇよなァ？ 俺達の神聖な地でコソコソしやがって！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、確かに見たぜ！　許せねぇよなァ？
俺達の神聖な地でコソコソしやがって！

engChrName: Hmph. If it is as you say, then I'm in complete agreement.
engSearchText:
Hmph. If it is as you say, then I'm in
complete agreement.
jpnChrName: フン、どこのどいつか判らないが、僕らの ホームで勝手な事をされるのは不快だな。
jpnSearchText:
フン、どこのどいつか判らないが、僕らの
ホームで勝手な事をされるのは不快だな。

engChrName: I say we send them back to wherever they came from. We'll show them the might of the High Bloods!
engSearchText:
I say we send them back to wherever they came from.
We'll show them the might of the High Bloods!
jpnChrName: ここは僕ら《ハイブラッズ》が 身の程というものを教えてあげようか。
jpnSearchText:
ここは僕ら《ハイブラッズ》が
身の程というものを教えてあげようか。

engChrName: We'll do as the nobles of old did with intruders— subjugate and dispose.
engSearchText:
We'll do as the nobles of old did with intruders—
subjugate and dispose.
jpnChrName: フフ、領地に侵入した賊を追い払うなんて 旧貴族らしくてまた一興じゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、領地に侵入した賊を追い払うなんて
旧貴族らしくてまた一興じゃないか。

engChrName: (Ah, shit. Not these guys again.)
engSearchText: (Ah, shit. Not these guys again.)
jpnChrName: （おいおい、こいつらはあの時の迷惑な   ボンボンじゃねぇか……）
jpnSearchText:
（おいおい、こいつらはあの時の迷惑な
ボンボンじゃねぇか……）

engChrName: (Guess I should've realized we might run into them here. This is their home turf, after all.)
engSearchText:
(Guess I should've realized we might run into
them here. This is their home turf, after all.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、連中の地元だし出くわしても   不思議じゃねえが……）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、連中の地元だし出くわしても
不思議じゃねえが……）

engChrName: (Doesn't sound like they've learned their lesson. They're up to something for sure.)
engSearchText:
(Doesn't sound like they've learned their lesson.
They're up to something for sure.)
jpnChrName: （──懲りてない上にどうも危なっかしい事を   考えているみてぇだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（──懲りてない上にどうも危なっかしい事を
考えているみてぇだ。）

engChrName: (I guess I oughta keep an eye on them.)
engSearchText: (I guess I oughta keep an eye on them.)
jpnChrName: （関わりたくは無いが、一応注意して   おいた方が良いかもしれねぇな。）
jpnSearchText:
（関わりたくは無いが、一応注意して
おいた方が良いかもしれねぇな。）

engChrName: (I've heard of the High Bloods. They're a street racing gang composed of kids of ETWS execs.)
engSearchText:
(I've heard of the High Bloods. They're a street
racing gang composed of kids of ETWS execs.)
jpnChrName: （《ハイブラッズ》──たしかエトワス社幹部の   ボンボン共が作った走り屋チームだったか。）
jpnSearchText:
（《ハイブラッズ》──たしかエトワス社幹部の
ボンボン共が作った走り屋チームだったか。）

engChrName: (Supposedly they broke up after a trip to Crossbell, but I heard rumors about a new generation emerging. Guess they were true.)
engSearchText:
(Supposedly they broke up after a trip to Crossbell,
but I heard rumors about a new generation emerging.
Guess they were true.)
jpnChrName: （クロスベルへの遠征後に解散したはずだが、   二代目が出来たって噂は本当だった訳か。）
jpnSearchText:
（クロスベルへの遠征後に解散したはずだが、
二代目が出来たって噂は本当だった訳か。）

engChrName: Last night was awful... Just who the hell were those people, anyway?
engSearchText:
Last night was awful... Just who the hell were those
people, anyway?
jpnChrName: 昨晩は酷い目に遭ったな……一体 何だったんだ、あの連中は……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は酷い目に遭ったな……一体
何だったんだ、あの連中は……

engChrName: Well, whoever they were, we need to stay faaar away from them.
engSearchText:
Well, whoever they were, we need to stay faaar away
from them.
jpnChrName: 触れない方が良いぜ、アレは絶対。 多分二回目は無いだろうしな……
jpnSearchText:
触れない方が良いぜ、アレは絶対。
多分二回目は無いだろうしな……

engChrName: Yeah... I don't like being toyed with, but we're better off letting this one go...
engSearchText:
Yeah... I don't like being toyed with, but we're better
off letting this one go...
jpnChrName: ああ……遊ばれていた事は気に食わないが、 流石に危ない橋をこれ以上渡るのは……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……遊ばれていた事は気に食わないが、
流石に危ない橋をこれ以上渡るのは……

engChrName: (Sounds like something happened to them last night.)
engSearchText: (Sounds like something happened to them last night.)
jpnChrName: （昨晩、何か余程怖ろしい目に   遭ったみたいだな……）
jpnSearchText:
（昨晩、何か余程怖ろしい目に
遭ったみたいだな……）

engChrName: (Did they go into one of the underground entrances and run into someone? Scary. Thank the Goddess no rule violations happened.)
engSearchText:
(Did they go into one of the underground entrances
and run into someone? Scary. Thank the Goddess no
rule violations happened.)
jpnChrName: （もしや裏の連中と接触したのか？   今はルールに抵触していないようだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（もしや裏の連中と接触したのか？
今はルールに抵触していないようだが……）

engChrName: What you did was incredibly reckless.
engSearchText: What you did was incredibly reckless.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃま、どうしてこのような無茶を なさったのですか？
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃま、どうしてこのような無茶を
なさったのですか？

engChrName: Had the fixers not come to your rescue, who knows what would have happened to you.
engSearchText:
Had the fixers not come to your rescue, who knows
what would have happened to you.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋なる者が来ていなかったら、 今頃どうなっていた事か……！
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋なる者が来ていなかったら、
今頃どうなっていた事か……！

engChrName: Urgh... I'll admit that I went too far this time.
engSearchText: Urgh... I'll admit that I went too far this time.
jpnChrName: く、流石に今回は調子に乗り過ぎた、 その事は認めよう。
jpnSearchText:
く、流石に今回は調子に乗り過ぎた、
その事は認めよう。

engChrName: However, that doesn't change the fact that my grandfather doesn't give a damn about me!
engSearchText:
However, that doesn't change the fact that my
grandfather doesn't give a damn about me!
jpnChrName: だが……こんな事になっても祖父ちゃんが 心配してくれないのはどういう事だ……
jpnSearchText:
だが……こんな事になっても祖父ちゃんが
心配してくれないのはどういう事だ……

engChrName: Am I wrong? Hmm?!
engSearchText: Am I wrong? Hmm?!
jpnChrName: イノー、それについてはどう思うんだ！？
jpnSearchText: イノー、それについてはどう思うんだ！？

engChrName: I don't think his...inattention is due to lack of care. His work really does keep him busy.
engSearchText:
I don't think his...inattention is due to lack of care.
His work really does keep him busy.
jpnChrName: 社長はお忙しい故、仕方ない部分も ございますが……
jpnSearchText:
社長はお忙しい故、仕方ない部分も
ございますが……

engChrName: Though I do understand how you feel. I can let him know that your feelings were hurt.
engSearchText:
Though I do understand how you feel. I can let him
know that your feelings were hurt.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃまが傷ついている事は、 改めてお伝えしておきましょう……
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃまが傷ついている事は、
改めてお伝えしておきましょう……

engChrName: They've got a lot of guts messing around on our home turf!
engSearchText:
They've got a lot of guts messing around on our
home turf!
jpnChrName: 俺達のホームでコソコソ訳わかんねェ事を するとはいい度胸した連中だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
俺達のホームでコソコソ訳わかんねェ事を
するとはいい度胸した連中だぜ。

engChrName: Guess it's up to us to teach 'em a lesson!
engSearchText: Guess it's up to us to teach 'em a lesson!
jpnChrName: ククク、だがルシオの言う通りだ。 たまには騎士を気取るのも面白れぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ククク、だがルシオの言う通りだ。
たまには騎士を気取るのも面白れぇ。

engChrName: Is this our punishment for getting in over our heads...?
engSearchText:
Is this our punishment for getting in over our
heads...?
jpnChrName: 調子に乗り過ぎた罰なのか、これは……
jpnSearchText: 調子に乗り過ぎた罰なのか、これは……

engChrName: What's going on beneath our city...? Damn it! If this is a dream, someone wake me up already!
engSearchText:
What's going on beneath our city...? Damn it! If this
is a dream, someone wake me up already!
jpnChrName: それにしても、この街の地下で一体何が…… クソ、夢なら覚めてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、この街の地下で一体何が……
クソ、夢なら覚めてくれ！

engChrName: Many people seemed a bit flustered last night at the social club.
engSearchText:
Many people seemed a bit flustered last night at the
social club.
jpnChrName: 昨晩の社交界を見るに……どうにも 一部の方々が慌てている様子でしたわね。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の社交界を見るに……どうにも
一部の方々が慌てている様子でしたわね。

engChrName: They were speaking as though we should be fearful of these recent terrorist attacks.
engSearchText:
They were speaking as though we should be fearful of
these recent terrorist attacks.
jpnChrName: 件のテロ事件を受けて、何か他人事ではない かのような事をおっしゃっていましたわ。
jpnSearchText:
件のテロ事件を受けて、何か他人事ではない
かのような事をおっしゃっていましたわ。

engChrName: I can understand their concern to some extent, but I believe they are overreacting.
engSearchText:
I can understand their concern to some extent, but
I believe they are overreacting.
jpnChrName: 確かにテロの標的にされる不安は判るけれど…… そういう怖がり方でもなかったような……？
jpnSearchText:
確かにテロの標的にされる不安は判るけれど……
そういう怖がり方でもなかったような……？

engChrName: Now, then. It's about time I headed to tonight's social club. I cannot afford to be late.
engSearchText:
Now, then. It's about time I headed to tonight's
social club. I cannot afford to be late.
jpnChrName: さて、そろそろ社交クラブに向かう 時間ですし、遅刻してはいけませんわね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、そろそろ社交クラブに向かう
時間ですし、遅刻してはいけませんわね。

engChrName: We do not hold these events just to pass the time, but I'm sure that's a difficult concept to grasp for lower-class people such as yourselves.
engSearchText:
We do not hold these events just to pass the time, but
I'm sure that's a difficult concept to grasp for
lower-class people such as yourselves.
jpnChrName: 庶民には判らないでしょうけど 社交クラブは遊びなどではないのですわ。
jpnSearchText:
庶民には判らないでしょうけど
社交クラブは遊びなどではないのですわ。

engChrName: President Daltie of ETWS and President Auclair of the Quincy Company often go to them, but neither will be present tonight, I hear.
engSearchText:
President Daltie of ETWS and President Auclair of
the Quincy Company often go to them, but neither
will be present tonight, I hear.
jpnChrName: エトワスのダルティエ社長やオークレール家の エドモン氏……多くの名士が参加する会ですの。
jpnSearchText:
エトワスのダルティエ社長やオークレール家の
エドモン氏……多くの名士が参加する会ですの。

engChrName: Still, it's imperative for those in high society to attend so they can forge new relationships with other distinguished families.
engSearchText:
Still, it's imperative for those in high society to attend
so they can forge new relationships with other
distinguished families.
jpnChrName: 今夜はそのお二人は来られませんが……家の 付き合いを広げる重要な機会に変わりませんわ。
jpnSearchText:
今夜はそのお二人は来られませんが……家の
付き合いを広げる重要な機会に変わりませんわ。

engChrName: Both Mr. Auclair and Mr. Daltie were well known even before the end of the nobility, and they are still mainstays of high society.
engSearchText:
Both Mr. Auclair and Mr. Daltie were well known
even before the end of the nobility, and they are still
mainstays of high society.
jpnChrName: エドモン氏やダルティエ氏は貴族時代からの名士。 今でも社交界などの催しの大黒柱ですわ。
jpnSearchText:
エドモン氏やダルティエ氏は貴族時代からの名士。
今でも社交界などの催しの大黒柱ですわ。

engChrName: Oración prospered after the revolution in large part because prominent families banded together and were united as one.
engSearchText:
Oración prospered after the revolution in large part
because prominent families banded together and were
united as one.
jpnChrName: オラシオンは、そうした名家の方々を中心に結束し、 誇りを守る事で革命後も繁栄してきましたの。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンは、そうした名家の方々を中心に結束し、
誇りを守る事で革命後も繁栄してきましたの。

engChrName: That's why attending these social gatherings is imperative. If you think we are merely 'partying the night away,' then you are sorely mistaken.
engSearchText:
That's why attending these social gatherings
is imperative. If you think we are merely 'partying the
night away,' then you are sorely mistaken.
jpnChrName: ですから私達の社交は皆のために重要、 単なる娯楽の宴と思うのは理解が足りませんわ。
jpnSearchText:
ですから私達の社交は皆のために重要、
単なる娯楽の宴と思うのは理解が足りませんわ。

engChrName: I heard an entire village was annihilated. How is that even possible?
engSearchText:
I heard an entire village was annihilated. How is that
even possible?
jpnChrName: 村が丸ごと壊滅しただなんて、 一体何があったのかしら……
jpnSearchText:
村が丸ごと壊滅しただなんて、
一体何があったのかしら……

engChrName: Well, I believe this shall serve as a grim reminder that we must never let the lower class hold power.
engSearchText:
Well, I believe this shall serve as a grim reminder that
we must never let the lower class hold power.
jpnChrName: まあともかく、卑賎な連中に力を持たせては いけないという教訓ね……こういう事になる。
jpnSearchText:
まあともかく、卑賎な連中に力を持たせては
いけないという教訓ね……こういう事になる。

engChrName: After all, the mafia is made up of lowborn fools, no?
engSearchText: After all, the mafia is made up of lowborn fools, no?
jpnChrName: マフィアみたいな卑しい人たちは、力や財産の ロクな使い方もどうせ理解できていないのです。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアみたいな卑しい人たちは、力や財産の
ロクな使い方もどうせ理解できていないのです。

engChrName: This is undeniable proof that when those of lower standing achieve power and wealth, they will resort to barbaric behavior.
engSearchText:
This is undeniable proof that when those of lower
standing achieve power and wealth, they will resort to
barbaric behavior.
jpnChrName: だから抑えも効かず、こういう野蛮な事しか できなくなってしまうのですわ。
jpnSearchText:
だから抑えも効かず、こういう野蛮な事しか
できなくなってしまうのですわ。

engChrName: Perhaps it's because I've spent so much time in the capital, but I'm beginning to find people's attitudes here to be...off-putting.
engSearchText:
Perhaps it's because I've spent so much time in the
capital, but I'm beginning to find people's attitudes
here to be...off-putting.
jpnChrName: 首都に長らくいたからかしら……やっぱり、 この街の人って何かズレている気がしてきたの。
jpnSearchText:
首都に長らくいたからかしら……やっぱり、
この街の人って何かズレている気がしてきたの。

engChrName: I went to the high society gathering last night, and it felt like the people there had no sympathy for the victims of the attack.
engSearchText:
I went to the high society gathering last night, and it
felt like the people there had no sympathy for the
victims of the attack.
jpnChrName: 昨晩も社交界に行ったのだけど、例の事件への 見解がね、同情が薄いというか何というか……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩も社交界に行ったのだけど、例の事件への
見解がね、同情が薄いというか何というか……

engChrName: I may have been raised here, but I still feel like I can objectively take a step back and see things for what they are.
engSearchText:
I may have been raised here, but I still feel like I can
objectively take a step back and see things for what
they are.
jpnChrName: 私、こういう街で育ってきたのね…… 今なら、客観的に見えてきた気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
私、こういう街で育ってきたのね……
今なら、客観的に見えてきた気がするわ。

engChrName: There is no high or low standing when it comes to praying for those who have lost their lives. I want to pray with everyone for a while.
engSearchText:
There is no high or low standing when it comes to
praying for those who have lost their lives. I want to
pray with everyone for a while.
jpnChrName: 亡くなった人の安息を祈るのに貴賎の 差など無いわ、私も皆と一緒に祈るだけ。
jpnSearchText:
亡くなった人の安息を祈るのに貴賎の
差など無いわ、私も皆と一緒に祈るだけ。

engChrName: Then I'll have to get ready for that social club tonight. I still can't believe they're holding those events at a time like this.
engSearchText:
Then I'll have to get ready for that social club tonight.
I still can't believe they're holding those events at a
time like this.
jpnChrName: それにしても……こんな時にまで社交界の スケジュールがあるなんて呆れるものね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……こんな時にまで社交界の
スケジュールがあるなんて呆れるものね。

engChrName: I have to attend it in my husband's place even though it feels as if the world is on fire...
engSearchText:
I have to attend it in my husband's place even though
it feels as if the world is on fire...
jpnChrName: 今夜も旦那の代理で社交界よ、 世の中がこんな状況なのに……
jpnSearchText:
今夜も旦那の代理で社交界よ、
世の中がこんな状況なのに……

engChrName: I just can't believe it... Well, I suppose I'm not going to the capital now...
engSearchText:
I just can't believe it... Well, I suppose I'm not going
to the capital now...
jpnChrName: まさか……もう少しでお勤めも一段落して、 また首都に行けると思ったのに、こんな事に……！
jpnSearchText:
まさか……もう少しでお勤めも一段落して、
また首都に行けると思ったのに、こんな事に……！

engChrName: Yes. The state of emergency is still in effect in Edith, I'm afraid, so I don't think you'll be able to spend your vacation there.
engSearchText:
Yes. The state of emergency is still in effect in Edith,
I'm afraid, so I don't think you'll be able to spend
your vacation there.
jpnChrName: 首都は非常事態宣言が続き、出入りも 厳しく制限されていますからな。
jpnSearchText:
首都は非常事態宣言が続き、出入りも
厳しく制限されていますからな。

engChrName: Perhaps you can spend it here in Oración instead. I know it's not what you had planned, but there's plenty of things to do around the city.
engSearchText:
Perhaps you can spend it here in Oración instead.
I know it's not what you had planned, but there's
plenty of things to do around the city.
jpnChrName: 遊びに行けなくて残念でしょうが、これを機に 少しはオラシオンで大人しくされては？
jpnSearchText:
遊びに行けなくて残念でしょうが、これを機に
少しはオラシオンで大人しくされては？

engChrName: I'm sure your husband would feel better about that anyway, given the current state of affairs.
engSearchText:
I'm sure your husband would feel better about that
anyway, given the current state of affairs.
jpnChrName: その方が旦那様方も、この状況下に あってご安心されるかと……
jpnSearchText:
その方が旦那様方も、この状況下に
あってご安心されるかと……

engChrName: What on earth are you talking about?! Do you really think I'm feeling sad simply because I cannot go to the capital?
engSearchText:
What on earth are you talking about?! Do you really
think I'm feeling sad simply because I cannot go to
the capital?
jpnChrName: 何を言うのよマークリー！　私が単に首都に 行けなくなって落ち込んでいるとお思いで？
jpnSearchText:
何を言うのよマークリー！　私が単に首都に
行けなくなって落ち込んでいるとお思いで？

engChrName: How can I be worried about my vacation plans when so many people were just taken from us?!
engSearchText:
How can I be worried about my vacation plans when
so many people were just taken from us?!
jpnChrName: 大勢の人が亡くなったのよ……首都に 行けても愉快に楽しめる気分ではないわ！
jpnSearchText:
大勢の人が亡くなったのよ……首都に
行けても愉快に楽しめる気分ではないわ！

engChrName: M-My apologies... I should've realized you weren't concerned about that.
engSearchText:
M-My apologies... I should've realized you weren't
concerned about that.
jpnChrName: こ、これは失礼しました……そうですな。 奥様は奔放なだけの方ではありませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
こ、これは失礼しました……そうですな。
奥様は奔放なだけの方ではありませんでした。

engChrName: As long as you understand.
engSearchText: As long as you understand.
jpnChrName: わかればよろしいわ。
jpnSearchText: わかればよろしいわ。

engChrName: Now, then. Shall we go in and pray?
engSearchText: Now, then. Shall we go in and pray?
jpnChrName: それでは、私達も改めて鎮魂の一端に 加わらせていただくといたしましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、私達も改めて鎮魂の一端に
加わらせていただくといたしましょうか。

engChrName: I think I'll be able to return to my day-to-day life with peace of mind once I know the departed are resting by the Goddess' side.
engSearchText:
I think I'll be able to return to my day-to-day life with
peace of mind once I know the departed are resting
by the Goddess' side.
jpnChrName: 亡くなられた方々の安息が確信できれば、 私も心置きなく日常に戻れるというもの……
jpnSearchText:
亡くなられた方々の安息が確信できれば、
私も心置きなく日常に戻れるというもの……

engChrName: Please do not disparage your hometown so, Madam...
engSearchText: Please do not disparage your hometown so, Madam...
jpnChrName: 奥様……そう、ご自分の故郷を 悪く言いなさるな。
jpnSearchText:
奥様……そう、ご自分の故郷を
悪く言いなさるな。

engChrName: Your husband is still very proud of this city.
engSearchText: Your husband is still very proud of this city.
jpnChrName: 旦那様もこの故郷に誇りを 持っておられるのですぞ。
jpnSearchText:
旦那様もこの故郷に誇りを
持っておられるのですぞ。

engChrName: And he trusts you so much that he has you acting in his place.
engSearchText:
And he trusts you so much that he has you acting in
his place.
jpnChrName: 旦那様が奥様に代理を任せる、この地の婦人として 相応しいと奥様を信頼されている面も……
jpnSearchText:
旦那様が奥様に代理を任せる、この地の婦人として
相応しいと奥様を信頼されている面も……

engChrName: Her husband would not normally approve of her mingling with the lower class...
engSearchText:
Her husband would not normally approve of her
mingling with the lower class...
jpnChrName: 旦那様には奥様の行動を多少戒めるよう 言われてはおりますが……
jpnSearchText:
旦那様には奥様の行動を多少戒めるよう
言われてはおりますが……

engChrName: But I believe an exception can be made in this case. There's no harm in praying with everyone.
engSearchText:
But I believe an exception can be made in this case.
There's no harm in praying with everyone.
jpnChrName: こればかりは……同意せざるを得ませんな。 今はまず、祈るべき時……
jpnSearchText:
こればかりは……同意せざるを得ませんな。
今はまず、祈るべき時……

engChrName: However, she must attend the rest of the events as planned. She may not want to, but she has to.
engSearchText:
However, she must attend the rest of the events
as planned. She may not want to, but she has to.
jpnChrName: ……もっとも、残りの行事には予定通り ご出席いただく必要はありますが。
jpnSearchText:
……もっとも、残りの行事には予定通り
ご出席いただく必要はありますが。

engChrName: C-Can I really join? Jean did come and invite me, so I guess I can...
engSearchText:
C-Can I really join? Jean did come and invite me, so I
guess I can...
jpnChrName: ぼ、僕なんかが……参加して良いのかな……？ でも、ジャン君が誘いに来てくれたし……
jpnSearchText:
ぼ、僕なんかが……参加して良いのかな……？
でも、ジャン君が誘いに来てくれたし……

engChrName: Th-This is really happening, right? Pinch me. I must be dreaming.
engSearchText:
Th-This is really happening, right? Pinch me. I must
be dreaming.
jpnChrName: う、嘘じゃないよね…… 僕でも、あんなところに招待されるなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
う、嘘じゃないよね……
僕でも、あんなところに招待されるなんて……！

engChrName: I got bullied again just a second ago. I've gotten kinda used to it, though, so it doesn't bother me a ton.
engSearchText:
I got bullied again just a second ago. I've gotten kinda
used to it, though, so it doesn't bother me a ton.
jpnChrName: はは……さっき、またいじめられちゃったよ…… まあ、慣れてるし気にはしないけどさ……
jpnSearchText:
はは……さっき、またいじめられちゃったよ……
まあ、慣れてるし気にはしないけどさ……

engChrName: A lot of rich kids around here hate my guts, but I can get by since I've got one really good friend. And that's Jean over at the orphanage.
engSearchText:
A lot of rich kids around here hate my guts, but I can
get by since I've got one really good friend. And that's
Jean over at the orphanage.
jpnChrName: ……孤児院のジャン君とかは仲良くしてくれるし、 金持ちの子に嫌われても頑張っていけるさ……
jpnSearchText:
……孤児院のジャン君とかは仲良くしてくれるし、
金持ちの子に嫌われても頑張っていけるさ……

engChrName: Well, I guess I better pick myself back up and get back to work.
engSearchText:
Well, I guess I better pick myself back up and get
back to work.
jpnChrName: さて……気を取り直してもう一働きしないと……
jpnSearchText: さて……気を取り直してもう一働きしないと……

engChrName: A-Are you guys travelers? Do you want your shoes shined?
engSearchText:
A-Are you guys travelers? Do you want your
shoes shined?
jpnChrName: あ、お兄さん達……旅行の人かな。 靴磨きは必要無い……？
jpnSearchText:
あ、お兄さん達……旅行の人かな。
靴磨きは必要無い……？

engChrName: I'll do it for 50 mira each. How about it?
engSearchText: I'll do it for 50 mira each. How about it?
jpnChrName: ５０ミラで両足磨けるけどどうかな？
jpnSearchText: ５０ミラで両足磨けるけどどうかな？

engChrName: I'm trying to earn some money so I can help my mom. She's really sick...
engSearchText:
I'm trying to earn some money so I can help
my mom. She's really sick...
jpnChrName: 病気の母さんのためにも…… 僕なりに役に立てることがあれば……
jpnSearchText:
病気の母さんのためにも……
僕なりに役に立てることがあれば……

engChrName: (Poor kid...)
engSearchText: (Poor kid...)
jpnChrName: （この子は……）
jpnSearchText: （この子は……）

engChrName: (Yup. The wealth disparity in this city is pretty brutal.)
engSearchText:
(Yup. The wealth disparity in this city is
pretty brutal.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、セレブな古都といえど貧富の差が無い   訳じゃねぇからな……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、セレブな古都といえど貧富の差が無い
訳じゃねぇからな……）

engChrName: (This kinda thing ain't uncommon in Oración.)
engSearchText: (This kinda thing ain't uncommon in Oración.)
jpnChrName: （それこそ……孤児だって   普通にいるんだ、この街にもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（それこそ……孤児だって
普通にいるんだ、この街にもな。）

engChrName: How about I show you around the city?
engSearchText: How about I show you around the city?
jpnChrName: お兄さん達……旅行の人なら 街の案内とかでも力になったりできないかな？
jpnSearchText:
お兄さん達……旅行の人なら
街の案内とかでも力になったりできないかな？

engChrName: You don't even have to tip me if you don't want to. I'm just happy helping people.
engSearchText:
You don't even have to tip me if you don't want to.
I'm just happy helping people.
jpnChrName: まあ……チップを貰えるなら嬉しいけどさ、 そうでなくても人の役には立ちたいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……チップを貰えるなら嬉しいけどさ、
そうでなくても人の役には立ちたいんだ。

engChrName: Though I'd be grateful if you did. My sister's income isn't enough to cover Mom's medical expenses, so I'm trying to earn a little money myself.
engSearchText:
Though I'd be grateful if you did. My sister's income
isn't enough to cover Mom's medical expenses, so I'm
trying to earn a little money myself.
jpnChrName: 母さんが病気でね……姉さんの収入だけじゃ 足りないし、少しでも治療費の足しになればって。
jpnSearchText:
母さんが病気でね……姉さんの収入だけじゃ
足りないし、少しでも治療費の足しになればって。

engChrName: What are the people from Arteria doing here...? Something is off, but I can't quite place my finger on what...
engSearchText:
What are the people from Arteria doing here...?
Something is off, but I can't quite place my finger
on what...
jpnChrName: ふむ……法国から派遣された方々が何やら…… いえ、状況が状況ですし不自然ではないですか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……法国から派遣された方々が何やら……
いえ、状況が状況ですし不自然ではないですか……

engChrName: Oh, erm... Hello. We will be holding memorial mass again today. Let us all pray for those who have passed on.
engSearchText:
Oh, erm... Hello. We will be holding memorial mass
again today. Let us all pray for those who have
passed on.
jpnChrName: ──本日も追悼ミサは引き続き行っております。 改めて、共にクレイユの民の安息を祈りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
──本日も追悼ミサは引き続き行っております。
改めて、共にクレイユの民の安息を祈りましょう。

engChrName: The people who were dispatched from Arteria are doing an investigation here.
engSearchText:
The people who were dispatched from Arteria are
doing an investigation here.
jpnChrName: 共和国の情勢調査のため、法国の連絡員の方々が やや慌ただしくしているかもしれませんが──
jpnSearchText:
共和国の情勢調査のため、法国の連絡員の方々が
やや慌ただしくしているかもしれませんが──

engChrName: Oh, but don't be alarmed. I doubt anything serious is going on.
engSearchText:
Oh, but don't be alarmed. I doubt anything serious is
going on.
jpnChrName: そちらにつきましては、ご迷惑にならないよう 配慮しておりますので、どうかお気になさらず。
jpnSearchText:
そちらにつきましては、ご迷惑にならないよう
配慮しておりますので、どうかお気になさらず。

engChrName: Many people were in attendance for this afternoon's memorial mass. We all have a desire to mourn the lives that were lost.
engSearchText:
Many people were in attendance for this afternoon's
memorial mass. We all have a desire to mourn the
lives that were lost.
jpnChrName: 昼間の追悼ミサには多くの方が参列されました…… やはり、悲劇を悼む気持ちは皆同じものです。
jpnSearchText:
昼間の追悼ミサには多くの方が参列されました……
やはり、悲劇を悼む気持ちは皆同じものです。

engChrName: I know the people in the capital want to do the same, but their grand cathedral hasn't held their services yet. They're moving quite slowly.
engSearchText:
I know the people in the capital want to do the same,
but their grand cathedral hasn't held their services yet.
They're moving quite slowly.
jpnChrName: 時に、首都の大聖堂でも本格的な追悼式典を検討 されているそうですが……やや遅い気もします。
jpnSearchText:
時に、首都の大聖堂でも本格的な追悼式典を検討
されているそうですが……やや遅い気もします。

engChrName: As I understand it, the delay is being caused by political motives. It's not right.
engSearchText:
As I understand it, the delay is being caused by
political motives. It's not right.
jpnChrName: 政治的な兼ね合いもあるのでしょうが死者を悼む事に そのような影響があって良いものか……
jpnSearchText:
政治的な兼ね合いもあるのでしょうが死者を悼む事に
そのような影響があって良いものか……

engChrName: Churches should not be held back by needless red tape, especially in times like this—where people just want to mourn the dead.
engSearchText:
Churches should not be held back by needless red
tape, especially in times like this—where people just
want to mourn the dead.
jpnChrName: その意味でも此度は古くよりある総大聖堂が独自に 事件と向き合い、意義を示せたと言えます。
jpnSearchText:
その意味でも此度は古くよりある総大聖堂が独自に
事件と向き合い、意義を示せたと言えます。

engChrName: We're housing a few people that were dispatched from the Holy City of Arteria.
engSearchText:
We're housing a few people that were dispatched
from the Holy City of Arteria.
jpnChrName: 現在、法国より派遣されて来た方々も 総大聖堂に滞在されております。
jpnSearchText:
現在、法国より派遣されて来た方々も
総大聖堂に滞在されております。

engChrName: However, I haven't seen them much. They mainly converse with the bishop.
engSearchText:
However, I haven't seen them much. They mainly
converse with the bishop.
jpnChrName: もっとも、そちらは司教様が諸々の調整や連絡を 責任を持って果たしてくださっております。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、そちらは司教様が諸々の調整や連絡を
責任を持って果たしてくださっております。

engChrName: You don't have to worry about them. They certainly won't stop you from coming in and praying.
engSearchText:
You don't have to worry about them. They certainly
won't stop you from coming in and praying.
jpnChrName: ですので、礼拝者方は派遣員の方々の事は お気になさらず、お気軽に礼拝いただければと。
jpnSearchText:
ですので、礼拝者方は派遣員の方々の事は
お気になさらず、お気軽に礼拝いただければと。

engChrName: We're currently holding a memorial mass for all the lives that were lost in the attack on Creil Village.
engSearchText:
We're currently holding a memorial mass for all the
lives that were lost in the attack on Creil Village.
jpnChrName: ただいま、オラシオン総大聖堂ではクレイユ村の 悲劇に対し、臨時の追悼ミサを執り行っております。
jpnSearchText:
ただいま、オラシオン総大聖堂ではクレイユ村の
悲劇に対し、臨時の追悼ミサを執り行っております。

engChrName: Many are mourning for our fallen Calvardian brothers and sisters...
engSearchText:
Many are mourning for our fallen Calvardian brothers
and sisters...
jpnChrName: 同じ共和国の民が大勢命を奪われ、 心を痛めている方は多い事でしょう……
jpnSearchText:
同じ共和国の民が大勢命を奪われ、
心を痛めている方は多い事でしょう……

engChrName: The bishop is hosting the mass. He will offer a few words of prayer so that they may find peace.
engSearchText:
The bishop is hosting the mass. He will offer a
few words of prayer so that they may find peace.
jpnChrName: 中で司教様が責任を持って彼らの魂の安息を 祈ってくださっております……
jpnSearchText:
中で司教様が責任を持って彼らの魂の安息を
祈ってくださっております……

engChrName: Anyone who wants to pray alongside him is welcome.
engSearchText: Anyone who wants to pray alongside him is welcome.
jpnChrName: ともに祈りたい方は、私共に一声いただければ ご案内しますゆえ……
jpnSearchText:
ともに祈りたい方は、私共に一声いただければ
ご案内しますゆえ……

engChrName: We will be holding memorial mass today, but I don't expect to see many children there. It looks like they are being invited to some kind of event.
engSearchText:
We will be holding memorial mass today, but I don't
expect to see many children there. It looks like they
are being invited to some kind of event.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: 本日も追悼ミサは行われますが……何やら、 街の子供たちが催し事に招待されまして。
jpnSearchText:
本日も追悼ミサは行われますが……何やら、
街の子供たちが催し事に招待されまして。

engChrName: While it's important that we mourn for those who have passed on, I understand that we ourselves have to move on with our daily lives at some point.
engSearchText:
While it's important that we mourn for those who
have passed on, I understand that we ourselves have
to move on with our daily lives at some point.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: 犠牲者を悼むべき事に変わりはないとはいえ、 前に進まねばならないのも事実でしょう……
jpnSearchText:
犠牲者を悼むべき事に変わりはないとはいえ、
前に進まねばならないのも事実でしょう……

engChrName: That event may help brighten the hearts of the children. Perhaps this opportunity is a gift from the Goddess Herself.
engSearchText:
That event may help brighten the hearts of
the children. Perhaps this opportunity is a gift from
the Goddess Herself.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: その意味で、子供たちの心を明るくする機会が 舞い降りた事もまた女神の導きでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
その意味で、子供たちの心を明るくする機会が
舞い降りた事もまた女神の導きでしょうか……

engChrName: While Oración has a treasured history, it's true that there has been a lot of oppression towards minorities and the less fortunate over the years.
engSearchText:
While Oración has a treasured history, it's true that
there has been a lot of oppression towards minorities
and the less fortunate over the years.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: オラシオンの街は歴史が深く優美な反面…… 弱者や少数者への理解が進まない事実もあります。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンの街は歴史が深く優美な反面……
弱者や少数者への理解が進まない事実もあります。

engChrName: Since I started serving at the grand cathedral, I've seen many of those people's plights. It's...hard to witness.
engSearchText:
Since I started serving at the grand cathedral, I've
seen many of those people's plights. It's...hard
to witness.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: 私も総大聖堂に赴任して以来、心を痛めるような 事も多く目の当たりにして参りました……
jpnSearchText:
私も総大聖堂に赴任して以来、心を痛めるような
事も多く目の当たりにして参りました……

engChrName: That's why I would like to open up a facility where we can offer aid to those who are struggling.
engSearchText:
That's why I would like to open up a facility where
we can offer aid to those who are struggling.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: 少しでもそうした方々を助けるため、孤児院への 支援以外にも何か施設の立ち上げなど出来ないか。
jpnSearchText:
少しでもそうした方々を助けるため、孤児院への
支援以外にも何か施設の立ち上げなど出来ないか。

engChrName: I've been discussing the idea with the archbishop every day now. I have hopes it'll come to pass someday.
engSearchText:
I've been discussing the idea with the archbishop
every day now. I have hopes it'll come to
pass someday.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: そうした事も日々、総大聖堂内で相談させて いただいております。
jpnSearchText:
そうした事も日々、総大聖堂内で相談させて
いただいております。

engChrName: I can't believe Creil Village is...gone. Not even the children were spared...
engSearchText:
I can't believe Creil Village is...gone. Not even the
children were spared...
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: クレイユ村では……小さい子どもまでもが 犠牲になってしまいました。
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村では……小さい子どもまでもが
犠牲になってしまいました。

engChrName: I've looked after many kids in gospel facilities over the years, so this is heartbreaking for me...
engSearchText:
I've looked after many kids in gospel facilities over
the years, so this is heartbreaking for me...
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: 長年多くの福音施設に関わってきた身として とても他人事とは思えません……
jpnSearchText:
長年多くの福音施設に関わってきた身として
とても他人事とは思えません……

engChrName: We must protect the orphanage here at all costs. I've supported it for many years, and I won't let anything happen to it!
engSearchText:
We must protect the orphanage here at all costs.
I've supported it for many years, and I won't let
anything happen to it!
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: この街の孤児院も……支援してきた身として 守る責任があると言えるでしょう……！
jpnSearchText:
この街の孤児院も……支援してきた身として
守る責任があると言えるでしょう……！

engChrName: I'm sure there's a few people from Creil Village who have lost their families and homes...
engSearchText:
I'm sure there's a few people from Creil Village who
have lost their families and homes...
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: クレイユ村からも……家族を失い、 帰る場所を失った方もいらっしゃるでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
クレイユ村からも……家族を失い、
帰る場所を失った方もいらっしゃるでしょう……

engChrName: I'd like to reach out to those people and help them in some way.
engSearchText:
I'd like to reach out to those people and help them in
some way.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: そうした方々の事も……各々の意思を尊重しながら 何とかして支援して差し上げたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々の事も……各々の意思を尊重しながら
何とかして支援して差し上げたいものです。

engChrName: I'm already thinking about getting in touch with the church in the capital so we can figure out how we can support them.
engSearchText:
I'm already thinking about getting in touch with the
church in the capital so we can figure out how we can
support them.
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: 近いうちに、首都の教会などとも連絡し、 為すべき支援を決めていくつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
近いうちに、首都の教会などとも連絡し、
為すべき支援を決めていくつもりです。

engChrName: I'm here to pray again today. I was surprised to hear news of a fun event going on given all that's happened.
engSearchText:
I'm here to pray again today. I was surprised to hear
news of a fun event going on given all
that's happened.
jpnChrName: 今日もお祈りに行って来たけど……まさか、 この時世でイベントの話を聞けるとはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
今日もお祈りに行って来たけど……まさか、
この時世でイベントの話を聞けるとはねぇ。

engChrName: Perhaps the organizers are trying to cheer people up?
engSearchText: Perhaps the organizers are trying to cheer people up?
jpnChrName: いや、こういう時だからこそ元気づけようと してくれているのかしら……？
jpnSearchText:
いや、こういう時だからこそ元気づけようと
してくれているのかしら……？

engChrName: If that's the case, I can admire that. It's put a smile back on my son's beautiful face, and if he's happy, so am I.
engSearchText:
If that's the case, I can admire that. It's put a smile
back on my son's beautiful face, and if he's happy, so
am I.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、息子も明るい顔を見せてくれるなら その方が良いしね、行かせてあげるつもりよ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、息子も明るい顔を見せてくれるなら
その方が良いしね、行かせてあげるつもりよ。

engChrName: When I heard the news of the tragedy, it didn't feel real at first.
engSearchText:
When I heard the news of the tragedy, it didn't feel
real at first.
jpnChrName: ……正直、オラシオンはいつも通りだし 最初は大事件の実感も薄かったけど……
jpnSearchText:
……正直、オラシオンはいつも通りだし
最初は大事件の実感も薄かったけど……

engChrName: That's why I've come here. Both to pray and to face reality.
engSearchText:
That's why I've come here. Both to pray and to
face reality.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、現実と向き合うためにも追悼に行って 亡くなった大勢の人のために祈ろうと思ってね……
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、現実と向き合うためにも追悼に行って
亡くなった大勢の人のために祈ろうと思ってね……

engChrName: Just because Oración is safe doesn't mean we can turn a blind eye to what happened. Doing that would be wrong.
engSearchText:
Just because Oración is safe doesn't mean we can turn
a blind eye to what happened. Doing that would
be wrong.
jpnChrName: オラシオンが無事だからって他人事みたいに 思うのは……やっぱり間違いだわ。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンが無事だからって他人事みたいに
思うのは……やっぱり間違いだわ。

engChrName: But it's still so difficult. I'm trying to put on a brave face for my son, but I'm not sure if it's all that convincing.
engSearchText:
But it's still so difficult. I'm trying to put on a brave
face for my son, but I'm not sure if it's all
that convincing.
jpnChrName: ただ……息子のためにも、いつまでも暗い 雰囲気でいる訳にもいかないから難しいものよね。
jpnSearchText:
ただ……息子のためにも、いつまでも暗い
雰囲気でいる訳にもいかないから難しいものよね。

engChrName: Everything's been super depressing lately, but that event sounds really fun! I even got invited!
engSearchText:
Everything's been super depressing lately, but that
event sounds really fun! I even got invited!
jpnChrName: かなしいことばっかりなのかと おもってたけど、ボクもさそわれたよ！
jpnSearchText:
かなしいことばっかりなのかと
おもってたけど、ボクもさそわれたよ！

engChrName: And when Mommy told me to go have fun, she smiled! I haven't seen her do that in ages!
engSearchText:
And when Mommy told me to go have fun,
she smiled! I haven't seen her do that in ages!
jpnChrName: ママ、久しぶりにわらって、 いってらっしゃいっていってくれたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
ママ、久しぶりにわらって、
いってらっしゃいっていってくれたんだ！

engChrName: Apparently only kids get to go, so I've gotta have enough fun for Mommy, too! I want her to smile lots more!
engSearchText:
Apparently only kids get to go, so I've gotta have
enough fun for Mommy, too! I want her to smile
lots more!
jpnChrName: コドモだけっていうし、ママのブンもたのしんで ママがもっとわらえるようにおしえてあげないと！
jpnSearchText:
コドモだけっていうし、ママのブンもたのしんで
ママがもっとわらえるようにおしえてあげないと！

engChrName: I go to the grand cathedral every week, but this time, everyone looks sad...
engSearchText:
I go to the grand cathedral every week, but this time,
everyone looks sad...
jpnChrName: ダイセイドウにはまいしゅう行ってるけど、 きょうはみんななんだかかなしそう……
jpnSearchText:
ダイセイドウにはまいしゅう行ってるけど、
きょうはみんななんだかかなしそう……

engChrName: Even Mommy looks down in the dumps... What should I do?
engSearchText:
Even Mommy looks down in the dumps...
What should I do?
jpnChrName: ママもかなしそう……ボク、 どうしたらいいのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
ママもかなしそう……ボク、
どうしたらいいのかな……？

engChrName: Should I act sad, too? No, that'd just make Mommy even sadder...
engSearchText:
Should I act sad, too? No, that'd just make Mommy
even sadder...
jpnChrName: ボクがかなしいカオしたら…… ママ、きっともっとかなしいよね……
jpnSearchText:
ボクがかなしいカオしたら……
ママ、きっともっとかなしいよね……

engChrName: Apparently there was an incident upstairs. Did the president do something wrong?
engSearchText:
Apparently there was an incident upstairs. Did the
president do something wrong?
jpnChrName: 上階で事件があったようですが…… もしかして本当に社長が……？
jpnSearchText:
上階で事件があったようですが……
もしかして本当に社長が……？

engChrName: The floor manager told me not to worry, but this seems like a big deal to me.
engSearchText:
The floor manager told me not to worry, but this
seems like a big deal to me.
jpnChrName: 一応、他の取締役から営業は続けて良いと 言われたのですが……ただ事ではないようですね。
jpnSearchText:
一応、他の取締役から営業は続けて良いと
言われたのですが……ただ事ではないようですね。

engChrName: I had an inkling that something was happening behind closed doors in the Auclair family...
engSearchText:
I had an inkling that something was happening
behind closed doors in the Auclair family...
jpnChrName: まあ……オークレール家は確かに色々ありそうな 気はしておりましたが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……オークレール家は確かに色々ありそうな
気はしておりましたが……

engChrName: The senior employees seem a little perturbed. Apparently, there's something going on with the president's family.
engSearchText:
The senior employees seem a little perturbed.
Apparently, there's something going on with the
president's family.
jpnChrName: 何やら古参の従業員の方々が ざわついていらっしゃるような……
jpnSearchText:
何やら古参の従業員の方々が
ざわついていらっしゃるような……

engChrName: Well, it's none of my business. It's not like it impacts my work.
engSearchText:
Well, it's none of my business. It's not like it impacts
my work.
jpnChrName: 社長のご家族がどうとか……まあ、 私は仕事を続けるだけですけれど。
jpnSearchText:
社長のご家族がどうとか……まあ、
私は仕事を続けるだけですけれど。

engChrName: Many places in Oración offer dishes that are similar to what was once served to the old Oración royalty.
engSearchText:
Many places in Oración offer dishes that are similar
to what was once served to the old Oración royalty.
jpnChrName: オラシオンではやはり、宮廷料理の流れを 汲んだ料理が多くの場で供されていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンではやはり、宮廷料理の流れを
汲んだ料理が多くの場で供されていましてね。

engChrName: A chef's skills and the method of cooking are both important, but ingredients also have a tremendous effect on the quality of a dish.
engSearchText:
A chef's skills and the method of cooking are both
important, but ingredients also have a tremendous
effect on the quality of a dish.
jpnChrName: 様式やシェフの腕も重要ですが、素材もまた 料理のランクを左右し得る重要な要素なのです。
jpnSearchText:
様式やシェフの腕も重要ですが、素材もまた
料理のランクを左右し得る重要な要素なのです。

engChrName: First-class restaurants often order supplies from Belle-Forêt, and that should speak to the quality of our products.
engSearchText:
First-class restaurants often order supplies from
Belle-Forêt, and that should speak to the quality
of our products.
jpnChrName: クインシー百貨店には一流レストランの方も仕入れに いらっしゃいますし、品質も保証致しますよ。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー百貨店には一流レストランの方も仕入れに
いらっしゃいますし、品質も保証致しますよ。

engChrName: Welcome to Belle-Forêt Fine Goods. Please take a look at what we have to offer.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Belle-Forêt Fine Goods. Please take a
look at what we have to offer.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、クインシー百貨店の 食料品売り場をどうぞご覧ください。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、クインシー百貨店の
食料品売り場をどうぞご覧ください。

engChrName: The Quincy Company uses only the highest quality fruits and dairy products when making sweets.
engSearchText:
The Quincy Company uses only the highest quality
fruits and dairy products when making sweets.
jpnChrName: クインシー社では一流の菓子の素材として、 果物や乳製品も最上のものを仕入れていましてね。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー社では一流の菓子の素材として、
果物や乳製品も最上のものを仕入れていましてね。

engChrName: We have our own supply routes that let us procure the best ingredients on the market.
engSearchText:
We have our own supply routes that let us procure the
best ingredients on the market.
jpnChrName: その中で構築したルートを最大限に活用し、 伝統料理に合う最高品質の食材を揃えております。
jpnSearchText:
その中で構築したルートを最大限に活用し、
伝統料理に合う最高品質の食材を揃えております。

engChrName: And those routes aren't impacted by the state of emergency, so we won't have any trouble with keeping our shelves stocked.
engSearchText:
And those routes aren't impacted by the state of
emergency, so we won't have any trouble with
keeping our shelves stocked.
jpnChrName: 非常事態ではありますが、我が社の商品の調達に 影響は出ない見込みですのでご安心を。
jpnSearchText:
非常事態ではありますが、我が社の商品の調達に
影響は出ない見込みですのでご安心を。

engChrName: The bond between the president and his daughter has been severed... I didn't think it'd end like this.
engSearchText:
The bond between the president and his daughter has
been severed... I didn't think it'd end like this.
jpnChrName: まさか……こんな形で社長とお嬢様の 親子の縁が切れてしまうなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさか……こんな形で社長とお嬢様の
親子の縁が切れてしまうなんて……

engChrName: Oh, if only I had listened to Elaine... Maybe this all could've been prevented.
engSearchText:
Oh, if only I had listened to Elaine... Maybe this all
could've been prevented.
jpnChrName: こんな事になるなら……差し出がましい事を承知で、 もっとお嬢様の言葉に耳を傾けていれば……
jpnSearchText:
こんな事になるなら……差し出がましい事を承知で、
もっとお嬢様の言葉に耳を傾けていれば……

engChrName: I can't believe the president was affiliated with the mafia. Though I'm not surprised to hear he had ties to an anti-immigrant faction.
engSearchText:
I can't believe the president was affiliated with
the mafia. Though I'm not surprised to hear he had
ties to an anti-immigrant faction.
jpnChrName: 社長にしても、民族主義者はともかく…… そんなマフィアとも関係していたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
社長にしても、民族主義者はともかく……
そんなマフィアとも関係していたなんて……

engChrName: I served him for a quarter of a century, but I never noticed... I feel like I failed everyone.
engSearchText:
I served him for a quarter of a century, but I
never noticed... I feel like I failed everyone.
jpnChrName: 四半世紀も奉公して気づけなかった事が情けない というか、諫言もできず申し訳ないというか……
jpnSearchText:
四半世紀も奉公して気づけなかった事が情けない
というか、諫言もできず申し訳ないというか……

engChrName: Not too long ago, I spotted the president's daughter. She hadn't been home in some time.
engSearchText:
Not too long ago, I spotted the president's daughter.
She hadn't been home in some time.
jpnChrName: 先ほどお嬢様……いえ、長らく帰省していない 社長のご令嬢を見かけたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほどお嬢様……いえ、長らく帰省していない
社長のご令嬢を見かけたのですが……

engChrName: She nodded at me and then disappeared. I thought she looked a little...distressed.
engSearchText:
She nodded at me and then disappeared. I thought
she looked a little...distressed.
jpnChrName: 私に会釈だけしてどこかへ……久しぶりの 帰郷ですが、何やら思い詰めていたような……
jpnSearchText:
私に会釈だけしてどこかへ……久しぶりの
帰郷ですが、何やら思い詰めていたような……

engChrName: I wonder if it has something to do with her father...
engSearchText: I wonder if it has something to do with her father...
jpnChrName: やはり……御父上とのご関係…… なのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
やはり……御父上とのご関係……
なのでしょうか……？

engChrName: *sigh* I hope she's doing all right...
engSearchText: *sigh* I hope she's doing all right...
jpnChrName: ……ふむ、お嬢様の事は少々心配ですが…… ああいえ、お客様はお気になさらずに。
jpnSearchText:
……ふむ、お嬢様の事は少々心配ですが……
ああいえ、お客様はお気になさらずに。

engChrName: Oh, my apologies! I was a bit lost in thought.
engSearchText: Oh, my apologies! I was a bit lost in thought.
jpnChrName: しばらくオークレール家と疎遠になっていた ご令嬢が帰郷されたと噂に聞きましたので。
jpnSearchText:
しばらくオークレール家と疎遠になっていた
ご令嬢が帰郷されたと噂に聞きましたので。

engChrName: I heard rumors that House Auclair's estranged daughter had returned to Oración. I've known her since she was a little girl.
engSearchText:
I heard rumors that House Auclair's estranged
daughter had returned to Oración. I've known her
since she was a little girl.
jpnChrName: お嬢様とは小さい頃から見知っておりますし、 やや気がかりかなと思っただけです。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様とは小さい頃から見知っておりますし、
やや気がかりかなと思っただけです。

engChrName: Welcome! How may I help you today?
engSearchText: Welcome! How may I help you today?
jpnChrName: クインシー百貨店にお越しいただき ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー百貨店にお越しいただき
ありがとうございます。

engChrName: You can find all sorts of sweets here.
engSearchText: You can find all sorts of sweets here.
jpnChrName: こちらは我が社の目玉である お菓子のコーナーになります。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは我が社の目玉である
お菓子のコーナーになります。

engChrName: In fact, we've got all of our Quincy Bell sweets in stock right now.
engSearchText:
In fact, we've got all of our Quincy Bell sweets in
stock right now.
jpnChrName: クインシー・ベルをはじめ、我が社のブランドの お菓子であれば全て工場直送品を取り揃えており。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー・ベルをはじめ、我が社のブランドの
お菓子であれば全て工場直送品を取り揃えており。

engChrName: They make for wonderful gifts—especially for that special someone. Why not buy a few packs?
engSearchText:
They make for wonderful gifts—especially for that
special someone. Why not buy a few packs?
jpnChrName: 贈答品としても古くから人気ですので、お世話に なった方へのギフトなどにもいかがでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
贈答品としても古くから人気ですので、お世話に
なった方へのギフトなどにもいかがでしょうか。

engChrName: We have plenty of affordable offerings these days, but we also sell premium goods that the old Calvardian royal family used to love.
engSearchText:
We have plenty of affordable offerings these days, but
we also sell premium goods that the old Calvardian
royal family used to love.
jpnChrName: 今では比較的カジュアルな銘柄もございますが、 伝統的に王侯貴族に親しまれた銘柄も多いもので。
jpnSearchText:
今では比較的カジュアルな銘柄もございますが、
伝統的に王侯貴族に親しまれた銘柄も多いもので。

engChrName: In fact, we still receive orders from royalty abroad.
engSearchText: In fact, we still receive orders from royalty abroad.
jpnChrName: 特にクインシー・ベルは今でもなお、 他国の王族などからも注文を承っております。
jpnSearchText:
特にクインシー・ベルは今でもなお、
他国の王族などからも注文を承っております。

engChrName: These sweets have been well liked by Eastern royal families for generations. One might say our products transcend national borders and cultures.
engSearchText:
These sweets have been well liked by Eastern royal
families for generations. One might say our products
transcend national borders and cultures.
jpnChrName: 古くは黎明期に、東方の皇族にも好まれたとか…… 国境や文化を越えた至玉の一品と言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
古くは黎明期に、東方の皇族にも好まれたとか……
国境や文化を越えた至玉の一品と言えるでしょう。

engChrName: What's going to happen to the Quincy Company? Are we all going our separate ways?
engSearchText:
What's going to happen to the Quincy Company?
Are we all going our separate ways?
jpnChrName: これからクインシー社は……わたくし達は一体、 どうなってしまうのでしょう……
jpnSearchText:
これからクインシー社は……わたくし達は一体、
どうなってしまうのでしょう……

engChrName: Many of us worked here for so long...
engSearchText: Many of us worked here for so long...
jpnChrName: 皆一人一人が名門の名を誇りに 働き続けてきたというのに……
jpnSearchText:
皆一人一人が名門の名を誇りに
働き続けてきたというのに……

engChrName: Well, I don't suppose any of us will have trouble finding work elsewhere.
engSearchText:
Well, I don't suppose any of us will have trouble
finding work elsewhere.
jpnChrName: 皆、一流の腕前や知識をお持ちですし 再就職には困らないとはいえ……
jpnSearchText:
皆、一流の腕前や知識をお持ちですし
再就職には困らないとはいえ……

engChrName: But we gave our everything to this store. Walking away from all this won't be easy for any of us.
engSearchText:
But we gave our everything to this store.
Walking away from all this won't be easy for any
of us.
jpnChrName: この一流の百貨店で尽くしてきた誇りが 傷付いてしまうのではないかと……
jpnSearchText:
この一流の百貨店で尽くしてきた誇りが
傷付いてしまうのではないかと……

engChrName: Now that I think about it, this year's EGC should be starting up soon.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, this year's EGC should be
starting up soon.
jpnChrName: そういえば、例年通りであれば…… もうじきＥＧＣの開催される時期ですわね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、例年通りであれば……
もうじきＥＧＣの開催される時期ですわね。

engChrName: It's quite the show for fashionistas such as myself. I was enthralled by the event in my younger days.
engSearchText:
It's quite the show for fashionistas such as myself.
I was enthralled by the event in my younger days.
jpnChrName: ああした若い服飾文化も、結構見所はあるもので。 わたくしも下積み時代には何かと……
jpnSearchText:
ああした若い服飾文化も、結構見所はあるもので。
わたくしも下積み時代には何かと……

engChrName: It helps expose aspiring fashion designers to all sorts of different styles.
engSearchText:
It helps expose aspiring fashion designers to all sorts
of different styles.
jpnChrName: もっとも、服飾の道をこれから志す方には、どちらの 様式もバランス良く学んで欲しいものです。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、服飾の道をこれから志す方には、どちらの
様式もバランス良く学んで欲しいものです。

engChrName: If a designer is stuck in the past or too focused on trend chasing, they'll never be able to make clothes that bring out a person's beauty.
engSearchText:
If a designer is stuck in the past or too focused on
trend chasing, they'll never be able to make clothes
that bring out a person's beauty.
jpnChrName: 伝統と流行のどちらに縛られ過ぎても、人の魅力を 十分に引き出す服は作れないでしょうから。
jpnSearchText:
伝統と流行のどちらに縛られ過ぎても、人の魅力を
十分に引き出す服は作れないでしょうから。

engChrName: The materials that go into clothing designs are crucial to their appeal.
engSearchText:
The materials that go into clothing designs are crucial
to their appeal.
jpnChrName: 服はいわば自分の身体を預けるものですの。 外見や様式に関わらず、素材も重要なものですわ。
jpnSearchText:
服はいわば自分の身体を預けるものですの。
外見や様式に関わらず、素材も重要なものですわ。

engChrName: High-quality, lightweight fabrics are soft to the touch and sit comfortably on your skin.
engSearchText:
High-quality, lightweight fabrics are soft to the touch
and sit comfortably on your skin.
jpnChrName: 良質な生地は肌にも優しく、動く際の身体への 負担も軽減してくれますし、本当に重要ですの。
jpnSearchText:
良質な生地は肌にも優しく、動く際の身体への
負担も軽減してくれますし、本当に重要ですの。

engChrName: Eastern silk and Central Eastern goat wool may be rare, but they're worth seeking out.
engSearchText:
Eastern silk and Central Eastern goat wool may be
rare, but they're worth seeking out.
jpnChrName: 特に東方シルクや中東の特別な山羊の毛などは 希少な分、それに見合う質がありますの。
jpnSearchText:
特に東方シルクや中東の特別な山羊の毛などは
希少な分、それに見合う質がありますの。

engChrName: I hope more people will come to understand the importance of material quality in time.
engSearchText:
I hope more people will come to understand the
importance of material quality in time.
jpnChrName: 是非とも、そうした細やかな品質の重要さも 多くの方々に知っていただけたら嬉しいですわね。
jpnSearchText:
是非とも、そうした細やかな品質の重要さも
多くの方々に知っていただけたら嬉しいですわね。
