engChrName: If you're looking for high-quality clothing, then look no further.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for high-quality clothing, then look
no further.
jpnChrName: 上質なお召し物をご所望でしたら是非 当店でお買い上げになって。
jpnSearchText:
上質なお召し物をご所望でしたら是非
当店でお買い上げになって。

engChrName: Our ceremonial dresses are made with impeccable material quality. They're quite popular with the upper class.
engSearchText:
Our ceremonial dresses are made with impeccable
material quality. They're quite popular with the
upper class.
jpnChrName: 当店には上流階級の方向けの礼服などもございます。 品質・デザインともに申し分ないはずですわ。
jpnSearchText:
当店には上流階級の方向けの礼服などもございます。
品質・デザインともに申し分ないはずですわ。

engChrName: Even tourists like to splurge here, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText: Even tourists like to splurge here, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: 旅行の機会に、奮発して買って下さる旅行者の方も それなりにいらっしゃいますの、皆さまもいかが？
jpnSearchText:
旅行の機会に、奮発して買って下さる旅行者の方も
それなりにいらっしゃいますの、皆さまもいかが？

engChrName: Things have been rather bleak as of late, but even in times like these, you can't neglect your need for self-care—and clothing IS self-care!
engSearchText:
Things have been rather bleak as of late, but even in
times like these, you can't neglect your need for
self-care—and clothing IS self-care!
jpnChrName: 不幸な事件もあって暗い雰囲気ではありますが、 こういう時でも身だしなみは大切ですのよ。
jpnSearchText:
不幸な事件もあって暗い雰囲気ではありますが、
こういう時でも身だしなみは大切ですのよ。

engChrName: Buying a new pair of clothes brings peace to one's heart and mind.
engSearchText:
Buying a new pair of clothes brings peace to one's
heart and mind.
jpnChrName: しっかりした姿をする事で心も整えられる…… そういうものだと信じていますわ。
jpnSearchText:
しっかりした姿をする事で心も整えられる……
そういうものだと信じていますわ。

engChrName: It's also important to dress to impress—and there's nothing more impressive than our dresses.
engSearchText:
It's also important to dress to impress—and there's
nothing more impressive than our dresses.
jpnChrName: 常にどこにでも赴ける格好をして、 泰然と構える事もひとつですわ。
jpnSearchText:
常にどこにでも赴ける格好をして、
泰然と構える事もひとつですわ。

engChrName: Elaine finally returned home, and then this happened...
engSearchText:
Elaine finally returned home, and then
this happened...
jpnChrName: せっかくお嬢様が帰られたと思えば…… よもやこんな事になるとは……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくお嬢様が帰られたと思えば……
よもやこんな事になるとは……

engChrName: I don't know what will become of the Quincy Company, but its fate will have no impact on my work.
engSearchText:
I don't know what will become of the Quincy
Company, but its fate will have no impact on
my work.
jpnChrName: この先クインシー社はどうなるのか……もっとも、 私に関してはすべき事は変わりませんがね。
jpnSearchText:
この先クインシー社はどうなるのか……もっとも、
私に関してはすべき事は変わりませんがね。

engChrName: I'll just have to set up shop elsewhere and keep doing what I'm doing.
engSearchText:
I'll just have to set up shop elsewhere and keep doing
what I'm doing.
jpnChrName: 経営や思想についてとやかくは言いません、 職人としてできる事を続けるだけ……
jpnSearchText:
経営や思想についてとやかくは言いません、
職人としてできる事を続けるだけ……

engChrName: I heard from Chief Manager Parler that Elaine is here in Oración.
engSearchText:
I heard from Chief Manager Parler that Elaine is
here in Oración.
jpnChrName: そういえば先ほどパルレ主任から、 エレインお嬢様が帰省されたと聞きましてね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば先ほどパルレ主任から、
エレインお嬢様が帰省されたと聞きましてね。

engChrName: I used to do maintenance work on her favorite sword back in the day.
engSearchText:
I used to do maintenance work on her favorite sword
back in the day.
jpnChrName: お嬢様には昔、ご愛用されている剣の 手入れなどでお手伝いさせてもらったものです。
jpnSearchText:
お嬢様には昔、ご愛用されている剣の
手入れなどでお手伝いさせてもらったものです。

engChrName: I've heard about her many exploits as a bracer. It fills me with joy that her sword is being put to good use.
engSearchText:
I've heard about her many exploits as a bracer. It fills
me with joy that her sword is being put to good use.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士としてのご活躍も聞き及んでいますが、 お嬢様の剣が活きて喜ばしい限りです……
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士としてのご活躍も聞き及んでいますが、
お嬢様の剣が活きて喜ばしい限りです……

engChrName: However, I'm still sad to hear that she's estranged from President Auclair...
engSearchText:
However, I'm still sad to hear that she's estranged
from President Auclair...
jpnChrName: しかし……確かお嬢様はエドモン社長と疎遠に なっていたとも聞きますが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……確かお嬢様はエドモン社長と疎遠に
なっていたとも聞きますが……

engChrName: The man said he had business at Philibert Workshop.
engSearchText: The man said he had business at Philibert Workshop.
jpnChrName: お客様は、『次はフィルベール工房に 用事がある』と仰っていましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
お客様は、『次はフィルベール工房に
用事がある』と仰っていましたよ。

engChrName: After that, a policewoman came up to me and asked about him.
engSearchText:
After that, a policewoman came up to me and asked
about him.
jpnChrName: その後、すかさず婦警が 同じ事を尋ねてきましてな。
jpnSearchText:
その後、すかさず婦警が
同じ事を尋ねてきましてな。

engChrName: That whole thing seemed kinda weird. Is something going on that I don't know about?
engSearchText:
That whole thing seemed kinda weird. Is something
going on that I don't know about?
jpnChrName: 何やら不穏な感じがいたしますが…… 一体何が起きているのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
何やら不穏な感じがいたしますが……
一体何が起きているのでしょうか……？

engChrName: I think it's about time for me and the boys to do our routine repair work on Vashtar Palace's exterior.
engSearchText:
I think it's about time for me and the boys to do our
routine repair work on Vashtar Palace's exterior.
jpnChrName: そういえばそろそろ……ヴァシュタール宮の 外装を補修する頃合いかもしれませんな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえばそろそろ……ヴァシュタール宮の
外装を補修する頃合いかもしれませんな。

engChrName: It's an important piece of Oración history, so the artisans in the city do upkeep on it on a regular basis.
engSearchText:
It's an important piece of Oración history, so the
artisans in the city do upkeep on it on a regular basis.
jpnChrName: オラシオンに残る歴史的建造物は重要な財産、 定期的に市内の職人が保全を担っておるのです。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンに残る歴史的建造物は重要な財産、
定期的に市内の職人が保全を担っておるのです。

engChrName: Vashtar Palace was destroyed during the revolution, but we all believe it needs to be preserved for future generations.
engSearchText:
Vashtar Palace was destroyed during the revolution,
but we all believe it needs to be preserved for
future generations.
jpnChrName: かのヴァシュタール宮も、革命時に打ち壊された とはいえ、歴史的に貴重な事に変わりはない。
jpnSearchText:
かのヴァシュタール宮も、革命時に打ち壊された
とはいえ、歴史的に貴重な事に変わりはない。

engChrName: I've helped repair its walls many times.
engSearchText: I've helped repair its walls many times.
jpnChrName: ですのでわしも、何度か城壁などの修繕に 参加させてもらって来たのです。
jpnSearchText:
ですのでわしも、何度か城壁などの修繕に
参加させてもらって来たのです。

engChrName: Heya. I sell weapons and silverwork here.
engSearchText: Heya. I sell weapons and silverwork here.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃい、オラシオンの工房に 受け継がれた鍛治と銀細工の品をご覧あれ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃい、オラシオンの工房に
受け継がれた鍛治と銀細工の品をご覧あれ。

engChrName: I've been doing business in this department store for a long time, but our production methods haven't changed a bit.
engSearchText:
I've been doing business in this department store for a
long time, but our production methods haven't
changed a bit.
jpnChrName: 我が工房が百貨店に編入されて久しいが、 製法などの拘りはしっかり守っていますぞ。
jpnSearchText:
我が工房が百貨店に編入されて久しいが、
製法などの拘りはしっかり守っていますぞ。

engChrName: The Quincy Company has been looking out for my little shop for a long time now. I'm indebted to them.
engSearchText:
The Quincy Company has been looking out for my
little shop for a long time now. I'm indebted to them.
jpnChrName: いや、むしろ百貨店とクインシー社に 工房を守ってもらえているとも言えますかな。
jpnSearchText:
いや、むしろ百貨店とクインシー社に
工房を守ってもらえているとも言えますかな。

engChrName: Anyhow, this style of craftsmanship was once loved by the nobility of old, and it's still popular today. I feel blessed, honestly.
engSearchText:
Anyhow, this style of craftsmanship was once loved
by the nobility of old, and it's still popular today.
I feel blessed, honestly.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、かつて貴族にも愛されたこの様式…… 今でも人気があり、職人として感無量なものです。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、かつて貴族にも愛されたこの様式……
今でも人気があり、職人として感無量なものです。

engChrName: There are many workshops dealing in silver accessories and swords. They're symbols of the old nobility.
engSearchText:
There are many workshops dealing in silver
accessories and swords. They're symbols of the
old nobility.
jpnChrName: オラシオンには王国時代から貴族の象徴たる剣や、 銀細工の装飾品などの工房が多くありましてな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンには王国時代から貴族の象徴たる剣や、
銀細工の装飾品などの工房が多くありましてな。

engChrName: As time has passed and things have changed, so, too, did the workshops. They inherited traditional crafting methods and styles.
engSearchText:
As time has passed and things have changed, so, too,
did the workshops. They inherited traditional crafting
methods and styles.
jpnChrName: 時代の変化と共にそうした工房も在り方を変えつつ、 こうして伝統的な製法や様式を伝えておるのです。
jpnSearchText:
時代の変化と共にそうした工房も在り方を変えつつ、
こうして伝統的な製法や様式を伝えておるのです。

engChrName: I'm happy that my workshop and the Quincy Company can work together to protect the old ways of doing things.
engSearchText:
I'm happy that my workshop and the Quincy
Company can work together to protect the old ways
of doing things.
jpnChrName: 我が工房も、伝統の保護と振興に熱心な クインシー社と協力できて、嬉しい限りですな。
jpnSearchText:
我が工房も、伝統の保護と振興に熱心な
クインシー社と協力できて、嬉しい限りですな。

engChrName: The police told me that President Auclair was working with an anti-immigrant group and the mafia...
engSearchText:
The police told me that President Auclair was
working with an anti-immigrant group and
the mafia...
jpnChrName: まさかエドモン氏が……警察より説明は 受けましたが未だに信じられない……
jpnSearchText:
まさかエドモン氏が……警察より説明は
受けましたが未だに信じられない……

engChrName: I couldn't believe what I heard... I wonder what's going to happen to me from here.
engSearchText:
I couldn't believe what I heard... I wonder what's
going to happen to me from here.
jpnChrName: 団体の方はともかく、まさかマフィアとまで…… 私もこのままではどうなるのか……
jpnSearchText:
団体の方はともかく、まさかマフィアとまで……
私もこのままではどうなるのか……

engChrName: I heard that the president's daughter was spotted near here, but she didn't come this way.
engSearchText:
I heard that the president's daughter was spotted near
here, but she didn't come this way.
jpnChrName: 先ほど、近くで社長のご令嬢が見かけられたと 耳にしましたが……こちらは通りませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど、近くで社長のご令嬢が見かけられたと
耳にしましたが……こちらは通りませんでした。

engChrName: She has been avoiding me since even before she left home... Why can she not understand her father's feelings?
engSearchText:
She has been avoiding me since even before she
left home... Why can she not understand her
father's feelings?
jpnChrName: どうにもお嬢様には出奔前から避けられていて…… お嬢様も何故御父上の考えを理解されぬのか……
jpnSearchText:
どうにもお嬢様には出奔前から避けられていて……
お嬢様も何故御父上の考えを理解されぬのか……

engChrName: Is it true that President Auclair's daughter has returned to Oración?
engSearchText:
Is it true that President Auclair's daughter has
returned to Oración?
jpnChrName: ……エドモン社長のご令嬢がオラシオンに 帰省されているというのは本当でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
……エドモン社長のご令嬢がオラシオンに
帰省されているというのは本当でしょうか……？

engChrName: I know she was estranged from her father... How unexpected.
engSearchText:
I know she was estranged from her father...
How unexpected.
jpnChrName: しばらく疎遠になっていたはずですが、 珍しい事もあるようで……
jpnSearchText:
しばらく疎遠になっていたはずですが、
珍しい事もあるようで……

engChrName: This elevator will take you to the Quincy Company's headquarters. If you have business there, you will need to schedule an appointment.
engSearchText:
This elevator will take you to the Quincy
Company's headquarters. If you have business there,
you will need to schedule an appointment.
jpnChrName: ……この上はクインシー社の本社になります。 何かご用があれば、事前にアポイントメントを。
jpnSearchText:
……この上はクインシー社の本社になります。
何かご用があれば、事前にアポイントメントを。

engChrName: Though the president has been busier than usual these past few days, so I doubt you'll be able to see him anytime soon.
engSearchText:
Though the president has been busier than usual
these past few days, so I doubt you'll be able to see
him anytime soon.
jpnChrName: ……もっとも、社長はこの数日一層忙しいので、 ご都合をつけられるのは先になりますが……
jpnSearchText:
……もっとも、社長はこの数日一層忙しいので、
ご都合をつけられるのは先になりますが……

engChrName: What was with all of the commotion in the office above us?
engSearchText:
What was with all of the commotion in the office
above us?
jpnChrName: 上のオフィスで何かトラブルでも あったというのかしらぁ？
jpnSearchText:
上のオフィスで何かトラブルでも
あったというのかしらぁ？

engChrName: It has thoroughly ruined my relaxing shopping spree. What is the Quincy Company thinking?
engSearchText:
It has thoroughly ruined my relaxing shopping spree.
What is the Quincy Company thinking?
jpnChrName: まったく、お客の楽しみに水を差すとは クインシー社も落ちたものですわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、お客の楽しみに水を差すとは
クインシー社も落ちたものですわねぇ。

engChrName: I hope Rennes is having more fun than I am right now... Perhaps it's good that she went to that event.
engSearchText:
I hope Rennes is having more fun than I am
right now... Perhaps it's good that she went to
that event.
jpnChrName: せっかくレンヌも 何やら急な催しに行ってくれたのにぃ。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくレンヌも
何やら急な催しに行ってくれたのにぃ。

engChrName: I'm surprised my daughter is interested in this sort of event.
engSearchText:
I'm surprised my daughter is interested in this sort
of event.
jpnChrName: レンヌもあんなものに興味を持つとは、 なかなかどうしてですわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
レンヌもあんなものに興味を持つとは、
なかなかどうしてですわねぇ。

engChrName: The fact that it's being sponsored by Central Easterners is making me a little wary, I'll admit.
engSearchText:
The fact that it's being sponsored by Central
Easterners is making me a little wary, I'll admit.
jpnChrName: 中東の主催というのは 信頼ならないけどぉ……
jpnSearchText:
中東の主催というのは
信頼ならないけどぉ……

engChrName: But if my daughter wants to go, I won't stop her.
engSearchText: But if my daughter wants to go, I won't stop her.
jpnChrName: うちの娘を楽しませられるなら 楽しませてみせるが良いですわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うちの娘を楽しませられるなら
楽しませてみせるが良いですわぁ。

engChrName: All right, sweetie. We're not going to let that dreadful news get between us and our shopping time.
engSearchText:
All right, sweetie. We're not going to let that dreadful
news get between us and our shopping time.
jpnChrName: さて、今日も買い物いたしますわよレンヌぅ。 世間がどうあれ私達の雅さは不変ですわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
さて、今日も買い物いたしますわよレンヌぅ。
世間がどうあれ私達の雅さは不変ですわぁ。

engChrName: Remember, money's no object—you may buy whatever you'd like. We'll have the maids carry it all back home later.
engSearchText:
Remember, money's no object—you may buy whatever
you'd like. We'll have the maids carry it all back
home later.
jpnChrName: ささぁ、選ぶだけ選びましょぉ。 後でメイドに運ばせれば良いのですからぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ささぁ、選ぶだけ選びましょぉ。
後でメイドに運ばせれば良いのですからぁ。

engChrName: Since my stingy husband is nowhere to be found, I'm putting myself in charge of the family budget—and I say we're going to shop until we drop!
engSearchText:
Since my stingy husband is nowhere to be found, I'm
putting myself in charge of the family budget—and I
say we're going to shop until we drop!
jpnChrName: あの小うるさい旦那も、 今ならいない訳ざぁますしね。
jpnSearchText:
あの小うるさい旦那も、
今ならいない訳ざぁますしね。

engChrName: Well, if you truly wish to go, then I won't stop you. Go enjoy yourself, sweetie.
engSearchText:
Well, if you truly wish to go, then I won't stop you.
Go enjoy yourself, sweetie.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、そこまで行きたいのなら仕方ないですわぁ、 楽しんでくると良いですわレンヌぅ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、そこまで行きたいのなら仕方ないですわぁ、
楽しんでくると良いですわレンヌぅ。

engChrName: Wait, didn't they say the event is being sponsored by Central Easterners? Why would they...?
engSearchText:
Wait, didn't they say the event is being sponsored by
Central Easterners? Why would they...?
jpnChrName: でも、主催は中東の人たちなのでしょう？ どんなものなのかしらねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
でも、主催は中東の人たちなのでしょう？
どんなものなのかしらねぇ……

engChrName: Oh, don't worry about that, Mama. Apparently the man behind it is, like, super rich and important and stuff!
engSearchText:
Oh, don't worry about that, Mama. Apparently the
man behind it is, like, super rich and important
and stuff!
jpnChrName: それならダイジョーブなはずですわママ。 なんたってジッセキある方ですもの！
jpnSearchText:
それならダイジョーブなはずですわママ。
なんたってジッセキある方ですもの！

engChrName: The man behind the event has done a lot of stuff down south. I can't wait to see what it's all about!
engSearchText:
The man behind the event has done a lot of stuff
down south. I can't wait to see what it's all about!
jpnChrName: あのおかたはみなみのほうでのジッセキも ありますの、いくカチあるもよおしのはずですわ！
jpnSearchText:
あのおかたはみなみのほうでのジッセキも
ありますの、いくカチあるもよおしのはずですわ！

engChrName: Let's see... I want Quincy Bell's chocolate cake and madeleines.
engSearchText:
Let's see... I want Quincy Bell's chocolate cake
and madeleines.
jpnChrName: ママ、レンヌはクインシー・ベルの ガトーショコラとマドレーヌが欲しいですわ。
jpnSearchText:
ママ、レンヌはクインシー・ベルの
ガトーショコラとマドレーヌが欲しいですわ。

engChrName: Oh, and I want some fancy clothes! I wanna look like a proper lady.
engSearchText:
Oh, and I want some fancy clothes! I wanna look like
a proper lady.
jpnChrName: 今日のおやつに……あ、あとはふくもですわね。 レンヌもレディにむけてセイチョウキですもの。
jpnSearchText:
今日のおやつに……あ、あとはふくもですわね。
レンヌもレディにむけてセイチョウキですもの。

engChrName: And can we buy some jewelry? I wanna wear jewelry!
engSearchText: And can we buy some jewelry? I wanna wear jewelry!
jpnChrName: あとはあとは……そろそろホンモノの ほうせきをみにつけてもいいころあいでなくって？
jpnSearchText:
あとはあとは……そろそろホンモノの
ほうせきをみにつけてもいいころあいでなくって？

engChrName: It sounds like our Kowloon and Marduk guests' reasons for being here are quite complicated.
engSearchText:
It sounds like our Kowloon and Marduk guests'
reasons for being here are quite complicated.
jpnChrName: ……何やら九龍とマルドゥックの お客様方には込み入った事情もありそうで……
jpnSearchText:
……何やら九龍とマルドゥックの
お客様方には込み入った事情もありそうで……

engChrName: It is not our place to pry into their private business, but we would still like to be of service if possible.
engSearchText:
It is not our place to pry into their private business,
but we would still like to be of service if possible.
jpnChrName: 私共はあくまでもホテル、各々の事情に立ち入りは しませんが、力になれる事はしたいですな。
jpnSearchText:
私共はあくまでもホテル、各々の事情に立ち入りは
しませんが、力になれる事はしたいですな。

engChrName: After all, they are guests at our hotel, and that truth remains unchanged.
engSearchText:
After all, they are guests at our hotel, and that truth
remains unchanged.
jpnChrName: 何せ、今の彼らは我がホテルのお客様。 それに変わりはありませんので。
jpnSearchText:
何せ、今の彼らは我がホテルのお客様。
それに変わりはありませんので。

engChrName: Guests from the Kowloon Group are staying here. Do you have business with them?
engSearchText:
Guests from the Kowloon Group are staying here.
Do you have business with them?
jpnChrName: 九龍グループの団体様が宿泊されて おりますが、そちらの方々にご用でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
九龍グループの団体様が宿泊されて
おりますが、そちらの方々にご用でしょうか。

engChrName: It's quite uncommon for such a large group from Kowloon to be staying here. I wonder if something's going on?
engSearchText:
It's quite uncommon for such a large group from
Kowloon to be staying here. I wonder if something's
going on?
jpnChrName: 九龍グループの方がかくも大勢で宿泊される 事は久しいですが、何かあるのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
九龍グループの方がかくも大勢で宿泊される
事は久しいですが、何かあるのでしょうか。

engChrName: Well, I suppose it's not hard to imagine they have a lot to deal with, given the perilous nature of things as of late.
engSearchText:
Well, I suppose it's not hard to imagine they have a
lot to deal with, given the perilous nature of things as
of late.
jpnChrName: ……まあ、こうした大変な国難と言える状況です、 かような大企業にも対応すべき事は多いはず。
jpnSearchText:
……まあ、こうした大変な国難と言える状況です、
かような大企業にも対応すべき事は多いはず。

engChrName: It's an honor that we're able to provide a place for them to do business.
engSearchText:
It's an honor that we're able to provide a place for
them to do business.
jpnChrName: 我々も、場を提供する事で貢献できるなら ホテルとしては光栄と言えるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
我々も、場を提供する事で貢献できるなら
ホテルとしては光栄と言えるでしょう。

engChrName: Welcome to Hotel Leclerc. Do you have business with one of our guests?
engSearchText:
Welcome to Hotel Leclerc. Do you have business
with one of our guests?
jpnChrName: 《ホテル・ルクレール》へようこそ。 どなたかご宿泊のお客様にご用ですか？
jpnSearchText:
《ホテル・ルクレール》へようこそ。
どなたかご宿泊のお客様にご用ですか？

engChrName: If you do, please talk to one of our staff members. They'll be able to connect you to them.
engSearchText:
If you do, please talk to one of our staff members.
They'll be able to connect you to them.
jpnChrName: もしご用命でしたら、スタッフに お声掛けください、お繋ぎいたします故。
jpnSearchText:
もしご用命でしたら、スタッフに
お声掛けください、お繋ぎいたします故。

engChrName: As far as lodgings are concerned, we use a reservation system.
engSearchText:
As far as lodgings are concerned, we use a
reservation system.
jpnChrName: 宿泊につきましては当ホテルは、 完全予約制となっております。
jpnSearchText:
宿泊につきましては当ホテルは、
完全予約制となっております。

engChrName: VIPs from around the country and celebrities use our hotel, so we hope you understand.
engSearchText:
VIPs from around the country and celebrities use our
hotel, so we hope you understand.
jpnChrName: 各地のＶＩＰや名士の方もご利用されますので、 ご理解のほどよろしくお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
各地のＶＩＰや名士の方もご利用されますので、
ご理解のほどよろしくお願いいたします。

engChrName: There was a meeting and a social gathering last night. For some reason, the ETWS representatives that attended looked a little panic-stricken.
engSearchText:
There was a meeting and a social gathering last night.
For some reason, the ETWS representatives that
attended looked a little panic-stricken.
jpnChrName: 昨晩も会食や社交界が行われておりましたが…… どうにもエトワス社の方が慌ただしいような……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩も会食や社交界が行われておりましたが……
どうにもエトワス社の方が慌ただしいような……

engChrName: I hope nothing's wrong. Should I be keeping an eye out for something?
engSearchText:
I hope nothing's wrong. Should I be keeping an eye
out for something?
jpnChrName: 何事も無ければ良いのですが…… 私達としても気を配るべきでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
何事も無ければ良いのですが……
私達としても気を配るべきでしょう。

engChrName: After all, it's our job to ensure our guests are relaxed and happy during their stay.
engSearchText:
After all, it's our job to ensure our guests are relaxed
and happy during their stay.
jpnChrName: 少しでも平常通りに行事を行える場を提供する事も、 私達の役目であると言えますでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
少しでも平常通りに行事を行える場を提供する事も、
私達の役目であると言えますでしょうし……

engChrName: This hotel was once a reception hall. It was built at the behest of the royal family of the old kingdom.
engSearchText:
This hotel was once a reception hall. It was built at
the behest of the royal family of the old kingdom.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルの前身となったのは、旧王国時代に王家の ご意向を受けて設立された迎賓館でございます。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルの前身となったのは、旧王国時代に王家の
ご意向を受けて設立された迎賓館でございます。

engChrName: After the revolution, it was turned into a hotel.
engSearchText: After the revolution, it was turned into a hotel.
jpnChrName: 革命後、幾度かの改修と経営体制の 再編等を経て現在に至りますが……
jpnSearchText:
革命後、幾度かの改修と経営体制の
再編等を経て現在に至りますが……

engChrName: But even now, we sometimes serve royal families and nobles from other nations.
engSearchText:
But even now, we sometimes serve royal families and
nobles from other nations.
jpnChrName: 今でもカルバードに招かれた他国の王侯貴族を こちらに招待し、もてなす事もございます。
jpnSearchText:
今でもカルバードに招かれた他国の王侯貴族を
こちらに招待し、もてなす事もございます。

engChrName: And it's times like those in which we are able to make use of the traditions we inherited from the days when this was a reception hall.
engSearchText:
And it's times like those in which we are able to make
use of the traditions we inherited from the days when
this was a reception hall.
jpnChrName: そうした際にも、迎賓館時代から受け継がれた作法や 伝統が大いに活かされていると言えましょう。
jpnSearchText:
そうした際にも、迎賓館時代から受け継がれた作法や
伝統が大いに活かされていると言えましょう。

engChrName: Greetings! Welcome to Hotel Leclerc.
engSearchText: Greetings! Welcome to Hotel Leclerc.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、《ホテル・ルクレール》へ ようこそおいでくださいました。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、《ホテル・ルクレール》へ
ようこそおいでくださいました。

engChrName: If you're here to book a room, then I'm sorry. You have to make reservations in advance.
engSearchText:
If you're here to book a room, then I'm sorry.
You have to make reservations in advance.
jpnChrName: ご宿泊をご希望でしたら、申し訳ございませんが 事前にご予約いただく必要がございます。
jpnSearchText:
ご宿泊をご希望でしたら、申し訳ございませんが
事前にご予約いただく必要がございます。

engChrName: The reservation system was put in place to ensure the safety of our guests. We hope you understand.
engSearchText:
The reservation system was put in place to ensure the
safety of our guests. We hope you understand.
jpnChrName: もとより安全対策とサービスの品質確保のため 完全予約制を採用しておりますが……
jpnSearchText:
もとより安全対策とサービスの品質確保のため
完全予約制を採用しておりますが……

engChrName: We're nearly fully booked, and there have been a large number of dinner parties here lately. It's been hard for people to reserve rooms.
engSearchText:
We're nearly fully booked, and there have been a
large number of dinner parties here lately. It's been
hard for people to reserve rooms.
jpnChrName: 現在、会食などが多く入り、団体様の宿泊も多く 平常以上にお部屋の確保が難しくなっています。
jpnSearchText:
現在、会食などが多く入り、団体様の宿泊も多く
平常以上にお部屋の確保が難しくなっています。

engChrName: (Hmm... There is a line item category that simply says 'compensation.' Compensation for what?)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... There is a line item category that simply
says 'compensation.' Compensation for what?)
jpnChrName: （……もっとも……“補填”とやらが何を   意味するのか……私も気にはなりますが。）
jpnSearchText:
（……もっとも……“補填”とやらが何を
意味するのか……私も気にはなりますが。）

engChrName: (I imagine the president knows the answer, but now probably isn't the best time to ask about that...)
engSearchText:
(I imagine the president knows the answer, but now
probably isn't the best time to ask about that...)
jpnChrName: （頭取方なら知っていそうですが……   聞ける雰囲気ではないですしな……）
jpnSearchText:
（頭取方なら知っていそうですが……
聞ける雰囲気ではないですしな……）

engChrName: Hmm... I'll admit, I am a little concerned about the money that's flowing in and out of the bank for no clear purpose.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I'll admit, I am a little concerned about the
money that's flowing in and out of the bank for no
clear purpose.
jpnChrName: しかし……幾分か用途不明な“補填”ミラの 流れが依然ある事は不安なものですな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……幾分か用途不明な“補填”ミラの
流れが依然ある事は不安なものですな。

engChrName: I cannot help but be concerned that the wealthy are resting on their seemingly stable laurels.
engSearchText:
I cannot help but be concerned that the wealthy are
resting on their seemingly stable laurels.
jpnChrName: 安定した地盤に胡坐をかきすぎている 資産家の危機感もやや気掛かりではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
安定した地盤に胡坐をかきすぎている
資産家の危機感もやや気掛かりではありますが……

engChrName: The unknowns in the current flow of mira could result in trust issues down the line...
engSearchText:
The unknowns in the current flow of mira could
result in trust issues down the line...
jpnChrName: ミラの流れに不透明な部分が残っているのは 今後の信用問題にも関わるでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
ミラの流れに不透明な部分が残っているのは
今後の信用問題にも関わるでしょうし……

engChrName: There's been some hubbub about the Oración Trust Bank lagging behind the banks in the capital and Langport.
engSearchText:
There's been some hubbub about the Oración Trust
Bank lagging behind the banks in the capital
and Langport.
jpnChrName: オラシオン信託銀行がここ数年で首都や煌都の 銀行に遅れを取っているという言説はあるが……
jpnSearchText:
オラシオン信託銀行がここ数年で首都や煌都の
銀行に遅れを取っているという言説はあるが……

engChrName: The people spreading that garbage need to look beyond the simple numbers. There's more to finance than assets and liabilities.
engSearchText:
The people spreading that garbage need to look
beyond the simple numbers. There's more to finance
than assets and liabilities.
jpnChrName: 単純な総資産額でしか物を 見れないのかと、あきれるばかりです。
jpnSearchText:
単純な総資産額でしか物を
見れないのかと、あきれるばかりです。

engChrName: For example, the price of land in Oración is through the roof, as are the average savings of its citizens. Public trust is also high.
engSearchText:
For example, the price of land in Oración is through
the roof, as are the average savings of its citizens.
Public trust is also high.
jpnChrName: オラシオンは地価も高く、住民の貯蓄率も高い。 名門企業の信頼性も折り紙付きですしな。
jpnSearchText:
オラシオンは地価も高く、住民の貯蓄率も高い。
名門企業の信頼性も折り紙付きですしな。

engChrName: Our growth may not be rapid, but it is stable. For my money, I think we're doing an excellent job supporting our country's economy.
engSearchText:
Our growth may not be rapid, but it is stable. For my
money, I think we're doing an excellent job
supporting our country's economy.
jpnChrName: 瞬間的な経済拡大こそ無くとも、この安定性と 信頼性は確かに国の経済を支えているのです。
jpnSearchText:
瞬間的な経済拡大こそ無くとも、この安定性と
信頼性は確かに国の経済を支えているのです。

engChrName: I heard this is Elaine's first time home in a while. Doesn't sound like it was the best of homecomings, though.
engSearchText:
I heard this is Elaine's first time home in a while.
Doesn't sound like it was the best of
homecomings, though.
jpnChrName: エレインさんにとって久しぶりの帰郷って 話は聞いちゃいたが、こうなっちまうとはな……
jpnSearchText:
エレインさんにとって久しぶりの帰郷って
話は聞いちゃいたが、こうなっちまうとはな……

engChrName: I can empathize with what she's probably going through. I've stressed out over my home and family before.
engSearchText:
I can empathize with what she's probably
going through. I've stressed out over my home and
family before.
jpnChrName: オレも故郷だの一族だのって話には 散々悩まされた事があってよ。
jpnSearchText:
オレも故郷だの一族だのって話には
散々悩まされた事があってよ。

engChrName: That whole thing with her father's a tough deal, though. If I were in her shoes, I probably wouldn't have wanted to confront him.
engSearchText:
That whole thing with her father's a tough
deal, though. If I were in her shoes, I probably
wouldn't have wanted to confront him.
jpnChrName: けど親父があの最悪な連中となんて…… 俺なら目を背けたくなるね。
jpnSearchText:
けど親父があの最悪な連中となんて……
俺なら目を背けたくなるね。

engChrName: But she did, and I respect her for that. Maybe I could learn a thing or two from her example.
engSearchText:
But she did, and I respect her for that. Maybe I could
learn a thing or two from her example.
jpnChrName: けどエレインさんはそうしなかった── オレたちもその想いには応えたいよな。
jpnSearchText:
けどエレインさんはそうしなかった──
オレたちもその想いには応えたいよな。

engChrName: Gray came along even though we told him not to, but since he's here, we figured we'd put him to work— while keeping a close eye on him, of course.
engSearchText:
Gray came along even though we told him not to, but
since he's here, we figured we'd put him to work—
while keeping a close eye on him, of course.
jpnChrName: グレイの奴、無理やり付いてきちまったから 監視付きで仕事をさせてんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
グレイの奴、無理やり付いてきちまったから
監視付きで仕事をさせてんだよ。

engChrName: The kid's got talent, but I'm still a little worried about him...
engSearchText:
The kid's got talent, but I'm still a little worried
about him...
jpnChrName: しっかしまあ、手際はいいんだがな。 そこが逆に心配というか……
jpnSearchText:
しっかしまあ、手際はいいんだがな。
そこが逆に心配というか……

engChrName: Ah, whatever. This babysitting crap's a pain in the butt, but we're all in the same boat here. Guess I'll just focus on keeping him out of trouble!
engSearchText:
Ah, whatever. This babysitting crap's a pain in the
butt, but we're all in the same boat here. Guess I'll
just focus on keeping him out of trouble!
jpnChrName: ──仕方ねえ、面倒だが一蓮托生でもある。 最後まで面倒見てやるかね！
jpnSearchText:
──仕方ねえ、面倒だが一蓮托生でもある。
最後まで面倒見てやるかね！

engChrName: You wrapped up your stuff here?
engSearchText: You wrapped up your stuff here?
jpnChrName: グレイ、そっちの持ち分は片付いたかよ？
jpnSearchText: グレイ、そっちの持ち分は片付いたかよ？

engChrName: Yep. I also finished another request at the same time. Oh, and I also did your share of the work on it.
engSearchText:
Yep. I also finished another request at the same time.
Oh, and I also did your share of the work on it.
jpnChrName: はい、ついでにその次の案件も対応しました。 あ、ついでにカザン先輩の分も……
jpnSearchText:
はい、ついでにその次の案件も対応しました。
あ、ついでにカザン先輩の分も……

engChrName: What the...? Are you kidding me, dude?!
engSearchText: What the...? Are you kidding me, dude?!
jpnChrName: なにっ！？　この後の案件も もう片付けちまったってのか！？
jpnSearchText:
なにっ！？　この後の案件も
もう片付けちまったってのか！？

engChrName: ...Were you just pretending to be a reckless idiot back in Longlai?
engSearchText:
...Were you just pretending to be a reckless idiot back
in Longlai?
jpnChrName: ……お前、龍來じゃあえて手際悪く 見せてたんじゃねえだろうな？
jpnSearchText:
……お前、龍來じゃあえて手際悪く
見せてたんじゃねえだろうな？

engChrName: Umm, well, I...
engSearchText: Umm, well, I...
jpnChrName: ええと、それはその……
jpnSearchText: ええと、それはその……

engChrName: I just wanted to see your skills firsthand back then!
engSearchText: I just wanted to see your skills firsthand back then!
jpnChrName: センパイの腕前を拝見したくて、つい……！
jpnSearchText: センパイの腕前を拝見したくて、つい……！

engChrName: Haha. You've got some nerve, you know that? But I like that about you.
engSearchText:
Haha. You've got some nerve, you know that? But I
like that about you.
jpnChrName: そうだったのかよ～！ ハハ、しょうがねえヤツ！
jpnSearchText:
そうだったのかよ～！
ハハ、しょうがねえヤツ！

engChrName: Welp, guess I'll go chill out somewhere. Thanks for enabling me to be lazy!
engSearchText:
Welp, guess I'll go chill out somewhere. Thanks for
enabling me to be lazy!
jpnChrName: ま、そこまで言うなら仕方ねえよな！ オレも楽できて助かるし！
jpnSearchText:
ま、そこまで言うなら仕方ねえよな！
オレも楽できて助かるし！

engChrName: S-Sure thing. (Kazan's so laid back that it kinda worries me...)
engSearchText:
S-Sure thing.
(Kazan's so laid back that it kinda worries me...)
jpnChrName: ははは……（カザン先輩、 チョロすぎて逆に心配だなぁ……）
jpnSearchText:
ははは……（カザン先輩、
チョロすぎて逆に心配だなぁ……）

engChrName: I figured that since I'm stuck here, I might as well make myself useful.
engSearchText:
I figured that since I'm stuck here, I might as well
make myself useful.
jpnChrName: 今の僕にできる事は、最後まで見届けるくらい ──それは分かっているつもりです。
jpnSearchText:
今の僕にできる事は、最後まで見届けるくらい
──それは分かっているつもりです。

engChrName: That's why I wanted to at least help out.
engSearchText: That's why I wanted to at least help out.
jpnChrName: ですからせめて仕事の手伝いをと 思ったんですが……
jpnSearchText:
ですからせめて仕事の手伝いをと
思ったんですが……

engChrName: Despite everything that's gone down, Kazan's still as lax as ever. It's helped put me at ease, actually.
engSearchText:
Despite everything that's gone down, Kazan's still as
lax as ever. It's helped put me at ease, actually.
jpnChrName: カザン先輩はこんな時でも変わりませんね…… ……僕も少し和んでしまいます、ハハハ……
jpnSearchText:
カザン先輩はこんな時でも変わりませんね……
……僕も少し和んでしまいます、ハハハ……

engChrName: I'm impressed that you saw through Ellroy's plan. You even managed to remove him from the game board.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed that you saw through Ellroy's plan.
You even managed to remove him from the
game board.
jpnChrName: あのオジサンの手口を見抜いて、 ゲームから降板までさせるなんて。
jpnSearchText:
あのオジサンの手口を見抜いて、
ゲームから降板までさせるなんて。

engChrName: Not even I would've dared make that gamble. Well done, Van.
engSearchText:
Not even I would've dared make that gamble.
Well done, Van.
jpnChrName: フフ、私ですらまだ出来なかった 賭けに出るとは、流石ねお兄さん。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私ですらまだ出来なかった
賭けに出るとは、流石ねお兄さん。

engChrName: Yeah, I had to put my foot down. Wasn't gonna let one of my partners pull somethin' like that.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I had to put my foot down. Wasn't gonna let
one of my partners pull somethin' like that.
jpnChrName: 協力している以上、どこかで釘を刺さなきゃ ならねぇからな、ありゃ……
jpnSearchText:
協力している以上、どこかで釘を刺さなきゃ
ならねぇからな、ありゃ……

engChrName: But I definitely didn't expect him to give up THAT easily.
engSearchText:
But I definitely didn't expect him to give up
THAT easily.
jpnChrName: まあ、あっさりゲームから降りたのは 流石に想定外だったが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あっさりゲームから降りたのは
流石に想定外だったが……

engChrName: What you did was worthy of praise. Even I have trouble reading his intentions.
engSearchText:
What you did was worthy of praise. Even I have
trouble reading his intentions.
jpnChrName: あの人の行動を読めるなら誉めてあげるわ。 私でも底知れないと思うもの。
jpnSearchText:
あの人の行動を読めるなら誉めてあげるわ。
私でも底知れないと思うもの。

engChrName: For him, biological and chemical weapons are simply a means by which he can annihilate large swaths of people and organizations.
engSearchText:
For him, biological and chemical weapons are simply
a means by which he can annihilate large swaths of
people and organizations.
jpnChrName: まあ、それでもＢＣ兵器だって、あの人が多くの 人や組織を“破滅”させた“手段”に過ぎない。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それでもＢＣ兵器だって、あの人が多くの
人や組織を“破滅”させた“手段”に過ぎない。

engChrName: Though bear in mind that while we have taken away his favorite toys, he may still have other tools at his disposal. Expect the unexpected with him.
engSearchText:
Though bear in mind that while we have taken away
his favorite toys, he may still have other tools at
his disposal. Expect the unexpected with him.
jpnChrName: それを封じたとしても、彼は彼なりに“愉しむ” かもしれないし、違うかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
それを封じたとしても、彼は彼なりに“愉しむ”
かもしれないし、違うかもしれない。

engChrName: Also, I'd advise that you be careful around him since he seems to have taken a liking to you. I don't envy you there.
engSearchText:
Also, I'd advise that you be careful around him since
he seems to have taken a liking to you. I don't envy
you there.
jpnChrName: ……今回の一件に限らず、今後は長期的に気を つけるのね、彼もあなたを気に入ったようだし。
jpnSearchText:
……今回の一件に限らず、今後は長期的に気を
つけるのね、彼もあなたを気に入ったようだし。

engChrName: Ugh. And here I thought Walter was bad enough.
engSearchText: Ugh. And here I thought Walter was bad enough.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ、ヴァルターだけでも十分だってのに……
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ、ヴァルターだけでも十分だってのに……

engChrName: I never asked to be popular with these society assholes.
engSearchText:
I never asked to be popular with these
society assholes.
jpnChrName: また結社の面倒どころから 目ェつけられちまったかよ……
jpnSearchText:
また結社の面倒どころから
目ェつけられちまったかよ……

engChrName: I certainly didn't expect to run into them while I was out buying tea.
engSearchText:
I certainly didn't expect to run into them while I was
out buying tea.
jpnChrName: それにしても、紅茶を買いに来て あの濃い面子に出くわすとはね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、紅茶を買いに来て
あの濃い面子に出くわすとはね。

engChrName: It was kind of nice to catch up with Walter and Retzy. I've known them for a long time.
engSearchText:
It was kind of nice to catch up with Walter and
Retzy. I've known them for a long time.
jpnChrName: まあ、ヴァルターやレティについては昔馴染み として懐かしいって普通に感じるけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヴァルターやレティについては昔馴染み
として懐かしいって普通に感じるけど……

engChrName: But I wish I never knew Ellroy. He isn't especially popular in the society. Most prefer to keep their distance from him.
engSearchText:
But I wish I never knew Ellroy. He isn't especially
popular in the society. Most prefer to keep their
distance from him.
jpnChrName: あのオジサンについては正直、結社でも 距離を置きたい人、結構多いと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
あのオジサンについては正直、結社でも
距離を置きたい人、結構多いと思うわ。

engChrName: It's not uncommon for the government and Heiyue to form friendly agreements when necessary.
engSearchText:
It's not uncommon for the government and Heiyue to
form friendly agreements when necessary.
jpnChrName: 黒月（我々）と共和国政府は時として 良き契約関係になる事も珍しくないものでして。
jpnSearchText:
黒月（我々）と共和国政府は時として
良き契約関係になる事も珍しくないものでして。

engChrName: In fact, the previous administration was quite helpful during the days when I was in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
In fact, the previous administration was quite helpful
during the days when I was in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: 前政権の時ですら、クロスベルなどでは 色々とお互い世話になったもので……
jpnSearchText:
前政権の時ですら、クロスベルなどでは
色々とお互い世話になったもので……

engChrName: The current government is very agreeable as well.
engSearchText: The current government is very agreeable as well.
jpnChrName: まあ、現政権はこのように割り切りも良いもので、 私達としてもこの通り動きやすいものです。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、現政権はこのように割り切りも良いもので、
私達としてもこの通り動きやすいものです。

engChrName: However, we are all quite wary of the current president. We have to be careful while he's in power.
engSearchText:
However, we are all quite wary of the
current president. We have to be careful while he's
in power.
jpnChrName: もっとも、私などはそれも含めて、 大統領は警戒しているのですが。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、私などはそれも含めて、
大統領は警戒しているのですが。

engChrName: I'd really like to see more of what the Khamsin can do.
engSearchText:
I'd really like to see more of what the Khamsin
can do.
jpnChrName: ふふ、灼風の戦いぶりも一度この身で 感じてみたいものだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、灼風の戦いぶりも一度この身で
感じてみたいものだけど……

engChrName: I wouldn't mind getting to know him more, either. I'm sure he's got tons of fascinating stories to tell.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't mind getting to know him more, either.
I'm sure he's got tons of fascinating stories to tell.
jpnChrName: ＭＫ社に身を置いた彼からは、 全く別口で興味深い話が聞けるね。
jpnSearchText:
ＭＫ社に身を置いた彼からは、
全く別口で興味深い話が聞けるね。

engChrName: And who knows? I'd probably be able to understand him better than most. He and I are kindred spirits, after all.
engSearchText:
And who knows? I'd probably be able to understand
him better than most. He and I are kindred spirits,
after all.
jpnChrName: まあ、もしかしたらその意味するところも…… 私の方が理解できたりするかもしれないけどね？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、もしかしたらその意味するところも……
私の方が理解できたりするかもしれないけどね？

engChrName: Now, then. Let's talk about that contract. Mind going over the technical stuff?
engSearchText:
Now, then. Let's talk about that contract.
Mind going over the technical stuff?
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、そっちの契約は…… そうだね、技術的な話は？
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、そっちの契約は……
そうだね、技術的な話は？

engChrName: I'm afraid that information is confidential, but if necessary, I can ask the general manager if I can disclose it.
engSearchText:
I'm afraid that information is confidential, but if
necessary, I can ask the general manager if I can
disclose it.
jpnChrName: そこは俺の管轄外だが、必要とあらば ＧＭに確認は取るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
そこは俺の管轄外だが、必要とあらば
ＧＭに確認は取るとしよう。

engChrName: Cool. You do that. I'd reaaally like to know more about you-know-what.
engSearchText:
Cool. You do that. I'd reaaally like to know more
about you-know-what.
jpnChrName: うん、それが良いね。 私も例のアレ、気になるしさ。
jpnSearchText:
うん、それが良いね。
私も例のアレ、気になるしさ。

engChrName: Oh. Hey, you guys.
engSearchText: Oh. Hey, you guys.
jpnChrName: っと、君達か。
jpnSearchText: っと、君達か。

engChrName: ...For your sake, I hope you weren't eavesdropping.
engSearchText: ...For your sake, I hope you weren't eavesdropping.
jpnChrName: ……聞き耳を立てていた、 という訳ではないようだな。
jpnSearchText:
……聞き耳を立てていた、
という訳ではないようだな。

engChrName: Nah. We caught the last bit, but I doubt any of us understood a word you were saying.
engSearchText:
Nah. We caught the last bit, but I doubt any of us
understood a word you were saying.
jpnChrName: ああ……あんたらの話なんて、最後の方の 抽象的な締め括り以外聞いちゃいねぇさ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……あんたらの話なんて、最後の方の
抽象的な締め括り以外聞いちゃいねぇさ。

engChrName: And speakin' of things I don't understand, why the hell are you two chilling here together?
engSearchText:
And speakin' of things I don't understand, why the
hell are you two chilling here together?
jpnChrName: こっちは、単に最終フェーズ前に各勢力の 状況を見ていただけだが……珍しい組み合わせか？
jpnSearchText:
こっちは、単に最終フェーズ前に各勢力の
状況を見ていただけだが……珍しい組み合わせか？

engChrName: Oh, I'm just hanging with my buddy the Khamsin—
engSearchText: Oh, I'm just hanging with my buddy the Khamsin—
jpnChrName: どうだろうね？　私としては灼風（カムシン）とは もう少し絡めていければ面白いけど。
jpnSearchText:
どうだろうね？　私としては灼風（カムシン）とは
もう少し絡めていければ面白いけど。

engChrName: This is strictly business. Our client deemed it necessary that we meet, so we're meeting.
engSearchText:
This is strictly business. Our client deemed it
necessary that we meet, so we're meeting.
jpnChrName: どの道、俺達はあくまでもＰＭＣと 猟兵の立場だ。
jpnSearchText:
どの道、俺達はあくまでもＰＭＣと
猟兵の立場だ。

engChrName: That's all. I don't have 'friendly get-togethers.'
engSearchText: That's all. I don't have 'friendly get-togethers.'
jpnChrName: どう組み合わさるかもクライアント次第、 余分な感傷を持つつもりもない。
jpnSearchText:
どう組み合わさるかもクライアント次第、
余分な感傷を持つつもりもない。

engChrName: Kasim...
engSearchText: Kasim...
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃん……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃん……

engChrName: There will come a day when you will have less of those as well, Ferida. That is, if you wish to continue walking the path of the warrior.
engSearchText:
There will come a day when you will have less of
those as well, Ferida. That is, if you wish to continue
walking the path of the warrior.
jpnChrName: フェリーダ、お前が今後も戦士としてあるなら、 こうした割り切りも覚えていけ。
jpnSearchText:
フェリーダ、お前が今後も戦士としてあるなら、
こうした割り切りも覚えていけ。

engChrName: You must learn to be more pragmatic. Remember, even if you have grown fond of a comrade on the battlefield, you will part ways eventually.
engSearchText:
You must learn to be more pragmatic. Remember,
even if you have grown fond of a comrade on the
battlefield, you will part ways eventually.
jpnChrName: 共に死線を潜った盟友に情が芽生えたとしても、 それが一時に過ぎぬ事もある。
jpnSearchText:
共に死線を潜った盟友に情が芽生えたとしても、
それが一時に過ぎぬ事もある。

engChrName: Anyway, the wet blanket's right. We're just acting under client orders.
engSearchText:
Anyway, the wet blanket's right. We're just acting
under client orders.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよ私達は一応今は、 依頼者の意向で動いている立場だからね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよ私達は一応今は、
依頼者の意向で動いている立場だからね。

engChrName: Or so I assume. For all I know, they could have an ulterior motive here.
engSearchText:
Or so I assume. For all I know, they could have an
ulterior motive here.
jpnChrName: そう見せて他の狙いがあるのは── そっちも、かな？
jpnSearchText:
そう見せて他の狙いがあるのは──
そっちも、かな？

engChrName: I wouldn't know. Ask my superiors.
engSearchText: I wouldn't know. Ask my superiors.
jpnChrName: ……俺の立場では判りかねるな。
jpnSearchText: ……俺の立場では判りかねるな。

engChrName: (Hmm... Who could Ikaruga's client be? I've been wondering this since I saw them in Kunlun...)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... Who could Ikaruga's client be? I've been
wondering this since I saw them in Kunlun...)
jpnChrName: （ふむ……こ奴らの雇い主か。   斑鳩は崑崙で見え、気になっておったが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ふむ……こ奴らの雇い主か。
斑鳩は崑崙で見え、気になっておったが……）

engChrName: (In Marduk's case, the contract formed with the president's administration should still be valid.)
engSearchText:
(In Marduk's case, the contract formed with the
president's administration should still be valid.)
jpnChrName: （ＭＫ社は……先日バーゼルに介入した際の   大統領府との契約は今も有効と思いますが……）
jpnSearchText:
（ＭＫ社は……先日バーゼルに介入した際の
大統領府との契約は今も有効と思いますが……）

engChrName: (I'm still not clear on why these guys jumped into the fray here.)
engSearchText:
(I'm still not clear on why these guys jumped into the
fray here.)
jpnChrName: （……こいつらがどういう意図でこの悪魔のゲームに   介入しているのかは知らねぇが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……こいつらがどういう意図でこの悪魔のゲームに
介入しているのかは知らねぇが……）

engChrName: (But at least they won't be gettin' in our way.)
engSearchText: (But at least they won't be gettin' in our way.)
jpnChrName: （少なくとも、俺達がケリをつける事に問題は   無いはずだ、今は先に進もう。）
jpnSearchText:
（少なくとも、俺達がケリをつける事に問題は
無いはずだ、今は先に進もう。）

engChrName: I have chosen to do things differently from the Kruga.
engSearchText: I have chosen to do things differently from the Kruga.
jpnChrName: ……少なくとも、今の俺はクルガとは 違う流儀に身を置いて戦っている。
jpnSearchText:
……少なくとも、今の俺はクルガとは
違う流儀に身を置いて戦っている。

engChrName: I do not expect you to understand why—just that you accept it.
engSearchText:
I do not expect you to understand why—just that you
accept it.
jpnChrName: 変な期待はしない事だな。
jpnSearchText: 変な期待はしない事だな。

engChrName: Leon and I will retrieve those artifacts if it's the last thing we do. We'll make ya proud, Master.
engSearchText:
Leon and I will retrieve those artifacts if it's the last
thing we do. We'll make ya proud, Master.
jpnChrName: 連中が悪用してやがる古代遺物に関しちゃ、 アタシらが先生の期待に応える。
jpnSearchText:
連中が悪用してやがる古代遺物に関しちゃ、
アタシらが先生の期待に応える。

engChrName: By the way, I'm still not huge on you teamin' up with these guys—especially your unofficial disciple.
engSearchText:
By the way, I'm still not huge on you teamin' up with
these guys—especially your unofficial disciple.
jpnChrName: だが……今、先生は胡散臭いテメェらに 身を委ねてるってワケだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが……今、先生は胡散臭いテメェらに
身を委ねてるってワケだ。

engChrName: Speakin' of, you better not disappoint Master in any way—or your ass is mine!
engSearchText:
Speakin' of, you better not disappoint Master in any
way—or your ass is mine!
jpnChrName: 裏弟子とは言え……先生を失望させたら こっちもただじゃおかねぇからな？
jpnSearchText:
裏弟子とは言え……先生を失望させたら
こっちもただじゃおかねぇからな？

engChrName: You do not have the power to fight back against artifacts, so I suggest you be careful.
engSearchText:
You do not have the power to fight back against
artifacts, so I suggest you be careful.
jpnChrName: 僕達のように古代遺物に対抗する力を 持たない貴方たちには危険もあるでしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
僕達のように古代遺物に対抗する力を
持たない貴方たちには危険もあるでしょうが……

engChrName: You're lucky you have Master with you. He may have lost his Stigma, but he has years of experience in dealing with artifacts.
engSearchText:
You're lucky you have Master with you. He may have
lost his Stigma, but he has years of experience in
dealing with artifacts.
jpnChrName: 聖痕を失ったと言えど、長年にわたって古代遺物と 相対してきた先生の見地は必ず力になるはずです。
jpnSearchText:
聖痕を失ったと言えど、長年にわたって古代遺物と
相対してきた先生の見地は必ず力になるはずです。

engChrName: He will no doubt be a great help to you all. Though I do wish he was accompanying us instead.
engSearchText:
He will no doubt be a great help to you all. Though I
do wish he was accompanying us instead.
jpnChrName: 今回はこちらに同行していただけないのが 少々残念なほどですよ。
jpnSearchText:
今回はこちらに同行していただけないのが
少々残念なほどですよ。

engChrName: We meet again.
engSearchText: We meet again.
jpnChrName: ……貴殿らか。
jpnSearchText: ……貴殿らか。

engChrName: We'll be keeping an eye on that heretic. If he continues along his treacherous path, he will inevitably receive judgment.
engSearchText:
We'll be keeping an eye on that heretic. If he
continues along his treacherous path, he will
inevitably receive judgment.
jpnChrName: あの“外法”はこのまま進めば然るべき 裁きを受ける事になるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
あの“外法”はこのまま進めば然るべき
裁きを受ける事になるだろう。

engChrName: For now, though, our work here is finished.
engSearchText: For now, though, our work here is finished.
jpnChrName: 引導を渡したのも身内、 これに関しては我らの出る幕は終わった。
jpnSearchText:
引導を渡したのも身内、
これに関しては我らの出る幕は終わった。

engChrName: So you're still branding him a heretic, huh?
engSearchText: So you're still branding him a heretic, huh?
jpnChrName: ……あの外法、ね。
jpnSearchText: ……あの外法、ね。

engChrName: Well, for now, we've all got bigger fish to fry, and that's Almata.
engSearchText:
Well, for now, we've all got bigger fish to fry, and
that's Almata.
jpnChrName: まあ、アルマータの連中は 変わらず狙うんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アルマータの連中は
変わらず狙うんだろうが……

engChrName: I know you've received orders to hunt down heretics in this land, but I cannot imagine that's your only objective here.
engSearchText:
I know you've received orders to hunt down heretics
in this land, but I cannot imagine that's your only
objective here.
jpnChrName: ……おぬしらがこの地において、外法を 狩る命を帯びている事、それに偽りは無いだろう。
jpnSearchText:
……おぬしらがこの地において、外法を
狩る命を帯びている事、それに偽りは無いだろう。

engChrName: Going by the Papal Guard's actions in recent years, I'd wager they sent you here for another reason.
engSearchText:
Going by the Papal Guard's actions in recent years,
I'd wager they sent you here for another reason.
jpnChrName: だが……近年の僧兵庁の動きからして、 共和国での活動はそれだけでも無かろう？
jpnSearchText:
だが……近年の僧兵庁の動きからして、
共和国での活動はそれだけでも無かろう？

engChrName: It seems I can't hide anything from you, Master.
engSearchText: It seems I can't hide anything from you, Master.
jpnChrName: ……流石は我が師。 そこに切り込むか……
jpnSearchText:
……流石は我が師。
そこに切り込むか……

engChrName: Uhh. Can someone fill me in here?
engSearchText: Uhh. Can someone fill me in here?
jpnChrName: ……アルマータ以外の狙いがあると？
jpnSearchText: ……アルマータ以外の狙いがあると？

engChrName: Sorry. I had planned to explain this to you when I had the chance. Ever since the Papal Guard's leader was replaced, these people have—
engSearchText:
Sorry. I had planned to explain this to you when I had
the chance. Ever since the Papal Guard's leader was
replaced, these people have—
jpnChrName: ああ、機を見て詳しくはヴァンにも 伝えるつもりではあったが……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、機を見て詳しくはヴァンにも
伝えるつもりではあったが……

engChrName: Actually, we may need to save this for later. This isn't the best place to discuss this.
engSearchText:
Actually, we may need to save this for later. This isn't
the best place to discuss this.
jpnChrName: 僧兵庁の長が代替わりして以来、この者らも── いや、この場で言う事ではあるまい。
jpnSearchText:
僧兵庁の長が代替わりして以来、この者らも──
いや、この場で言う事ではあるまい。

engChrName: Regardless, we have no choice but to remain here until the situation is under control.
engSearchText:
Regardless, we have no choice but to remain here
until the situation is under control.
jpnChrName: ……いずれにせよ、私もこの沙汰が終わるまで この地に留まる事に変わりはない。
jpnSearchText:
……いずれにせよ、私もこの沙汰が終わるまで
この地に留まる事に変わりはない。

engChrName: You're the only ones who can hunt the remaining heretics. I'll be interested to see if you can pull this off.
engSearchText:
You're the only ones who can hunt the
remaining heretics. I'll be interested to see if you can
pull this off.
jpnChrName: 一つ、後顧の憂いが絶たれたと思い、 かの外法に挑まれよ、こちらも見届けよう。
jpnSearchText:
一つ、後顧の憂いが絶たれたと思い、
かの外法に挑まれよ、こちらも見届けよう。

engChrName: Oh, we'll pull it off all right. No ifs, ands, or buts about that.
engSearchText:
Oh, we'll pull it off all right. No ifs, ands, or buts
about that.
jpnChrName: ハッ……あんたに心配される筋合いはねぇが。 せいぜい、代わりに外法を叩きのめしてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……あんたに心配される筋合いはねぇが。
せいぜい、代わりに外法を叩きのめしてやるよ。

engChrName: You may have Master Barkhorn with you, but that doesn't mean victory will be assured. Far from it.
engSearchText:
You may have Master Barkhorn with you, but that
doesn't mean victory will be assured. Far from it.
jpnChrName: バルクホルン師父が同行するとは言え、 一筋縄ではいかぬ外法が相手。
jpnSearchText:
バルクホルン師父が同行するとは言え、
一筋縄ではいかぬ外法が相手。

engChrName: Should you fail, we will be prepared to take action. But let's hope it doesn't come to that.
engSearchText:
Should you fail, we will be prepared to take action.
But let's hope it doesn't come to that.
jpnChrName: 我らもいざとなれば動けるよう備えるが…… そちらも、心してかかる事だ。
jpnSearchText:
我らもいざとなれば動けるよう備えるが……
そちらも、心してかかる事だ。

engChrName: (Am I crazy, or is this guy actually worried about us? I heard Elaine got him to back down earlier. Is he secretly a softie or somethin'?)
engSearchText:
(Am I crazy, or is this guy actually worried about us?
I heard Elaine got him to back down earlier. Is he
secretly a softie or somethin'?)
jpnChrName: （……普通に俺達を案じているのか？   エレインの意も汲んで退いたとも聞くが……）
jpnSearchText:
（……普通に俺達を案じているのか？
エレインの意も汲んで退いたとも聞くが……）

engChrName: (No, he's just a reasonable man who is honest with his feelings. I wouldn't read too deeply into it.)
engSearchText:
(No, he's just a reasonable man who is honest with
his feelings. I wouldn't read too deeply into it.)
jpnChrName: （──アシュラッド自身は、実直で筋を通す男だ。   彼自身を穿って見過ぎる事もあるまい。）
jpnSearchText:
（──アシュラッド自身は、実直で筋を通す男だ。
彼自身を穿って見過ぎる事もあるまい。）

engChrName: (However, his superior is another story entirely.)
engSearchText: (However, his superior is another story entirely.)
jpnChrName: （もっとも──その背後にいる人物は──）
jpnSearchText: （もっとも──その背後にいる人物は──）

engChrName: I saw Marielle just a second ago. She was leading a group of kids over this way.
engSearchText:
I saw Marielle just a second ago. She was leading a
group of kids over this way.
jpnChrName: 先ほど、あのマリエルという記者が 子供達を連れているのを見たが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほど、あのマリエルという記者が
子供達を連れているのを見たが……

engChrName: I think I have a vague idea of what they're trying to do...
engSearchText:
I think I have a vague idea of what they're trying
to do...
jpnChrName: あちらの方向にあるのは……ふう、 “イベント”の内容は何となく察していたが。
jpnSearchText:
あちらの方向にあるのは……ふう、
“イベント”の内容は何となく察していたが。

engChrName: Well, the kids seemed like they were enjoying themselves. I don't think I have any reason to worry.
engSearchText:
Well, the kids seemed like they were
enjoying themselves. I don't think I have any reason
to worry.
jpnChrName: まあ……子供達も喜んでいるようだし、 彼女も何か事情がありそうだったし……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……子供達も喜んでいるようだし、
彼女も何か事情がありそうだったし……

engChrName: I don't know the details, but I'm sure this is for the best.
engSearchText:
I don't know the details, but I'm sure this is for
the best.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、詳しい事は分からないが きっとこれで良かったのだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、詳しい事は分からないが
きっとこれで良かったのだろうな。

engChrName: The higher ups are totally going to be pissed about me acting without their permission, but I don't care.
engSearchText:
The higher ups are totally going to be pissed about
me acting without their permission, but I don't care.
jpnChrName: 上司には勝手な行動を怒られそうだが、 今回の選択に悔いはないよ。
jpnSearchText:
上司には勝手な行動を怒られそうだが、
今回の選択に悔いはないよ。

engChrName: Marielle taught me that it's our jobs to use information to help people.
engSearchText:
Marielle taught me that it's our jobs to use
information to help people.
jpnChrName: あの子は僕に、記者として情報で多くの人を 動かせるという事を教えてくれたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
あの子は僕に、記者として情報で多くの人を
動かせるという事を教えてくれたんだ。

engChrName: So regardless of how things turn out, I have no regrets.
engSearchText:
So regardless of how things turn out, I have
no regrets.
jpnChrName: まあ、結果はどうあれ、後悔はするまいさ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、結果はどうあれ、後悔はするまいさ。

engChrName: Well, I did it. I spread the information over the net and in the Royal Guardian like that girl asked.
engSearchText:
Well, I did it. I spread the information over the net
and in the Royal Guardian like that girl asked.
jpnChrName: ……あの子に言われた通り、 ＲＧ朝刊とネットに噂を流したは良いが……
jpnSearchText:
……あの子に言われた通り、
ＲＧ朝刊とネットに噂を流したは良いが……

engChrName: But I'm, uh, a little worried about me getting in trouble. This whole thing seems to be blowing up.
engSearchText:
But I'm, uh, a little worried about me getting
in trouble. This whole thing seems to be blowing up.
jpnChrName: 我ながら大丈夫なのかコレは……想像以上に 盛り上がらせてしまったというか……
jpnSearchText:
我ながら大丈夫なのかコレは……想像以上に
盛り上がらせてしまったというか……

engChrName: The editor-in-chief is going to have my hide for this later...but eh. Who cares?
engSearchText:
The editor-in-chief is going to have my hide for this
later...but eh. Who cares?
jpnChrName: ……編集長に後で絞られそうだが……いや、 これも一応は僕が選んでやった事だ。
jpnSearchText:
……編集長に後で絞られそうだが……いや、
これも一応は僕が選んでやった事だ。

engChrName: I made this choice because I thought it was the right thing to do. Even if I get reprimanded, I won't regret it.
engSearchText:
I made this choice because I thought it was the right
thing to do. Even if I get reprimanded, I won't
regret it.
jpnChrName: どういう結果になれど、筋は通さねば ならないだろうな……
jpnSearchText:
どういう結果になれど、筋は通さねば
ならないだろうな……

engChrName: I can't remember the last time I was moved to do something by sheer passion.
engSearchText:
I can't remember the last time I was moved to do
something by sheer passion.
jpnChrName: 思えば、あんな熱意に押されて何かをやるのは 久しぶりだったかもしれんな……
jpnSearchText:
思えば、あんな熱意に押されて何かをやるのは
久しぶりだったかもしれんな……

engChrName: I got my job at the Royal Guardian through connections, and since then, well...I think I've been on autopilot for the most part.
engSearchText:
I got my job at the Royal Guardian through
connections, and since then, well...I think I've been
on autopilot for the most part.
jpnChrName: 縁故でＲＧに入社してからは……正直、 惰性で記者をしていた気もするしな。
jpnSearchText:
縁故でＲＧに入社してからは……正直、
惰性で記者をしていた気もするしな。

engChrName: So I'm happy that I can do something that I feel strongly about. And hey, if it ends up having an impact, then that's all the better.
engSearchText:
So I'm happy that I can do something that I feel
strongly about. And hey, if it ends up having an
impact, then that's all the better.
jpnChrName: 記者らしく自分で動いて、何か影響を持てるなら…… 今回の件も経験としては無駄にはならないか。
jpnSearchText:
記者らしく自分で動いて、何か影響を持てるなら……
今回の件も経験としては無駄にはならないか。

engChrName: Urgh... I can't believe President Auclair and President Daltie were arrested...
engSearchText:
Urgh... I can't believe President Auclair and President
Daltie were arrested...
jpnChrName: くっ……よもやオークレール氏とダルティエ氏の 両方が逮捕されてしまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……よもやオークレール氏とダルティエ氏の
両方が逮捕されてしまうとは……

engChrName: But it's fine. There are still many who sympathize with our cause—and they will no doubt be willing to fund us!
engSearchText:
But it's fine. There are still many who sympathize
with our cause—and they will no doubt be willing to
fund us!
jpnChrName: ……まあ良い、思想に共鳴する者もミラを 出してくれる者もまだ十分に残っていよう！
jpnSearchText:
……まあ良い、思想に共鳴する者もミラを
出してくれる者もまだ十分に残っていよう！

engChrName: It will be difficult to operate in Oración for a time, but we WILL have the last laugh!
engSearchText:
It will be difficult to operate in Oración for a time,
but we WILL have the last laugh!
jpnChrName: 当分オラシオンでは動きにくいだろうが…… 他で立て直す事など訳もないハズ……！
jpnSearchText:
当分オラシオンでは動きにくいだろうが……
他で立て直す事など訳もないハズ……！

engChrName: I've just confirmed that the top dogs of the guild and our young friends have entered the scene.
engSearchText:
I've just confirmed that the top dogs of the guild and
our young friends have entered the scene.
jpnChrName: フフ、ギルドの方々に “彼ら”も到着したようですね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ギルドの方々に
“彼ら”も到着したようですね。

engChrName: We are still in the process of gathering intelligence on the enemy, but once our analysis is complete, I will be counting on you to do your part—Yin.
engSearchText:
We are still in the process of gathering intelligence on
the enemy, but once our analysis is complete, I will be
counting on you to do your part—Yin.
jpnChrName: それでは勢力状況を確認しだい、 宜しくお願いしますよ──《銀》殿？
jpnSearchText:
それでは勢力状況を確認しだい、
宜しくお願いしますよ──《銀》殿？

engChrName: Naturally. Just so we are clear, though, I'm not a part of Heiyue—and I'm not doing this for you.
engSearchText:
Naturally. Just so we are clear, though, I'm not a part
of Heiyue—and I'm not doing this for you.
jpnChrName: ええ…… ですが《黒月（あなた方）》のためではありません。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……
ですが《黒月（あなた方）》のためではありません。

engChrName: However, I agree that we must do something about that weapon. It's a threat not only to the people of Calvard, but to the rest of the world as well.
engSearchText:
However, I agree that we must do something about
that weapon. It's a threat not only to the people of
Calvard, but to the rest of the world as well.
jpnChrName: あれだけの非人道兵器──もはや 共和国だけの問題ではないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
あれだけの非人道兵器──もはや
共和国だけの問題ではないでしょう。

engChrName: And I will do everything within my power to protect both my former home and my new one.
engSearchText:
And I will do everything within my power to protect
both my former home and my new one.
jpnChrName: かつての故郷と、今の故郷のためにも── 私なりの道を貫かせてもらいます。
jpnSearchText:
かつての故郷と、今の故郷のためにも──
私なりの道を貫かせてもらいます。
……………………………

engChrName: Well, damn. Guess the so-called 'strongest guy who ever lived' is joinin' the fun.
engSearchText:
Well, damn. Guess the so-called 'strongest guy who
ever lived' is joinin' the fun.
jpnChrName: ハッ、噂の“史上最強”も エントリーしたみてーだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、噂の“史上最強”も
エントリーしたみてーだな。

engChrName: Indeed. And it appears our 'friends' from our very own shadow legion are here as well.
engSearchText:
Indeed. And it appears our 'friends' from our very
own shadow legion are here as well.
jpnChrName: ええ──それに我らが親愛なる “裏執行人”の方々もですか。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──それに我らが親愛なる
“裏執行人”の方々もですか。
……………………………

engChrName: Later that night, 12:20AM
engSearchText: Later that night, 12:20AM

engChrName: (I knew it. This lines up perfectly with my own research into the company's cash flow.)
engSearchText:
(I knew it. This lines up perfectly with my own
research into the company's cash flow.)
jpnChrName: （……やっぱり、間違いない。   調べたミラの流れとも一致する。）
jpnSearchText:
（……やっぱり、間違いない。
調べたミラの流れとも一致する。）

engChrName: (Which means it's time to spring my plan into action.)
engSearchText:
(Which means it's time to spring my plan
into action.)
jpnChrName: （………だったら、私のやるべきことは………）
jpnSearchText: （………だったら、私のやるべきことは………）

engChrName: So this is the famous Quincy Department Store.
engSearchText: So this is the famous Quincy Department Store.
jpnChrName: ここは……有名な 《クインシー百貨店》みたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ここは……有名な
《クインシー百貨店》みたいですね。

engChrName: I feel like I've heard that name before...
engSearchText: I feel like I've heard that name before...
jpnChrName: くいんしー…… どこかで聞いたことがあるような。
jpnSearchText:
くいんしー……
どこかで聞いたことがあるような。

engChrName: That's hardly surprising. The Quincy Bell brand is known throughout the world.
engSearchText:
That's hardly surprising. The Quincy Bell brand is
known throughout the world.
jpnChrName: 大陸全土で展開している 《クインシーベル》のお菓子でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
大陸全土で展開している
《クインシーベル》のお菓子でしょう。

engChrName: They are most commonly known as the Quincy Company, and this just happens to be their main headquarters.
engSearchText:
They are most commonly known as the Quincy
Company, and this just happens to be their
main headquarters.
jpnChrName: こちらは大陸有数の製菓会社、 クインシー社の本社も兼ねているとか。
jpnSearchText:
こちらは大陸有数の製菓会社、
クインシー社の本社も兼ねているとか。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! I've had their chocolate before.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! I've had their chocolate before.
jpnChrName: あ、そういえばよく見かけますね！
jpnSearchText: あ、そういえばよく見かけますね！

engChrName: Yes, I recall giving you some back in Basel.
engSearchText: Yes, I recall giving you some back in Basel.
jpnChrName: うん、前にバーゼルでも みんなにお茶請けで出したかな。
jpnSearchText:
うん、前にバーゼルでも
みんなにお茶請けで出したかな。

engChrName: You must be hyped to be here.
engSearchText: You must be hyped to be here.
jpnChrName: 菓子ブランドの聖地ってヤツか。 さぞテンション上がるんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
菓子ブランドの聖地ってヤツか。
さぞテンション上がるんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Quincy's stuff ain't half bad, I'll admit, but everything in their lineup is too damn expensive.
engSearchText:
Quincy's stuff ain't half bad, I'll admit, but everything
in their lineup is too damn expensive.
jpnChrName: ま、クインシーベルは鉄板だが クインシーの生菓子は敷居が高くてな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、クインシーベルは鉄板だが
クインシーの生菓子は敷居が高くてな。

engChrName: Costs way more than it's worth.
engSearchText: Costs way more than it's worth.
jpnChrName: 高級ショコラとか品質は確かなんだが あまりにコスパ悪すぎっつーか。
jpnSearchText:
高級ショコラとか品質は確かなんだが
あまりにコスパ悪すぎっつーか。

engChrName: True enough. Though you can't deny it makes for a great gift.
engSearchText:
True enough. Though you can't deny it makes for a
great gift.
jpnChrName: まあ、確かに。 贈答品とかだと鉄板なんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、確かに。
贈答品とかだと鉄板なんだけど。

engChrName: Your car will be here in a moment, sir.
engSearchText: Your car will be here in a moment, sir.
jpnChrName: お車、すぐに参ります。
jpnSearchText: お車、すぐに参ります。

engChrName: What's my schedule for today?
engSearchText: What's my schedule for today?
jpnChrName: ──うむ。 今日の予定はどうなっているかね？
jpnSearchText:
──うむ。
今日の予定はどうなっているかね？

engChrName: Our first stop will be at ETWS' offices—
engSearchText: Our first stop will be at ETWS' offices—
jpnChrName: ええ、この後はエトワス社で──
jpnSearchText: ええ、この後はエトワス社で──

engChrName: (Who's that?)
engSearchText: (Who's that?)
jpnChrName: （あの人は……？）
jpnSearchText: （あの人は……？）

engChrName: (He looks like an important person.)
engSearchText: (He looks like an important person.)
jpnChrName: （役員の方みたいですけど……）
jpnSearchText: （役員の方みたいですけど……）

engChrName: (His name's Edmond Auclair.)
engSearchText: (His name's Edmond Auclair.)
jpnChrName: （……エドモン・オークレール。）
jpnSearchText: （……エドモン・オークレール。）

engChrName: (He's the CEO of the Quincy Company and head of Oración's most well-known family.)
engSearchText:
(He's the CEO of the Quincy Company and head of
Oración's most well-known family.)
jpnChrName: （クインシー社のＣＥＯにして   オラシオンきっての名家の当主だな。）
jpnSearchText:
（クインシー社のＣＥＯにして
オラシオンきっての名家の当主だな。）

engChrName: (...What?)
engSearchText: (...What?)

engChrName: (Auclair? Wait, isn't that...)
engSearchText: (Auclair? Wait, isn't that...)
jpnChrName: （オークレールっていやぁ……）
jpnSearchText: （オークレールっていやぁ……）
……？

engChrName: Is something the matter, sir?
engSearchText: Is something the matter, sir?
jpnChrName: 社長、いかがしました？
jpnSearchText: 社長、いかがしました？

engChrName: (...Must be my imagination.) Nothing. Let's be off.
engSearchText:
(...Must be my imagination.)
Nothing. Let's be off.
jpnChrName: （……気のせいか。） ──いや、出してくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
（……気のせいか。）
──いや、出してくれたまえ。

engChrName: So that was Elaine's dad?
engSearchText: So that was Elaine's dad?
jpnChrName: まさかエレインさんのお父さん（アブ）……！？ そういえば髪と目の色が同じですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかエレインさんのお父さん（アブ）……！？
そういえば髪と目の色が同じですねっ。

engChrName: Wait, so she's the daughter of the Quincy Company's president?
engSearchText:
Wait, so she's the daughter of the Quincy
Company's president?
jpnChrName: って、あの人って クインシー社のご令嬢なの！？
jpnSearchText:
って、あの人って
クインシー社のご令嬢なの！？

engChrName: Sure sounds that way. I do remember seeing that in the papers at some point.
engSearchText:
Sure sounds that way. I do remember seeing that in
the papers at some point.
jpnChrName: 確かそうだったんじゃない？ 前に雑誌で読んだことがあったけど。
jpnSearchText:
確かそうだったんじゃない？
前に雑誌で読んだことがあったけど。

engChrName: It's not like it's a secret or anything.
engSearchText: It's not like it's a secret or anything.
jpnChrName: ああ、別に秘密ってわけじゃねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、別に秘密ってわけじゃねぇな。

engChrName: Though Elaine and her dad never acknowledge it publicly.
engSearchText:
Though Elaine and her dad never acknowledge
it publicly.
jpnChrName: エレインも、親父さんの方も 大っぴらにはしてねぇみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
エレインも、親父さんの方も
大っぴらにはしてねぇみたいだが。

engChrName: I see...
engSearchText: I see...
jpnChrName: そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうなんですか……

engChrName: Oh, are you acquainted with him, by any chance?
engSearchText: Oh, are you acquainted with him, by any chance?
jpnChrName: あ、エレインさんのお父さんなら ヴァンさんも面識が……？
jpnSearchText:
あ、エレインさんのお父さんなら
ヴァンさんも面識が……？

engChrName: Not really. I might've met him a long time ago, but I can't say I remember doin' it.
engSearchText:
Not really. I might've met him a long time ago, but I
can't say I remember doin' it.
jpnChrName: さて──あったとしても大昔だし お互いロクに覚えちゃいないだろう。
jpnSearchText:
さて──あったとしても大昔だし
お互いロクに覚えちゃいないだろう。

engChrName: Either way, I doubt he's got any idea what his daughter's up to.
engSearchText:
Either way, I doubt he's got any idea what his
daughter's up to.
jpnChrName: ……とりあえずあの調子だと あいつの状況も知らなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
……とりあえずあの調子だと
あいつの状況も知らなさそうだな。

engChrName: Might not even know she's home. I wouldn't put that past him.
engSearchText:
Might not even know she's home. I wouldn't put that
past him.
jpnChrName: それどころか仕事で里帰りしてるのも 気付いてない可能性も高そうだ。
jpnSearchText:
それどころか仕事で里帰りしてるのも
気付いてない可能性も高そうだ。

engChrName: R-Really? That's a little sad...
engSearchText: R-Really? That's a little sad...
jpnChrName: そ、そんな……
jpnSearchText: そ、そんな……

engChrName: Anyway, let's check out what they've got in stock here.
engSearchText:
Anyway, let's check out what they've got in
stock here.
jpnChrName: ま、セレブ社長は置いといて 品揃えだけは見ておくか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、セレブ社長は置いといて
品揃えだけは見ておくか。

engChrName: We should also drop by the equipment stores, too.
engSearchText: We should also drop by the equipment stores, too.
jpnChrName: 昔ながらの武器商会もあるから 色々役に立つかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
昔ながらの武器商会もあるから
色々役に立つかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: Agreed. This is a good opportunity to stock up.
engSearchText: Agreed. This is a good opportunity to stock up.
jpnChrName: ふむ──それでは見てみるか。
jpnSearchText: ふむ──それでは見てみるか。

engChrName: Moments before...
engSearchText: Moments before...
jpnChrName: 少し前──
jpnSearchText: <C1>少し前──

engChrName: Wh-Who the hell are you?! How did you get past security?!
engSearchText:
Wh-Who the hell are you?! How did you get
past security?!
jpnChrName: だ、誰だお前は……！ 警備は何をしている！？
jpnSearchText:
だ、誰だお前は……！
警備は何をしている！？

engChrName: They are taking a nap outside. You needn't worry about them.
engSearchText:
They are taking a nap outside. You needn't worry
about them.
jpnChrName: 外で眠って貰っている。 そちらの心配は不要だ。
jpnSearchText:
外で眠って貰っている。
そちらの心配は不要だ。

engChrName: Edmond Auclair. I hereby brand you a heretic.
engSearchText: Edmond Auclair. I hereby brand you a heretic.
jpnChrName: ──エドモン・オークレール。 貴殿を“外法”と認定する。
jpnSearchText:
──エドモン・オークレール。
貴殿を“外法”と認定する。

engChrName: What?! O-Oh, no. They warned me about you...
engSearchText: What?! O-Oh, no. They warned me about you...
jpnChrName: ！？ ま、まさか奴らが言っていた……
jpnSearchText:
！？
ま、まさか奴らが言っていた……

engChrName: That wasn't my doing, I swear! I didn't—
engSearchText: That wasn't my doing, I swear! I didn't—
jpnChrName: 私じゃない、あれは私じゃ──！
jpnSearchText: 私じゃない、あれは私じゃ──！

engChrName: Whether you confess or not is of no consequence. You will atone for your crimes with your life.
engSearchText:
Whether you confess or not is of no consequence.
You will atone for your crimes with your life.
jpnChrName: 最早語るに及ばず── “断罪”を執行させてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
最早語るに及ばず──
“断罪”を執行させてもらう。

engChrName: E-Elaine?!
engSearchText: E-Elaine?!
jpnChrName: エ、エレインッ！？
jpnSearchText: エ、エレインッ！？

engChrName: It has been some time, Father. I never pictured our reunion being under such dire circumstances.
engSearchText:
It has been some time, Father. I never pictured our
reunion being under such dire circumstances.
jpnChrName: ……お久しぶりです、お父様。 こんな再会になるとは思いませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
……お久しぶりです、お父様。
こんな再会になるとは思いませんでしたが。

engChrName: Well met, Elaine Auclair. I considered the possibility of you interfering with your father's execution.
engSearchText:
Well met, Elaine Auclair. I considered the possibility
of you interfering with your father's execution.
jpnChrName: Ａ級遊撃士、エレイン・オークレール。 娘の貴殿が邪魔をする可能性は考えていた。
jpnSearchText:
Ａ級遊撃士、エレイン・オークレール。
娘の貴殿が邪魔をする可能性は考えていた。

engChrName: You are a fool to do so, however. Had you known of his myriad crimes, you would not have rushed to defend this trash.
engSearchText:
You are a fool to do so, however. Had you known of
his myriad crimes, you would not have rushed to
defend this trash.
jpnChrName: だが愚かなものだ…… 父親が何をやってきたのかも知らずに。
jpnSearchText:
だが愚かなものだ……
父親が何をやってきたのかも知らずに。

engChrName: D-Don't listen to a word he's saying! This ruffian is merely trying to deceive you! He must be a petty crook—
engSearchText:
D-Don't listen to a word he's saying! This ruffian is
merely trying to deceive you! He must be a petty
crook—
jpnChrName: そ、そいつの言葉に耳を貸すな！ きっと頭のおかしい強盗か何かで──
jpnSearchText:
そ、そいつの言葉に耳を貸すな！
きっと頭のおかしい強盗か何かで──

engChrName: That's enough, Father. I know everything.
engSearchText: That's enough, Father. I know everything.
jpnChrName: もういいんです、お父様。 ……既に全て知っていますから。
jpnSearchText:
もういいんです、お父様。
……既に全て知っていますから。

engChrName: I learned that the anti-immigrant movement has been financially backing Almata over the last few years...
engSearchText:
I learned that the anti-immigrant movement has been
financially backing Almata over the last few years...
jpnChrName: アルマータに資金提供し、数年前から 彼らの活動を支援してきた反移民主義団体。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータに資金提供し、数年前から
彼らの活動を支援してきた反移民主義団体。

engChrName: ...and that you were responsible for that decision. You also happen to be their biggest sponsor.
engSearchText:
...and that you were responsible for that decision.
You also happen to be their biggest sponsor.
jpnChrName: その最大のスポンサーでありフィクサー── それが貴方、エドモン・オークレールだと。
jpnSearchText:
その最大のスポンサーでありフィクサー──
それが貴方、エドモン・オークレールだと。

engChrName: I-I haven't the slightest idea—
engSearchText: I-I haven't the slightest idea—
jpnChrName: い、一体、何のことだっ……！？
jpnSearchText: い、一体、何のことだっ……！？

engChrName: As soon as I caught wind of the ties between Almata and the anti-immigrant groups, you immediately came to mind.
engSearchText:
As soon as I caught wind of the ties between Almata
and the anti-immigrant groups, you immediately
came to mind.
jpnChrName: ……アルマータと反移民主義の繋がりが 浮上した時、真っ先に貴方の顔が浮かんだわ。
jpnSearchText:
……アルマータと反移民主義の繋がりが
浮上した時、真っ先に貴方の顔が浮かんだわ。

engChrName: You have the wealth of the Quincy Company at your fingertips, possess deep political ties, and live in a city close to Messeldam.
engSearchText:
You have the wealth of the Quincy Company at your
fingertips, possess deep political ties, and live in a city
close to Messeldam.
jpnChrName: クインシー社の資金力、政財界への太いパイプ、 メッセルダムの近さ──全ての条件が揃っていた。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー社の資金力、政財界への太いパイプ、
メッセルダムの近さ──全ての条件が揃っていた。

engChrName: And above all, your all-consuming obsession with Calvard's long-lost nobility drove you to discriminate against those of unknown origin...
engSearchText:
And above all, your all-consuming obsession with
Calvard's long-lost nobility drove you to discriminate
against those of unknown origin...
jpnChrName: 何よりとっくに失われた“カルバード貴族”の誇りを 妄信的に信じ、出自が分からない人間を差別して……
jpnSearchText:
何よりとっくに失われた“カルバード貴族”の誇りを
妄信的に信じ、出自が分からない人間を差別して……

engChrName: ...which is precisely why—all those years ago—you took my dear friend away from me. All because he fit that description.
engSearchText:
...which is precisely why—all those years ago—you
took my dear friend away from me. All because he fit
that description.
jpnChrName: ……まだ子供だった“彼”を裏から 手を回して遠くに追いやるような人なら、と。
jpnSearchText:
……まだ子供だった“彼”を裏から
手を回して遠くに追いやるような人なら、と。

engChrName: I-I think this is all just one big misunderstanding... And you're still not over that boy?
engSearchText:
I-I think this is all just one big misunderstanding...
And you're still not over that boy?
jpnChrName: そ、それは…… それにお前、まだあの小僧の事を……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは……
それにお前、まだあの小僧の事を……

engChrName: You see this? It's a record of all your hidden financial accounts and transactions. I obtained this by making a deal with your 'business partners.'
engSearchText:
You see this? It's a record of all your hidden financial
accounts and transactions. I obtained this by making
a deal with your 'business partners.'
jpnChrName: ──彼らとの“取引”で入手した裏帳簿よ。
jpnSearchText: ──彼らとの“取引”で入手した裏帳簿よ。

engChrName: This is unequivocal proof that Almata received its funding from the Quincy Company, ETWS, and others.
engSearchText:
This is unequivocal proof that Almata received its
funding from the Quincy Company, ETWS,
and others.
jpnChrName: クインシー社やエトワス社から受け取った “裏金”の流れが詳細に記されている。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー社やエトワス社から受け取った
“裏金”の流れが詳細に記されている。

engChrName: I ran this by a trustworthy source, and they confirmed the contents are genuine.
engSearchText:
I ran this by a trustworthy source, and they confirmed
the contents are genuine.
jpnChrName: 偽造ではない正真正銘の本物── 頼りになる協力者から“裏”も取ってある。
jpnSearchText:
偽造ではない正真正銘の本物──
頼りになる協力者から“裏”も取ってある。

engChrName: I also made a fascinating discovery from this. In addition to your regular contributions, you provided extra funding for one of their projects:
engSearchText:
I also made a fascinating discovery from this.
In addition to your regular contributions, you
provided extra funding for one of their projects:
jpnChrName: これによると、数年に渡る資金提供の他に、 ある目的への特別援助も記載されているわ。
jpnSearchText:
これによると、数年に渡る資金提供の他に、
ある目的への特別援助も記載されているわ。

engChrName: The creation of a revolutionary weapon—one with unprecedented destructive capabilities.
engSearchText:
The creation of a revolutionary weapon—one with
unprecedented destructive capabilities.
jpnChrName: 『今までの通常兵器の常識を遙かに超える、   画期的な新兵器への投資』っていう、ね。
jpnSearchText:
『今までの通常兵器の常識を遙かに超える、
画期的な新兵器への投資』っていう、ね。

engChrName: This... This is ludicrous! You have it all wrong!
engSearchText: This... This is ludicrous! You have it all wrong!
jpnChrName: う……あ…… ご、誤解だっ……デタラメだっ……！！
jpnSearchText:
う……あ……
ご、誤解だっ……デタラメだっ……！！

engChrName: I have been suspicious of you ever since my days at the academy.
engSearchText:
I have been suspicious of you ever since my days at
the academy.
jpnChrName: ……私が疑いを持ち始めたのは学生時代。
jpnSearchText: ……私が疑いを持ち始めたのは学生時代。

engChrName: I wanted to believe my doubts were unfounded. That was part of why I became a bracer in the first place.
engSearchText:
I wanted to believe my doubts were unfounded.
That was part of why I became a bracer in the
first place.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士を目指した理由の半分は、 貴方への私自身の疑念を晴らしたかったから。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士を目指した理由の半分は、
貴方への私自身の疑念を晴らしたかったから。

engChrName: But as I delved headlong into my investigation, my suspicions only seemed to grow.
engSearchText:
But as I delved headlong into my investigation, my
suspicions only seemed to grow.
jpnChrName: でも片手間に調べれば調べるほど 怪しいとしか思えなくなってしまって……
jpnSearchText:
でも片手間に調べれば調べるほど
怪しいとしか思えなくなってしまって……

engChrName: I scoured to find conclusive evidence, and all the while, your actions led to more crimes, chief among them being the attack on the trade conference.
engSearchText:
I scoured to find conclusive evidence, and all the
while, your actions led to more crimes, chief among
them being the attack on the trade conference.
jpnChrName: それでも決定的な証拠は掴めぬうちに、 通商会議のテロや、各地の事件が起きて……
jpnSearchText:
それでも決定的な証拠は掴めぬうちに、
通商会議のテロや、各地の事件が起きて……

engChrName: ...That is, until the unthinkable catastrophe that befell Creil.
engSearchText:
...That is, until the unthinkable catastrophe that
befell Creil.
jpnChrName: よりにもよってクレイユ村が…… ……あんな事に、なってしまった………
jpnSearchText:
よりにもよってクレイユ村が……
……あんな事に、なってしまった………

engChrName: Elaine...
engSearchText: Elaine...

engChrName: I am here to put an end to it all. You will face justice at the hands of your own daughter.
engSearchText:
I am here to put an end to it all. You will face justice
at the hands of your own daughter.
jpnChrName: だから──ケジメは付けるわ。 他でもない、娘である私の手で。
jpnSearchText:
だから──ケジメは付けるわ。
他でもない、娘である私の手で。

engChrName: And I will ask that you back down. Ensuring that he pays the price for his crimes is my responsibility, and I won't allow you to steal that from me.
engSearchText:
And I will ask that you back down. Ensuring that he
pays the price for his crimes is my responsibility, and I
won't allow you to steal that from me.
jpnChrName: 横から入ってきた“外野”なんかに その役目を渡すつもりはない。
jpnSearchText:
横から入ってきた“外野”なんかに
その役目を渡すつもりはない。

engChrName: Very well. Your resolve is firm.
engSearchText: Very well. Your resolve is firm.
jpnChrName: ………覚悟はできているようだな。
jpnSearchText: ………覚悟はできているようだな。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?

engChrName: Iscariot's true purpose is to punish the criminals who are beyond the reach of the law.
engSearchText:
Iscariot's true purpose is to punish the criminals who
are beyond the reach of the law.
jpnChrName: 法で裁けぬ者を《外法》として裁くのが 我ら《イスカリオ》だ。
jpnSearchText:
法で裁けぬ者を《外法》として裁くのが
我ら《イスカリオ》だ。

engChrName: If you are able to expose his crimes and see that he is punished for them, we have no reason to interfere.
engSearchText:
If you are able to expose his crimes and see that he is
punished for them, we have no reason to interfere.
jpnChrName: だが、貴殿がしかと明るみにし、 裁くのであれば沙汰も必要あるまい。
jpnSearchText:
だが、貴殿がしかと明るみにし、
裁くのであれば沙汰も必要あるまい。

engChrName: ...You are more understanding than I would have expected.
engSearchText:
...You are more understanding than I would
have expected.
jpnChrName: ……どうやら弁えた人みたいね。
jpnSearchText: ……どうやら弁えた人みたいね。

engChrName: Th-This can't be... Don't do it, Elaine!
engSearchText: Th-This can't be... Don't do it, Elaine!
jpnChrName: ば、馬鹿な……よせエレイン！
jpnSearchText: ば、馬鹿な……よせエレイン！

engChrName: I am not here to kill you. I'm simply going to take you into custody and hand you over to the capital police.
engSearchText:
I am not here to kill you. I'm simply going to take you
into custody and hand you over to the capital police.
jpnChrName: 斬るわけじゃない…… 貴方を拘束した上で首都警察に引き渡す。
jpnSearchText:
斬るわけじゃない……
貴方を拘束した上で首都警察に引き渡す。

engChrName: I have already tendered my resignation. This will be my final job as a bracer.
engSearchText:
I have already tendered my resignation. This will be
my final job as a bracer.
jpnChrName: 既に辞表は出した──最後の仕事として 貴方に引導を渡してから遊撃士を辞める。
jpnSearchText:
既に辞表は出した──最後の仕事として
貴方に引導を渡してから遊撃士を辞める。

engChrName: Do not think you can suppress my evidence. It will hold firm.
engSearchText:
Do not think you can suppress my evidence. It will
hold firm.
jpnChrName: 貴方がどんな手段で揉み消そうとしても 叶わないほどの確たる証言と証拠をもって。
jpnSearchText:
貴方がどんな手段で揉み消そうとしても
叶わないほどの確たる証言と証拠をもって。

engChrName: How can you do this to me? You of all people should understand exactly what I'm trying to do here!
engSearchText:
How can you do this to me? You of all people should
understand exactly what I'm trying to do here!
jpnChrName: っ……どうしてだ、 どうして分かってくれない！？
jpnSearchText:
っ……どうしてだ、
どうして分かってくれない！？

engChrName: The blood of the marquises of the past flows through House Auclair... It is noble and pure!
engSearchText:
The blood of the marquises of the past flows through
House Auclair... It is noble and pure!
jpnChrName: お前には子供の頃から教えていたはずだ、 オークレール侯爵家の血筋としての誇りを！
jpnSearchText:
お前には子供の頃から教えていたはずだ、
オークレール侯爵家の血筋としての誇りを！

engChrName: Everything I've done...is all for the purpose of righting the wrongs of that foolish revolution. I only want to take back what is rightly ours!
engSearchText:
Everything I've done...is all for the purpose of
righting the wrongs of that foolish revolution. I only
want to take back what is rightly ours!
jpnChrName: 全ては百年前の愚かな革命によって 失われた誇りを、今の世に取り戻すため──
jpnSearchText:
全ては百年前の愚かな革命によって
失われた誇りを、今の世に取り戻すため──

engChrName: Why would you seek to obstruct such a righteous goal?!
engSearchText:
Why would you seek to obstruct such a
righteous goal?!
jpnChrName: その崇高なる使命をなぜ理解できないっ！？
jpnSearchText: その崇高なる使命をなぜ理解できないっ！？

engChrName: What a pitiful man.
engSearchText: What a pitiful man.
jpnChrName: 愚にもつかぬ妄執──度し難いな。
jpnSearchText: 愚にもつかぬ妄執──度し難いな。

engChrName: ...Just tell me one thing.
engSearchText: ...Just tell me one thing.
jpnChrName: ……一つ、聞かせて。
jpnSearchText: ……一つ、聞かせて。

engChrName: Did you know about Almata's plans to destroy Creil?
engSearchText: Did you know about Almata's plans to destroy Creil?
jpnChrName: お父様は……貴方は知っていたの？ クレイユ村がああなってしまうことを。
jpnSearchText:
お父様は……貴方は知っていたの？
クレイユ村がああなってしまうことを。

engChrName: And also...were you privy to the danger that is being thrust upon the people of Oración?
engSearchText:
And also...were you privy to the danger that is being
