thrust upon the people of Oración?
jpnChrName: この街が──オラシオンの人たちが 大変なことになってしまう危機についても。
jpnSearchText:
この街が──オラシオンの人たちが
大変なことになってしまう危機についても。

engChrName: I swear I knew nothing about Creil! They only told me their plan after the fact!
engSearchText:
I swear I knew nothing about Creil! They only told
me their plan after the fact!
jpnChrName: だから知らなかったんだああっ！ 奴らから聞いたのも全て事件後でっ……！
jpnSearchText:
だから知らなかったんだああっ！
奴らから聞いたのも全て事件後でっ……！

engChrName: W-Wait... Did you say...Oración is in peril? This is the first I'm hearing of this!
engSearchText:
W-Wait... Did you say...Oración is in peril? This is
the first I'm hearing of this!
jpnChrName: そ、それにオラシオンが大変にって── 知らんぞ、一体どういう事なんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
そ、それにオラシオンが大変にって──
知らんぞ、一体どういう事なんだ！？

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ……
jpnSearchText: ふむ……

engChrName: I expected as much. Regardless, you can fill us in on everything you know at the guild—
engSearchText:
I expected as much. Regardless, you can fill us in on
everything you know at the guild—
jpnChrName: ……そんな事だろうとは思ったけど。 詳しい話は、まずはギルドで──
jpnSearchText:
……そんな事だろうとは思ったけど。
詳しい話は、まずはギルドで──

engChrName: Ahaha! I LOVE a juicy family drama!
engSearchText: Ahaha! I LOVE a juicy family drama!
jpnChrName: アハハ、愉しそうな話をしてるね？
jpnSearchText: アハハ、愉しそうな話をしてるね？

engChrName: If it isn't the overseers of the Gardens.
engSearchText: If it isn't the overseers of the Gardens.
jpnChrName: ……《庭園》の者か。
jpnSearchText: ……《庭園》の者か。

engChrName: Nice to see ya, vice captain.
engSearchText: Nice to see ya, vice captain.
jpnChrName: よう、剣の姉さんに、 教会の副兵長さんだったか。
jpnSearchText:
よう、剣の姉さんに、
教会の副兵長さんだったか。

engChrName: Normally, I would not care about what you choose to do on the surface now that you're out of the game. Out of sight and out of mind.
engSearchText:
Normally, I would not care about what you choose to
do on the surface now that you're out of the game.
Out of sight and out of mind.
jpnChrName: フフ、脱落したキミたちが 地上で何しようと知ったことじゃないけど。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、脱落したキミたちが
地上で何しようと知ったことじゃないけど。

engChrName: However, I couldn't help but notice you harassing our poor sponsor. Did you stumble upon evidence that incriminates him, perhaps?
engSearchText:
However, I couldn't help but notice you harassing our
poor sponsor. Did you stumble upon evidence that
incriminates him, perhaps?
jpnChrName: 僕らのスポンサーをイジめてるなんてねぇ。 ……何か良い証拠でも掴んだかい？
jpnSearchText:
僕らのスポンサーをイジめてるなんてねぇ。
……何か良い証拠でも掴んだかい？

engChrName: You have some nerve.
engSearchText: You have some nerve.
jpnChrName: 抜け抜けと……！
jpnSearchText: 抜け抜けと……！

engChrName: O-Oh, thank goodness. Your timing is impeccable, Melchior!
engSearchText:
O-Oh, thank goodness. Your timing is
impeccable, Melchior!
jpnChrName: よ、よく来てくれたメルキオル君！
jpnSearchText: よ、よく来てくれたメルキオル君！

engChrName: Finish off this intruder posthaste! Elaine is to be placed under house arrest effective immediately—but don't harm her!
engSearchText:
Finish off this intruder posthaste! Elaine is to be
placed under house arrest effective immediately—but
don't harm her!
jpnChrName: その男をすぐに始末しろ！ エレインは拘束して軟禁する……！
jpnSearchText:
その男をすぐに始末しろ！
エレインは拘束して軟禁する……！

engChrName: Father!
engSearchText: Father!
jpnChrName: っ……お父様……！
jpnSearchText: っ……お父様……！

engChrName: Witless fool...
engSearchText: Witless fool...

engChrName: *sigh* This wasn't on my agenda for today, but very well. However, I hope you know I don't believe in half-measures.
engSearchText:
*sigh* This wasn't on my agenda for today, but
very well. However, I hope you know I don't believe
in half-measures.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、予定外だけど仕方ない。 ──ただし中途半端はしない主義でね❤
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、予定外だけど仕方ない。
──ただし中途半端はしない主義でね❤

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: くっ……！
jpnSearchText: くっ……！

engChrName: Wh-What are you doing?!
engSearchText: Wh-What are you doing?!
jpnChrName: なっ、何をしている！？
jpnSearchText: なっ、何をしている！？

engChrName: Ahaha! I may be part of the mafia now, but I was once in a group of assassins, I'll have you know!
engSearchText:
Ahaha! I may be part of the mafia now, but I was
once in a group of assassins, I'll have you know!
jpnChrName: アハハ、僕はマフィアでもあるけど 暗殺組織のメンバーでもあるからねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、僕はマフィアでもあるけど
暗殺組織のメンバーでもあるからねぇ！

engChrName: If I see a chance to kill, I will not hesitate to act on it. I cannot resist my primal instincts! ♪
engSearchText:
If I see a chance to kill, I will not hesitate to act on it.
I cannot resist my primal instincts! ♪
jpnChrName: 殺れそうなら殺る──それがモットーなのさ♪
jpnSearchText: 殺れそうなら殺る──それがモットーなのさ♪

engChrName: You might've got one over me earlier, but I won't make the same mistake twice. I'm not goin' easy on you just 'cause you're tired.
engSearchText:
You might've got one over me earlier, but I won't
make the same mistake twice. I'm not goin' easy on
you just 'cause you're tired.
jpnChrName: さっき地下で出し抜かれたのもある、 疲れてそうだが容赦するつもりはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
さっき地下で出し抜かれたのもある、
疲れてそうだが容赦するつもりはねぇ。

engChrName: I'm gonna tear ya limb from limb!
engSearchText: I'm gonna tear ya limb from limb!
jpnChrName: さあ、副兵長共々殺り合おうぜ──！
jpnSearchText: さあ、副兵長共々殺り合おうぜ──！

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: くっ……
jpnSearchText: くっ……

engChrName: I won't let anyone interfere with my mission. I will bring my father to justice, and there's nothing you can do to stop me!
engSearchText:
I won't let anyone interfere with my mission. I will
bring my father to justice, and there's nothing you can
do to stop me!
jpnChrName: 邪魔させない── このけじめだけは、絶対に……！
jpnSearchText:
邪魔させない──
このけじめだけは、絶対に……！

engChrName: I wouldn't be so sure of that, if I were you. ♪
engSearchText: I wouldn't be so sure of that, if I were you. ♪
jpnChrName: 残念、もうチェックメイトさ♪
jpnSearchText: 残念、もうチェックメイトさ♪

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレインッ……！
jpnSearchText: エレインッ……！

engChrName: Father?!
engSearchText: Father?!
jpnChrName: お父様……！？
jpnSearchText: お父様……！？

engChrName: Hraaaaaah!
engSearchText: Hraaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ──おおおおっ！！
jpnSearchText: ──おおおおっ！！

engChrName: Wh-What's going on?
engSearchText: Wh-What's going on?
jpnChrName: こ、この状況は……
jpnSearchText: こ、この状況は……

engChrName: I don't know, but it doesn't look good.
engSearchText: I don't know, but it doesn't look good.
jpnChrName: かなりヤバい場面みたいだね。
jpnSearchText: かなりヤバい場面みたいだね。

engChrName: You all right, Elaine?!
engSearchText: You all right, Elaine?!
jpnChrName: ──エレイン、大丈夫か！？
jpnSearchText: ──エレイン、大丈夫か！？

engChrName: Van! Zin, Fie!
engSearchText: Van! Zin, Fie!
jpnChrName: ヴァン……！？ ジンさんにフィーも………
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン……！？
ジンさんにフィーも………

engChrName: Looks like we got here just in the nick of time.
engSearchText: Looks like we got here just in the nick of time.
jpnChrName: ふう、どうやら 間一髪の状況だったみたいだな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、どうやら
間一髪の状況だったみたいだな。

engChrName: I-I remember you. I saw you last night.
engSearchText: I-I remember you. I saw you last night.
jpnChrName: き、君は昨夜も見かけた……
jpnSearchText: き、君は昨夜も見かけた……

engChrName: Wait. That hair looks...familiar. Have we met before?
engSearchText: Wait. That hair looks...familiar. Have we met before?
jpnChrName: ……いや、その髪の色、 どこかで見覚えがあるような……
jpnSearchText:
……いや、その髪の色、
どこかで見覚えがあるような……

engChrName: I've never seen you before in my life. You sure you're not gettin' me mixed up with someone else?
engSearchText:
I've never seen you before in my life. You sure you're
not gettin' me mixed up with someone else?
jpnChrName: ……なんの事だ？ こっちには覚えなんざねえが。
jpnSearchText:
……なんの事だ？
こっちには覚えなんざねえが。

engChrName: Well now! What a twist!
engSearchText: Well now! What a twist!
jpnChrName: アハハ、まさかの展開だね！
jpnSearchText: アハハ、まさかの展開だね！

engChrName: Though it isn't a welcome one. Now was the perfect time to bring down the curtain on the president's life.
engSearchText:
Though it isn't a welcome one. Now was the perfect
time to bring down the curtain on the president's life.
jpnChrName: 元々社長も始末するつもりだったし ちょうどいいところだったのにさ！
jpnSearchText:
元々社長も始末するつもりだったし
ちょうどいいところだったのにさ！

engChrName: Wh-What?!
engSearchText: Wh-What?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだと！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだと！？

engChrName: Oh, don't act so surprised. Anyone with half a brain would have realized the boss had no interest in your silly anti-immigrant cause.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't act so surprised. Anyone with half a brain
would have realized the boss had no interest in your
silly anti-immigrant cause.
jpnChrName: フフ、ボスは最初から君たちの 反移民活動なんかに興味はないのさ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ボスは最初から君たちの
反移民活動なんかに興味はないのさ。

engChrName: We smiled and nodded so you would line our pockets, but we have no need for money anymore. You have outlived your usefulness.
engSearchText:
We smiled and nodded so you would line our
pockets, but we have no need for money anymore.
You have outlived your usefulness.
jpnChrName: もうスポンサーも必要なくなった── 最終フェーズ前の掃除に来ただけでね。
jpnSearchText:
もうスポンサーも必要なくなった──
最終フェーズ前の掃除に来ただけでね。

engChrName: No wonder you were so quick to hand over those records.
engSearchText:
No wonder you were so quick to hand over
those records.
jpnChrName: ……フェイクなしの裏帳簿を あっさりと渡すと思ったら……！
jpnSearchText:
……フェイクなしの裏帳簿を
あっさりと渡すと思ったら……！

engChrName: Th-This can't be happening...
engSearchText: Th-This can't be happening...
jpnChrName: ……そ、そんな……
jpnSearchText: ……そ、そんな……

engChrName: Gah!
engSearchText: Gah!
jpnChrName: ぐはっ……！
jpnSearchText: ぐはっ……！

engChrName: F-Father!
engSearchText: F-Father!
jpnChrName: お、お父様……！？
jpnSearchText: お、お父様……！？

engChrName: E-Elaine...
engSearchText: E-Elaine...
jpnChrName: ……エ、エレイン……
jpnSearchText: ……エ、エレイン……

engChrName: Well now! What a twist!
engSearchText: Well now! What a twist!
jpnChrName: アハハ、まさかの展開だね！
jpnSearchText: アハハ、まさかの展開だね！

engChrName: Although, we were planning to bring down the curtain on your life anyway.
engSearchText:
Although, we were planning to bring down the
curtain on your life anyway.
jpnChrName: ま、貴方も始末するつもりだったし ちょうどよかったかな？
jpnSearchText:
ま、貴方も始末するつもりだったし
ちょうどよかったかな？

engChrName: Aww, don't act so surprised. Anyone with half a brain would've realized the boss had no interest in your silly anti-immigrant cause.
engSearchText:
Aww, don't act so surprised. Anyone with half a brain
would've realized the boss had no interest in your
silly anti-immigrant cause.
jpnChrName: アハハ、ボスは最初から君たちの 反移民活動なんかに興味はないのさ！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、ボスは最初から君たちの
反移民活動なんかに興味はないのさ！

engChrName: We smiled and nodded so you would line our pockets, but we have no need for money anymore. You have outlived your usefulness.
engSearchText:
We smiled and nodded so you would line our
pockets, but we have no need for money anymore.
You have outlived your usefulness.
jpnChrName: もうスポンサーも必要なくなった── 最終フェーズ前の掃除に来ただけでねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
もうスポンサーも必要なくなった──
最終フェーズ前の掃除に来ただけでねぇ！

engChrName: No wonder you were so quick to hand over those records.
engSearchText:
No wonder you were so quick to hand over
those records.
jpnChrName: ……フェイクなしの裏帳簿を あっさりと渡すと思ったら……！
jpnSearchText:
……フェイクなしの裏帳簿を
あっさりと渡すと思ったら……！

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Elaine... I don't know how...I could have been so blind.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry, Elaine... I don't know how...I could have
been so blind.
jpnChrName: ……エレイン、すまない…… ………私が愚かだったようだ…………
jpnSearchText:
……エレイン、すまない……
………私が愚かだったようだ…………

engChrName: Please believe me when I say that you—
engSearchText: Please believe me when I say that you—
jpnChrName: だがこれだけは信じて欲しい…… ……私は、お前を──
jpnSearchText:
だがこれだけは信じて欲しい……
……私は、お前を──

engChrName: Father!
engSearchText: Father!
jpnChrName: お父様っ……！！
jpnSearchText: お父様っ……！！

engChrName: Hraaaaaah!
engSearchText: Hraaaaaah!
jpnChrName: ──うおおおおっ！
jpnSearchText: ──うおおおおっ！

engChrName: You all right, Elaine?!
engSearchText: You all right, Elaine?!
jpnChrName: エレイン、大丈夫か！？
jpnSearchText: エレイン、大丈夫か！？

engChrName: Van... Zin, Fie...
engSearchText: Van... Zin, Fie...
jpnChrName: ………ヴァン……… ジンさんにフィーも……
jpnSearchText:
………ヴァン………
ジンさんにフィーも……

engChrName: Wh-What's going on?
engSearchText: Wh-What's going on?
jpnChrName: こ、この状況は……
jpnSearchText: こ、この状況は……

engChrName: I don't know, but it doesn't look good.
engSearchText: I don't know, but it doesn't look good.
jpnChrName: かなりヤバい場面みたいだね。
jpnSearchText: かなりヤバい場面みたいだね。

engChrName: Yeah. Looks like we were a few moments too late.
engSearchText: Yeah. Looks like we were a few moments too late.
jpnChrName: ああ…… どうやら一歩遅かったようだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
どうやら一歩遅かったようだ。

engChrName: We need to administer first aid right away!
engSearchText: We need to administer first aid right away!
jpnChrName: すぐ応急処置を……！
jpnSearchText: すぐ応急処置を……！

engChrName: (Damn it. If only I hadn't made the wrong call...)
engSearchText: (Damn it. If only I hadn't made the wrong call...)
jpnChrName: （クソ、あの時、   読み違えなければ……！）
jpnSearchText:
（クソ、あの時、
読み違えなければ……！）

engChrName: Heh. I never expected to see so many lovely faces here—especially with the final round on the horizon.
engSearchText:
Heh. I never expected to see so many lovely faces
here—especially with the final round on the horizon.
jpnChrName: フフ、しかしまさか君たちが来るとはねぇ。 これから最終フェーズも控えてるってのに。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、しかしまさか君たちが来るとはねぇ。
これから最終フェーズも控えてるってのに。

engChrName: Is the wait so unbearable? Are you bored? Well, I am, too. How about we entertain each other for a little while!
engSearchText:
Is the wait so unbearable? Are you bored? Well, I
am, too. How about we entertain each other for a
little while!
jpnChrName: こうなったらボスの前に“味見”するしか なくなっちゃうじゃないかァ！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったらボスの前に“味見”するしか
なくなっちゃうじゃないかァ！

engChrName: Fine by me. I'm gonna enjoy kicking your ass!
engSearchText: Fine by me. I'm gonna enjoy kicking your ass!
jpnChrName: 抜かしやがれ……！
jpnSearchText: 抜かしやがれ……！

engChrName: We won't lose to you!
engSearchText: We won't lose to you!
jpnChrName: 迎え撃つまで、です！
jpnSearchText: 迎え撃つまで、です！

engChrName: We won't let you have your way any longer!
engSearchText: We won't let you have your way any longer!
jpnChrName: これ以上の勝手は許さない……！
jpnSearchText: これ以上の勝手は許さない……！

engChrName: I'll take on the vice captain and the bracers.
engSearchText: I'll take on the vice captain and the bracers.
jpnChrName: クク、なら俺は副兵長殿と 遊撃士共に相手してもらおうか……
jpnSearchText:
クク、なら俺は副兵長殿と
遊撃士共に相手してもらおうか……

engChrName: This'll be a nice warmup before the final round!
engSearchText: This'll be a nice warmup before the final round!
jpnChrName: 最終フェーズ前の肩慣らしだ── 存分に愉しませて貰うぜ！！
jpnSearchText:
最終フェーズ前の肩慣らしだ──
存分に愉しませて貰うぜ！！

engChrName: You were marked a heretic long ago—and now it is finally time to put you down!
engSearchText:
You were marked a heretic long ago—and now it is
finally time to put you down!
jpnChrName: 認定済みの《外法》── 相手にとって不足はない！
jpnSearchText:
認定済みの《外法》──
相手にとって不足はない！

engChrName: On your feet, Elaine!
engSearchText: On your feet, Elaine!
jpnChrName: ──立て、エレイン！
jpnSearchText: ──立て、エレイン！

engChrName: Your dad's gonna be fine—he's still breathing! So stand up! Don't you wanna see this thing through?!
engSearchText:
Your dad's gonna be fine—he's still breathing!
So stand up! Don't you wanna see this
thing through?!
jpnChrName: 親父さんはまだ息がある！ てめぇでケリをつけたいんだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
親父さんはまだ息がある！
てめぇでケリをつけたいんだろう！？

engChrName: Elaine! Let's do this!
engSearchText: Elaine! Let's do this!
jpnChrName: ──行くぞ、エレイン！
jpnSearchText: ──行くぞ、エレイン！

engChrName: We'll talk about you runnin' off on your own later! You ready to see this thing through?!
engSearchText:
We'll talk about you runnin' off on your own later!
You ready to see this thing through?!
jpnChrName: 独断専行については後だ！ てめぇでケリをつけたいんだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
独断専行については後だ！
てめぇでケリをつけたいんだろう！？

engChrName: Of course!
engSearchText: Of course!
jpnChrName: ……分かったわ……！
jpnSearchText: ……分かったわ……！

engChrName: Then let's get this exhibition match started! It'll be the perfect prelude to the big finale!
engSearchText:
Then let's get this exhibition match started! It'll be
the perfect prelude to the big finale!
jpnChrName: アハハ、それじゃあ始めようか！ 決戦前のエキシビジョンマッチを！
jpnSearchText:
アハハ、それじゃあ始めようか！
決戦前のエキシビジョンマッチを！

engChrName: Don't go dropping dead on me now, or the boss will be VERY disappointed!
engSearchText:
Don't go dropping dead on me now, or the boss will
be VERY disappointed!
jpnChrName: こんな所でゲームオーバーになって ボスをガッカリさせないでよね！
jpnSearchText:
こんな所でゲームオーバーになって
ボスをガッカリさせないでよね！

engChrName: Select the first of the two characters who will fight alongside Van and Elaine.
engSearchText:
Select the first of the two characters who will fight
alongside Van and Elaine.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・エレインと共に戦うメンバーを選択します。 １人目のメンバーを選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・エレインと共に戦うメンバーを選択します。
１人目のメンバーを選んで下さい。

engChrName: Select the second of the two characters who will fight alongside Van and Elaine.
engSearchText:
Select the second of the two characters who will fight
alongside Van and Elaine.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・エレインと共に戦うメンバーを選択します。 ２人目のメンバーを選んで下さい。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・エレインと共に戦うメンバーを選択します。
２人目のメンバーを選んで下さい。

engChrName: Ugh!
engSearchText: Ugh!
jpnChrName: くっ……！
jpnSearchText: くっ……！

engChrName: Elaine!
engSearchText: Elaine!
jpnChrName: エレイン……！！
jpnSearchText: エレイン……！！

engChrName: ...Ahaha! Impressive! Very impressive!
engSearchText: ...Ahaha! Impressive! Very impressive!
jpnChrName: っ……アハハ、さすがだね剣の乙女！ 裏解決屋も！
jpnSearchText:
っ……アハハ、さすがだね剣の乙女！
裏解決屋も！

engChrName: Heh. You guys aren't half bad.
engSearchText: Heh. You guys aren't half bad.
jpnChrName: クハハ、副兵長に 遊撃士共もやるじゃねえか……！
jpnSearchText:
クハハ、副兵長に
遊撃士共もやるじゃねえか……！

engChrName: Gah... We just can't get the upper hand against him.
engSearchText: Gah... We just can't get the upper hand against him.
jpnChrName: ちいっ……押し切れんか。
jpnSearchText: ちいっ……押し切れんか。

engChrName: (Master. The artifact he wields...)
engSearchText: (Master. The artifact he wields...)
jpnChrName: （師よ、この古代遺物は……）
jpnSearchText: （師よ、この古代遺物は……）

engChrName: (Yes, my thinking is the same.)
engSearchText: (Yes, my thinking is the same.)
jpnChrName: （うむ、おそらくは……）
jpnSearchText: （うむ、おそらくは……）

engChrName: Everyone! We are out of time!
engSearchText: Everyone! We are out of time!
jpnChrName: ……！ 皆様、潮時のようです。
jpnSearchText:
……！
皆様、潮時のようです。

engChrName: Oh, dear. We may have overdone it a smidgen.
engSearchText: Oh, dear. We may have overdone it a smidgen.
jpnChrName: とと、こんな街中のビルで 派手にやりすぎちゃったかな？
jpnSearchText:
とと、こんな街中のビルで
派手にやりすぎちゃったかな？

engChrName: If the police learn of our plans, they'll blab them to everyone, and the boss wouldn't like that. He wants to keep a tight lid on spoilers.
engSearchText:
If the police learn of our plans, they'll blab them to
everyone, and the boss wouldn't like that. He wants
to keep a tight lid on spoilers.
jpnChrName: 万が一にでもゲームの詳細が漏れたら ここへきて全てドカン──！！
jpnSearchText:
万が一にでもゲームの詳細が漏れたら
ここへきて全てドカン──！！

engChrName: Although, I'd love to see droves of panic-stricken civilians toppling over each other and screaming for mercy. It sounds like a perfect ending to me!
engSearchText:
Although, I'd love to see droves of panic-stricken
civilians toppling over each other and screaming
for mercy. It sounds like a perfect ending to me!
jpnChrName: なんて結末も面白そうだけど、 流石にボスが許してくれないかなぁ？
jpnSearchText:
なんて結末も面白そうだけど、
流石にボスが許してくれないかなぁ？

engChrName: You foul fiend!
engSearchText: You foul fiend!
jpnChrName: ッ……ふざけるな……！
jpnSearchText: ッ……ふざけるな……！

engChrName: You're a monster.
engSearchText: You're a monster.

engChrName: I hope you burn in hell, you son of a bitch.
engSearchText: I hope you burn in hell, you son of a bitch.
jpnChrName: ……クソ野郎が。
jpnSearchText: ……クソ野郎が。

engChrName: We gotta hightail it outta here. I've still got a part to play in the game.
engSearchText:
We gotta hightail it outta here. I've still got a part to
play in the game.
jpnChrName: ま、ここらが引き際ってヤツだろう。 俺の出番も残っているしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ここらが引き際ってヤツだろう。
俺の出番も残っているしな。

engChrName: What?! Don't run away, you coward!
engSearchText: What?! Don't run away, you coward!
jpnChrName: ちょっと、逃げるつもり！？
jpnSearchText: ちょっと、逃げるつもり！？

engChrName: *sigh* Our mission ended in failure... Though we did get something nice out of the exchange.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Our mission ended in failure... Though we did
get something nice out of the exchange.
jpnChrName: ま、仕事も失敗しちゃったし いいのを貰っちゃったからね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、仕事も失敗しちゃったし
いいのを貰っちゃったからね。

engChrName: How about we call this one a draw?
engSearchText: How about we call this one a draw?
jpnChrName: 剣の乙女との痛み分けで 手打ちってことにさせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
剣の乙女との痛み分けで
手打ちってことにさせてもらうよ。

engChrName: Be a doll and tell the president 'thanks for everything' for me—assuming he manages to make it back from death's door, of course. ❤
engSearchText:
Be a doll and tell the president 'thanks for everything'
for me—assuming he manages to make it back from
death's door, of course. ❤
jpnChrName: 社長が生きてたら伝言ヨロシク。 今までお疲れ様でしたってさ❤
jpnSearchText:
社長が生きてたら伝言ヨロシク。
今までお疲れ様でしたってさ❤

engChrName: Thanks for everything, Mr. President. We couldn't have done any of this without you. Farewell, now! ❤
engSearchText:
Thanks for everything, Mr. President. We couldn't
have done any of this without you. Farewell, now! ❤
jpnChrName: ──それじゃあ社長、 今までお疲れ様でした❤
jpnSearchText:
──それじゃあ社長、
今までお疲れ様でした❤

engChrName: To tell you the truth, I'm pretty damn happy you guys're the ones who'll be challenging us in the palace.
engSearchText:
To tell you the truth, I'm pretty damn happy you
guys're the ones who'll be challenging us in
the palace.
jpnChrName: 正直、お前さんたちが最終フェーズへの 切符を手に入れてくれて嬉しいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、お前さんたちが最終フェーズへの
切符を手に入れてくれて嬉しいぜ。

engChrName: Wish it was three o'clock already. The anticipation's killing me here...
engSearchText:
Wish it was three o'clock already. The anticipation's
killing me here...
jpnChrName: あと一、二時間が待ち遠しくてたまらねぇ── 悔いのねぇよう万全の準備を整えて来いよ？
jpnSearchText:
あと一、二時間が待ち遠しくてたまらねぇ──
悔いのねぇよう万全の準備を整えて来いよ？

engChrName: But the wait'll be worth it. See you guys soon!
engSearchText: But the wait'll be worth it. See you guys soon!
jpnChrName: それじゃあな……！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあな……！

engChrName: We finally got rid of them. For now, at least.
engSearchText: We finally got rid of them. For now, at least.
jpnChrName: ……行った、みたいだね。
jpnSearchText: ……行った、みたいだね。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnChrName: ああ……なんとかな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……なんとかな。

engChrName: Father!
engSearchText: Father!
jpnChrName: お父様……！
jpnSearchText: お父様……！

engChrName: He still has a pulse, but his vitals are dropping rapidly.
engSearchText: He still has a pulse, but his vitals are dropping rapidly.
jpnChrName: まだ脈はありますが、 バイタルが低下し続けています。
jpnSearchText:
まだ脈はありますが、
バイタルが低下し続けています。

engChrName: We need to get him to a hospital ASAP!
engSearchText: We need to get him to a hospital ASAP!
jpnChrName: 一刻も早く病院に……！
jpnSearchText: 一刻も早く病院に……！

engChrName: Before long, an ambulance arrived on the scene and took Edmond Auclair to the hospital.
engSearchText:
Before long, an ambulance arrived on the scene and
took Edmond Auclair to the hospital.
jpnChrName: その後、駆け付けてきた救急車によって エドモン社長は病院へと運び込まれ──
jpnSearchText:
その後、駆け付けてきた救急車によって
エドモン社長は病院へと運び込まれ──

engChrName: Emergency surgery was successful, but his condition remained critical, which meant he would not be regaining consciousness anytime soon.
engSearchText:
Emergency surgery was successful, but his condition
remained critical, which meant he would not be
regaining consciousness anytime soon.
jpnChrName: 緊急手術を受けて何とか危機は脱したものの、 重態でしばらく意識は戻らないとのことだった。
jpnSearchText:
緊急手術を受けて何とか危機は脱したものの、
重態でしばらく意識は戻らないとのことだった。

engChrName: After that, Elaine delivered all of the evidence she had to the authorities.
engSearchText:
After that, Elaine delivered all of the evidence she
had to the authorities.
jpnChrName: エレインは、掴んだエドモンとアルマータの 繋がりを示す証拠を現地警察とＣＩＤに渡し……
jpnSearchText:
エレインは、掴んだエドモンとアルマータの
繋がりを示す証拠を現地警察とＣＩＤに渡し……

engChrName: Edmond was then charged with aiding and abetting the mafia and providing material support to a terrorist organization—and placed under house arrest.
engSearchText:
Edmond was then charged with aiding and abetting
the mafia and providing material support to a terrorist
organization—and placed under house arrest.
jpnChrName: エドモンはマフィアの活動幇助、テロ関与の疑いで 意識不明のまま逮捕されることになるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
エドモンはマフィアの活動幇助、テロ関与の疑いで
意識不明のまま逮捕されることになるのだった。
……………………………

engChrName: ...We'll leave the rest to you.
engSearchText: ...We'll leave the rest to you.
jpnChrName: ……ここからはお前の役目だ。
jpnSearchText: ……ここからはお前の役目だ。

engChrName: ...Right.
engSearchText: ...Right.
jpnChrName: ……ええ。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ。

engChrName: I'm so sorry, Elaine... I don't know how...I could have been so blind.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry, Elaine... I don't know how...I could have
been so blind.
jpnChrName: ……エレイン、すまない…… ………私が愚かだったようだ…………
jpnSearchText:
……エレイン、すまない……
………私が愚かだったようだ…………

engChrName: But...please believe me when I say that... When I say that—
engSearchText:
But...please believe me when I say that...
When I say that—
jpnChrName: だがこれだけは信じて欲しい…… ……私は、お前を──
jpnSearchText:
だがこれだけは信じて欲しい……
……私は、お前を──

engChrName: Representative Director of the Quincy Company, President Edmond Auclair...
engSearchText:
Representative Director of the Quincy Company,
President Edmond Auclair...
jpnChrName: クインシー社代表取締役、 エドモン・オークレール社長。
jpnSearchText:
クインシー社代表取締役、
エドモン・オークレール社長。

engChrName: I am taking you into custody on suspicion of aiding and abetting the mafia and providing material support to a terrorist organization.
engSearchText:
I am taking you into custody on suspicion of aiding
and abetting the mafia and providing material
support to a terrorist organization.
jpnChrName: マフィアの活動幇助、テロ関与の疑いで 貴方を確保させていただきます──
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの活動幇助、テロ関与の疑いで
貴方を確保させていただきます──

engChrName: Soon after, police arrived on the scene, and after concisely explaining the situation, Van contacted the CID.
engSearchText:
Soon after, police arrived on the scene, and after
concisely explaining the situation, Van contacted
the CID.
jpnChrName: その後、駆け付けてきた警官たちに 状況を誤魔化しつつ現地ＣＩＤに連絡した。
jpnSearchText:
その後、駆け付けてきた警官たちに
状況を誤魔化しつつ現地ＣＩＤに連絡した。

engChrName: After that, Elaine delivered all of the evidence she had to the authorities.
engSearchText:
After that, Elaine delivered all of the evidence she
had to the authorities.
jpnChrName: エレインは、掴んだエドモンとアルマータの 繋がりを示す証拠を現地警察とＣＩＤに渡し……
jpnSearchText:
エレインは、掴んだエドモンとアルマータの
繋がりを示す証拠を現地警察とＣＩＤに渡し……

engChrName: As a result, Edmond and his accomplices were placed under arrest.
engSearchText:
As a result, Edmond and his accomplices were placed
under arrest.
jpnChrName: エドモンはマフィアの活動幇助、テロ関与の疑いで 他の関係者と共に逮捕されることになるのだった。
jpnSearchText:
エドモンはマフィアの活動幇助、テロ関与の疑いで
他の関係者と共に逮捕されることになるのだった。

engChrName: This whole thing has gotta be trying for her, but I get the feeling she'll be okay.
engSearchText:
This whole thing has gotta be trying for her, but I get
the feeling she'll be okay.
jpnChrName: ……きっと大丈夫よね、彼女なら。
jpnSearchText: ……きっと大丈夫よね、彼女なら。

engChrName: Yeah. She's made of sterner stuff. One way or another, she'll make it through.
engSearchText:
Yeah. She's made of sterner stuff. One way or
another, she'll make it through.
jpnChrName: ああ──あれで芯の強いヤツだ。 どう転んでも、もう大丈夫だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──あれで芯の強いヤツだ。
どう転んでも、もう大丈夫だろう。

engChrName: I was worried there for a moment, but I think it turned out all right in the end.
engSearchText:
I was worried there for a moment, but I think it
turned out all right in the end.
jpnChrName: ふう…… 一時はどうなるかと思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
一時はどうなるかと思ったけど。

engChrName: I'm glad we were finally able to pay Elaine back for all the times she's helped us out of a jam.
engSearchText:
I'm glad we were finally able to pay Elaine back for all
the times she's helped us out of a jam.
jpnChrName: でも、少しでもエレインさんの お力になれて良かったですっ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、少しでもエレインさんの
お力になれて良かったですっ。

engChrName: Wish we could've finished off those bastards while we had the chance, though.
engSearchText:
Wish we could've finished off those bastards while we
had the chance, though.
jpnChrName: あのクソ野郎は仕留め損ねたが…… 決戦前の肩慣らしになったのも確かだな。
jpnSearchText:
あのクソ野郎は仕留め損ねたが……
決戦前の肩慣らしになったのも確かだな。

engChrName: Oh, I nearly forgot about the vice captain. Looks as though he's nowhere to be seen now.
engSearchText:
Oh, I nearly forgot about the vice captain. Looks as
though he's nowhere to be seen now.
jpnChrName: そういえば“副兵長”の方は いつの間にか離脱されていましたね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば“副兵長”の方は
いつの間にか離脱されていましたね。

engChrName: He may have assumed the branded heretic had room to mend his ways.
engSearchText:
He may have assumed the branded heretic had room
to mend his ways.
jpnChrName: うむ、外法認定したとはいえ、 改心の余地ありと判断したかもしれぬ。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、外法認定したとはいえ、
改心の余地ありと判断したかもしれぬ。

engChrName: Here's hoping.
engSearchText: Here's hoping.
jpnChrName: だといいんですがね……
jpnSearchText: だといいんですがね……

engChrName: Either way, I'm sure the CID's got the situation under control.
engSearchText:
Either way, I'm sure the CID's got the situation
under control.
jpnChrName: ──割と大事になっちまったが ＣＩＤが押さえてるから大丈夫だろう。
jpnSearchText:
──割と大事になっちまったが
ＣＩＤが押さえてるから大丈夫だろう。

engChrName: Once we're all done here, we should get in contact with Agnès.
engSearchText:
Once we're all done here, we should get in contact
with Agnès.
jpnChrName: 他の準備が済んだら、アニエスたちにも 連絡して合流した方がいいかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
他の準備が済んだら、アニエスたちにも
連絡して合流した方がいいかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Yeah. I think our patrol's just about over now.
engSearchText: Yeah. I think our patrol's just about over now.
jpnChrName: ええ、そろそろ巡回も終わりね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、そろそろ巡回も終わりね。

engChrName: Wait a moment!
engSearchText: Wait a moment!
jpnChrName: ヴァン……貴方たちも！
jpnSearchText: ヴァン……貴方たちも！

engChrName: Thank you, everyone. For coming to my aid—and for letting me settle this in my own way.
engSearchText:
Thank you, everyone. For coming to my aid—and for
letting me settle this in my own way.
jpnChrName: ありがとう……駆け付けてくれて、 私にけじめを付けさせてくれて。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう……駆け付けてくれて、
私にけじめを付けさせてくれて。

engChrName: I regret that I won't be able to watch over your efforts to the very end. There is a lot I must go over with the authorities...
engSearchText:
I regret that I won't be able to watch over your efforts
to the very end. There is a lot I must go over with
the authorities...
jpnChrName: それとごめんなさい、事情聴取があって 最後まで見届けられそうにないけど……
jpnSearchText:
それとごめんなさい、事情聴取があって
最後まで見届けられそうにないけど……

engChrName: But I know you will succeed. I believe in you all!
engSearchText: But I know you will succeed. I believe in you all!
jpnChrName: でも、信じているから……！
jpnSearchText: でも、信じているから……！

engChrName: I have faith that you and your friends will triumph!
engSearchText: I have faith that you and your friends will triumph!
jpnChrName: 貴方が──貴方たちが彼らに打ち勝って この最悪なゲームを制してくれるって！
jpnSearchText:
貴方が──貴方たちが彼らに打ち勝って
この最悪なゲームを制してくれるって！

engChrName: The big guy and I won't be going anywhere, though. We're sticking with you to the end.
engSearchText:
The big guy and I won't be going anywhere, though.
We're sticking with you to the end.
jpnChrName: ま、わたしたちは予定通り 最後まで付き合うから。
jpnSearchText:
ま、わたしたちは予定通り
最後まで付き合うから。

engChrName: The two of us are gonna give 120% to make up for Elaine's absence.
engSearchText:
The two of us are gonna give 120% to make up for
Elaine's absence.
jpnChrName: エレインの分まで 微力を尽くさせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
エレインの分まで
微力を尽くさせてもらおう。

engChrName: We'll kick this game's ass. You played your part to give us this chance at victory, and we're gonna take it.
engSearchText:
We'll kick this game's ass. You played your part to
give us this chance at victory, and we're gonna take it.
jpnChrName: ああ──お前も繋いで ようやく見えてきた勝ち筋だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──お前も繋いで
ようやく見えてきた勝ち筋だ。

engChrName: We'll be back with good news before you know it!
engSearchText: We'll be back with good news before you know it!
jpnChrName: 後はどんと構えて朗報を待ってな！
jpnSearchText: 後はどんと構えて朗報を待ってな！

engChrName: Of course! I'll be waiting!
engSearchText: Of course! I'll be waiting!
jpnChrName: うん……待ってるから！
jpnSearchText: うん……待ってるから！

engChrName: To advance the main story, select 'Go to Vashtar Palace' from the Travel menu.
engSearchText:
To advance the main story, select 'Go to Vashtar
Palace' from the Travel menu.
jpnChrName: メインのストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから 『仲間と合流して王宮跡に向かう』を選択してください。
jpnSearchText:
メインのストーリーを進める場合、移動メニューから
『仲間と合流して王宮跡に向かう』を選択してください。

engChrName: On that, you have nothing to fear, I assure you. We have no shortage of personnel.
engSearchText:
On that, you have nothing to fear, I assure you.
We have no shortage of personnel.
jpnChrName: ええ、そこはご心配なく。 それなりの人手は用意しています。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、そこはご心配なく。
それなりの人手は用意しています。

engChrName: Then proceed according to our agreement. We shall be accommodating to your needs—within reason, of course.
engSearchText:
Then proceed according to our agreement. We shall
be accommodating to your needs—within reason,
of course.
jpnChrName: 後は協定通りに。 こちらも相応の便宜を図らせていただく。
jpnSearchText:
後は協定通りに。
こちらも相応の便宜を図らせていただく。

engChrName: Many thanks. I hope this will serve as the start of a long, lasting relationship with your organization.
engSearchText:
Many thanks. I hope this will serve as the start of a
long, lasting relationship with your organization.
jpnChrName: フフ、是非とも今後も 良き商談を。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、是非とも今後も
良き商談を。

engChrName: Heh. Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
engSearchText: Heh. Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
jpnChrName: フッ、それはまた別の話でしょう。
jpnSearchText: <C1>フッ、それはまた別の話でしょう。

engChrName: Oh! If it isn't the good people of Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText: Oh! If it isn't the good people of Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: おや？　《アークライド解決事務所》の皆さん。 おはようございます。
jpnSearchText:
おや？　《アークライド解決事務所》の皆さん。
おはようございます。

engChrName: It isn't even lunchtime, and you're already up to no good.
engSearchText:
It isn't even lunchtime, and you're already up to
no good.
jpnChrName: 朝から怪しさ満載じゃねぇか。 また何か企んでやがるな？
jpnSearchText:
朝から怪しさ満載じゃねぇか。
また何か企んでやがるな？

engChrName: Why the hell are you callin' René? What kinda bullshit are you two cookin'?
engSearchText:
Why the hell are you callin' René? What kinda
bullshit are you two cookin'?
jpnChrName: つーか、話してる相手の声── ルネだな？
jpnSearchText:
つーか、話してる相手の声──
ルネだな？

engChrName: I would thank you to not call me by my name while I'm on duty. Or even when I'm off, for that matter.
engSearchText:
I would thank you to not call me by my name while
I'm on duty. Or even when I'm off, for that matter.
jpnChrName: 仕事中に── いやプライベートでも名前で呼ぶなっ。
jpnSearchText:
仕事中に──
いやプライベートでも名前で呼ぶなっ。

engChrName: Kincaid?
engSearchText: Kincaid?
jpnChrName: キンケイドさん……
jpnSearchText: キンケイドさん……

engChrName: Oh, that's the guy from the CID.
engSearchText: Oh, that's the guy from the CID.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの……
jpnSearchText: ＣＩＤの……

engChrName: He's a presidential aide, right?
engSearchText: He's a presidential aide, right?
jpnChrName: 今は確か大統領の臨時補佐官だったわね。
jpnSearchText: 今は確か大統領の臨時補佐官だったわね。

engChrName: Tell me, why might a government official be having a friendly chat with an executive of Heiyue?
engSearchText:
Tell me, why might a government official be having a
friendly chat with an executive of Heiyue?
jpnChrName: その補佐官殿が黒月の幹部と仲良く 話しているのもまた奇妙な光景だな。
jpnSearchText:
その補佐官殿が黒月の幹部と仲良く
話しているのもまた奇妙な光景だな。

engChrName: We were simply going over the events of this morning.
engSearchText:
We were simply going over the events of
this morning.
jpnChrName: 何、大した話ではありません。 “朝の後始末”について、少々ね。
jpnSearchText:
何、大した話ではありません。
“朝の後始末”について、少々ね。

engChrName: That's all?
engSearchText: That's all?

engChrName: As in, what that Hercules unit did?
engSearchText: As in, what that Hercules unit did?
jpnChrName: 《ハーキュリーズ》の……
jpnSearchText: 《ハーキュリーズ》の……

engChrName: Indeed. To be more specific, we were forming an agreement to ensure that such an event does not repeat.
engSearchText:
Indeed. To be more specific, we were forming an
agreement to ensure that such an event does
not repeat.
jpnChrName: 正確には“再発防止”の取り決めだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>正確には“再発防止”の取り決めだ。

engChrName: Desperate times call for desperate measures. After the incident, we realized a backup plan had to be put in place.
engSearchText:
Desperate times call for desperate measures. After the
incident, we realized a backup plan had to be put
in place.
jpnChrName: こちらも当然手は打つが、 保険をかけておく必要があると判断した。
jpnSearchText:
こちらも当然手は打つが、
保険をかけておく必要があると判断した。

engChrName: Does that mean Heiyue has already taken action?
engSearchText: Does that mean Heiyue has already taken action?
jpnChrName: まさか、黒月の人間が既に……？
jpnSearchText: まさか、黒月の人間が既に……？

engChrName: Yes, that's correct. We have men stationed all around the perimeter of Oración.
engSearchText:
Yes, that's correct. We have men stationed all around
the perimeter of Oración.
jpnChrName: ええ、それなりの数をオラシオンの周辺に 待機させました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それなりの数をオラシオンの周辺に
待機させました。

engChrName: We originally planned to bring them inside the city as reinforcements, but as you know, the rules strictly forbid such a thing.
engSearchText:
We originally planned to bring them inside the city as
reinforcements, but as you know, the rules strictly
forbid such a thing.
jpnChrName: 本来なら途中からの増援として見込んでいましたが、 今の状況では中には入れませんからね。
jpnSearchText:
本来なら途中からの増援として見込んでいましたが、
今の状況では中には入れませんからね。

engChrName: Not that there would be any point in doing so now, given that our team has been eliminated.
engSearchText:
Not that there would be any point in doing so now,
given that our team has been eliminated.
jpnChrName: 既に脱落した私たちには そもそも意味がないことですが。
jpnSearchText:
既に脱落した私たちには
そもそも意味がないことですが。

engChrName: Not that there would be any point in doing so now, given that we have you at our side.
engSearchText:
Not that there would be any point in doing so now,
given that we have you at our side.
jpnChrName: もっとも、今回はあくまでヴァンさんたちが主体 ですから、あまり関係のない話ですが。
jpnSearchText:
もっとも、今回はあくまでヴァンさんたちが主体
ですから、あまり関係のない話ですが。

engChrName: Makes sense. Guessin' you're planning to seize control of the city as soon as this is all done.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. Guessin' you're planning to seize
control of the city as soon as this is all done.
jpnChrName: ハッ……全部終わった後に 一気にオラシオンを押さえようとか考えてそうだが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……全部終わった後に
一気にオラシオンを押さえようとか考えてそうだが。

engChrName: The thought crossed my mind. Though there's no guarantee we would be successful, even if we did try.
engSearchText:
The thought crossed my mind. Though there's no
guarantee we would be successful, even if we did try.
jpnChrName: さて、否定はしません。 上手くいく保証もありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
さて、否定はしません。
上手くいく保証もありませんしね。

engChrName: You really are a sneaky son of a bitch.
engSearchText: You really are a sneaky son of a bitch.
jpnChrName: どこまでも食えねぇヤツだ。
jpnSearchText: どこまでも食えねぇヤツだ。

engChrName: I want to ask you something, Van. Are you thinking up an escape plan for the people of Oración?
engSearchText:
I want to ask you something, Van. Are you thinking
up an escape plan for the people of Oración?
jpnChrName: ヴァン、分かっていると思うが 中の人間を逃がすことは今は考えるな。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、分かっていると思うが
中の人間を逃がすことは今は考えるな。

engChrName: If you are, I would advise against doing so. I know you're an expert at finding loopholes, but now is the time to hedge our bets.
engSearchText:
If you are, I would advise against doing so. I know
you're an expert at finding loopholes, but now is the
time to hedge our bets.
jpnChrName: いつもの悪知恵とはわけが違う。 賭けのリスクが大きすぎるだろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
いつもの悪知恵とはわけが違う。
賭けのリスクが大きすぎるだろうからな。

engChrName: ...I know. That goes without saying.
engSearchText: ...I know. That goes without saying.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、分かってるさ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、分かってるさ。

engChrName: Van...
engSearchText: Van...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: And while we're at it, I'll 'advise' you both to keep your schemin' to a bare minimum.
engSearchText:
And while we're at it, I'll 'advise' you both to keep
your schemin' to a bare minimum.
jpnChrName: アンタらこそ、悪巧みは程々にな。
jpnSearchText: アンタらこそ、悪巧みは程々にな。

engChrName: I know you glasses-wearin' types do that shit on the regular, but, uhh, stop.
engSearchText:
I know you glasses-wearin' types do that shit on the
regular, but, uhh, stop.
jpnChrName: 悪辣メガネが２人も揃うと どうも寒気がするんでな。
jpnSearchText:
悪辣メガネが２人も揃うと
どうも寒気がするんでな。

engChrName: How rude! That sort of a caricature borders on prejudice. Wouldn't you agree, Kincaid?
engSearchText:
How rude! That sort of a caricature borders
on prejudice. Wouldn't you agree, Kincaid?
jpnChrName: フフ、私たちへの偏見ですよ。 ねえ、キンケイド補佐官？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、私たちへの偏見ですよ。
ねえ、キンケイド補佐官？

engChrName: Don't put me in the same category as him...
engSearchText: Don't put me in the same category as him...
jpnChrName: 私を一緒くたにしないでくれ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>私を一緒くたにしないでくれ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Oh, it's been MUCH too long since we saw each other last. I've missed you ever so much!
engSearchText:
Oh, it's been MUCH too long since we saw each
other last. I've missed you ever so much!
jpnChrName: は～、お姉さん嬉しいわぁ。 もう何年ぶりになるんやろか～。
jpnSearchText:
は～、お姉さん嬉しいわぁ。
もう何年ぶりになるんやろか～。

engChrName: I can hardly believe that our darling little Renne has grown into such a refined young lady. It brings a tear to my eye!
engSearchText:
I can hardly believe that our darling little Renne has
grown into such a refined young lady. It brings a tear
to my eye!
jpnChrName: あんなめんこかった仔猫ちゃんが こないな美人になるなんて感無量やわ～。
jpnSearchText:
あんなめんこかった仔猫ちゃんが
こないな美人になるなんて感無量やわ～。

engChrName: *sigh* Still as melodramatic as ever, I see.
engSearchText: *sigh* Still as melodramatic as ever, I see.
jpnChrName: ああもう、これだから 出くわしたくなかったんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ああもう、これだから
出くわしたくなかったんだけど……

engChrName: You haven't changed at all, Retzy—and that goes for you as well, Walter. You really ought to learn how to dress like an adult.
engSearchText:
You haven't changed at all, Retzy—and that goes for
you as well, Walter. You really ought to learn how to
dress like an adult.
jpnChrName: 久しぶりね、レティ。 ヴァルターはまた大人げない格好だけど。
jpnSearchText:
久しぶりね、レティ。
ヴァルターはまた大人げない格好だけど。

engChrName: Nah, screw that. I got myself a badass new bike, so I'm gonna dress the part.
engSearchText:
Nah, screw that. I got myself a badass new bike, so
I'm gonna dress the part.
jpnChrName: クク、この歳でバイクなんて イカすオモチャを手に入れたからな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、この歳でバイクなんて
イカすオモチャを手に入れたからな。

engChrName: Besides, at least I'm not a fashion disaster like this old asshole.
engSearchText:
Besides, at least I'm not a fashion disaster like this
old asshole.
jpnChrName: それにこっちのオヤジほど はっちゃけた格好じゃねえだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
それにこっちのオヤジほど
はっちゃけた格好じゃねえだろうが？

engChrName: That's par for the course with Ellroy. Though I do hear his behavior has worsened as the years have gone by.
engSearchText:
That's par for the course with Ellroy. Though I do
hear his behavior has worsened as the years have
gone by.
jpnChrName: うーん、このヒト前からこんな感じだし。 ヤンチャに磨きが掛かってるみたいだけど。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、このヒト前からこんな感じだし。
ヤンチャに磨きが掛かってるみたいだけど。

engChrName: You don't know the half of it, sweetie. He has become increasingly temperamental—more so than even McBurn.
engSearchText:
You don't know the half of it, sweetie. He has
become increasingly temperamental—more so than
even McBurn.
jpnChrName: そうなんよねぇ、ええトシして マクバーンより落ち着きがあらへんし。
jpnSearchText:
そうなんよねぇ、ええトシして
マクバーンより落ち着きがあらへんし。

engChrName: I'd appreciate it if you didn't compare me to that demon.
engSearchText:
I'd appreciate it if you didn't compare me to
that demon.
jpnChrName: アレと比べられてもなァ…… そもそもアイツは俺より年上だろうが。
jpnSearchText:
アレと比べられてもなァ……
そもそもアイツは俺より年上だろうが。

engChrName: And I'm not the only one who's changed here. You have, too, Renne.
engSearchText:
And I'm not the only one who's changed here.
You have, too, Renne.
jpnChrName: それはともかく── たしかに見違えやがったな、レン。
jpnSearchText:
それはともかく──
たしかに見違えやがったな、レン。

engChrName: For better and for worse.
engSearchText: For better and for worse.
jpnChrName: 良い意味でも、悪い意味でもだが。
jpnSearchText: 良い意味でも、悪い意味でもだが。

engChrName: Why, thank you. That's the highest compliment I could receive from a man like you.
engSearchText:
Why, thank you. That's the highest compliment I
could receive from a man like you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それはありがとう。 貴方にそう言われると安心できるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それはありがとう。
貴方にそう言われると安心できるわ。

engChrName: After all, you only have eyes for yourself, so I must have grown quite a bit if it made an impression on you.
engSearchText:
After all, you only have eyes for yourself, so I must
have grown quite a bit if it made an impression
on you.
jpnChrName: なにせ結社随一の悪趣味── 戒（いましめ）をどう破るかがモットーだものね。
jpnSearchText:
なにせ結社随一の悪趣味──
戒（いましめ）をどう破るかがモットーだものね。

engChrName: Hey, now. I'm not that self-centered. Give me a little credit here.
engSearchText:
Hey, now. I'm not that self-centered. Give me a little
credit here.
jpnChrName: クク、そのモットーの逆を行くのも それはそれでオツなもんだが……
jpnSearchText:
クク、そのモットーの逆を行くのも
それはそれでオツなもんだが……

engChrName: Anyway, you can live your life however you please. It's no skin off my back if you seek a mundane existence.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you can live your life however you please.
It's no skin off my back if you seek a
mundane existence.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんはそれでいいだろ。 精々ゆるーく付き合ってくとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんはそれでいいだろ。
精々ゆるーく付き合ってくとしようぜ。

engChrName: But if you ever crave the life of the thrill again, give me a call. I'd be happy to challenge you in a game of slaughter.
engSearchText:
But if you ever crave the life of the thrill again, give
me a call. I'd be happy to challenge you in a game
of slaughter.
jpnChrName: 今回みたいに限定的に手を組んだり、 たまには互いに殲滅しあったりしてな。
jpnSearchText:
今回みたいに限定的に手を組んだり、
たまには互いに殲滅しあったりしてな。

engChrName: You're on. But fair warning: when it comes to slaughtering, I have no equal. ❤
engSearchText:
You're on. But fair warning: when it comes to
slaughtering, I have no equal. ❤
jpnChrName: 異存はないわ。 その時は全力でやらせてもらうけど❤
jpnSearchText:
異存はないわ。
その時は全力でやらせてもらうけど❤

engChrName: Hoo, boy. Am I about to witness the throwdown of the century?
engSearchText:
Hoo, boy. Am I about to witness the throwdown of
the century?
jpnChrName: ったく、俺の力ずくより 遙かにタチが悪いじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、俺の力ずくより
遙かにタチが悪いじゃねえか。

engChrName: I'm not sure who I should root for. Would it be wrong to cheer them both on?
engSearchText:
I'm not sure who I should root for. Would it be
wrong to cheer them both on?
jpnChrName: 旦さんとレンかぁ、良い勝負しそうやし 両方とも応援させてもらおかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
旦さんとレンかぁ、良い勝負しそうやし
両方とも応援させてもらおかなぁ。

engChrName: Y'all. This is a department store—not the world's bloodiest colosseum.
engSearchText:
Y'all. This is a department store—not the world's
bloodiest colosseum.
jpnChrName: ………デパートの休憩スペースで 不穏極まる話をしてんじゃねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
………デパートの休憩スペースで
不穏極まる話をしてんじゃねえよ。

engChrName: Oh, I didn't even see you there.
engSearchText: Oh, I didn't even see you there.
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンさんにアニエスたち。
jpnSearchText: あら、ヴァンさんにアニエスたち。

engChrName: We meet again. Enjoying your morning stroll, I take it?
engSearchText:
We meet again. Enjoying your morning stroll, I
take it?
jpnChrName: うふふ、昨夜ぶりやねぇ。 午前中のうちに街巡りしとるの？
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、昨夜ぶりやねぇ。
午前中のうちに街巡りしとるの？

engChrName: Good job yesterday. I've got a nice reward prepared for you, and that's more 4SPGs.
engSearchText:
Good job yesterday. I've got a nice reward prepared
for you, and that's more 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: ハハ、昨日はゴクローだったな。 ちなみに４ｓｐｇは手配しといたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、昨日はゴクローだったな。
ちなみに４ｓｐｇは手配しといたぜ。

engChrName: Hello, everyone. Enjoying your morning stroll, I take it?
engSearchText:
Hello, everyone. Enjoying your morning stroll, I
take it?
jpnChrName: ふふ、昨日は会えへんかったねぇ。 午前中のうちに街巡りしとるの？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、昨日は会えへんかったねぇ。
午前中のうちに街巡りしとるの？

engChrName: Good job coming out on top yesterday. I've got a nice reward prepared for you, and that's more 4SPGs.
engSearchText:
Good job coming out on top yesterday. I've got a nice
reward prepared for you, and that's more 4SPGs.
jpnChrName: 昨日はＭＶＰだったそうだな？ ちなみに４ｓｐｇは手配しといたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
昨日はＭＶＰだったそうだな？
ちなみに４ｓｐｇは手配しといたぜ。

engChrName: Already aware. We'll take care of 'em.
engSearchText: Already aware. We'll take care of 'em.
jpnChrName: ああ、そっちは ボチボチ対応するつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そっちは
ボチボチ対応するつもりだ。

engChrName: Having fun reconnecting with your found family?
engSearchText: Having fun reconnecting with your found family?
jpnChrName: しかし経歴は聞いてたが いまだ古巣と通じてやがるわけか。
jpnSearchText:
しかし経歴は聞いてたが
いまだ古巣と通じてやがるわけか。

engChrName: Aaron...
engSearchText: Aaron...
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……

engChrName: We're just catching up, is all. I like to stay in touch with old friends.
engSearchText:
We're just catching up, is all. I like to stay in touch
with old friends.
jpnChrName: まあ、昔馴染みなのは間違いないし たまに連絡するくらいはしてるわね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、昔馴染みなのは間違いないし
たまに連絡するくらいはしてるわね。

engChrName: However, I do a good job keeping them at arm's length—unlike you with Heiyue.
engSearchText:
However, I do a good job keeping them at arm's
length—unlike you with Heiyue.
jpnChrName: 貴方が黒月と懇意にしてるよりは 距離を置いているとは思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
貴方が黒月と懇意にしてるよりは
距離を置いているとは思うけど。

engChrName: Wow. That's a low blow.
engSearchText: Wow. That's a low blow.
jpnChrName: ハン、なるほどな。 まあ別に責めてるわけでもねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、なるほどな。
まあ別に責めてるわけでもねぇが。

engChrName: So what are you all doing here? This isn't exactly a normal meetup spot.
engSearchText:
So what are you all doing here? This isn't exactly a
normal meetup spot.
jpnChrName: えと、それはともかく どうしてこんな場所で話を……？
jpnSearchText:
えと、それはともかく
どうしてこんな場所で話を……？

engChrName: We all bumped into each other while buying stuff, and after checkout, we decided to shoot the shit for a while.
engSearchText:
We all bumped into each other while buying stuff,
and after checkout, we decided to shoot the shit for
a while.
jpnChrName: ああ、お互い野暮用で買物に来て ちょうど出くわしたってだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、お互い野暮用で買物に来て
ちょうど出くわしたってだけだ。

engChrName: Renne purchased tea, I got boxing gloves, Lucrezia bought perfume, and the boss picked out some cigars.
engSearchText:
Renne purchased tea, I got boxing gloves, Lucrezia
bought perfume, and the boss picked out some cigars.
jpnChrName: こいつ（レン）は紅茶、俺はバンテージ、 ルクレツィアは香水、旦那は葉巻だったか？
jpnSearchText:
こいつ（レン）は紅茶、俺はバンテージ、
ルクレツィアは香水、旦那は葉巻だったか？

engChrName: One of my favorite perfumers sells their wares here, so I simply had to stop by.
engSearchText:
One of my favorite perfumers sells their wares here,
so I simply had to stop by.
jpnChrName: うふふ、贔屓にしとる調香師はんの フレグランスを取り扱っててなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、贔屓にしとる調香師はんの
フレグランスを取り扱っててなぁ。

engChrName: I was fresh out of cigars. Would've been in hot water if this place didn't stock them, but I was in luck.
engSearchText:
I was fresh out of cigars. Would've been in hot water
if this place didn't stock them, but I was in luck.
jpnChrName: クク、こっちも丁度切らしかけてたから 扱ってて助かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、こっちも丁度切らしかけてたから
扱ってて助かったぜ。

engChrName: Well, I think we should be heading back to base.
engSearchText: Well, I think we should be heading back to base.
jpnChrName: ──そんじゃ、 ボチボチ“拠点”に戻るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
──そんじゃ、
ボチボチ“拠点”に戻るとするか。

engChrName: You're staying at the hotel near the North District's underground entrance, yes?
engSearchText:
You're staying at the hotel near the North District's
underground entrance, yes?
jpnChrName: おぬしらの拠点は、昨日の地下入口の 近くにあった北街区のホテルだったか。
jpnSearchText:
おぬしらの拠点は、昨日の地下入口の
近くにあった北街区のホテルだったか。

engChrName: You got it. If you ever need me, drop by the bar there.
engSearchText: You got it. If you ever need me, drop by the bar there.
jpnChrName: ああ、大抵そこの地下の バーあたりでたむろってると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、大抵そこの地下の
バーあたりでたむろってると思うぜ。

engChrName: We'll see you all at noon!
engSearchText: We'll see you all at noon!
jpnChrName: うふふ、それじゃあ 正午にまたよろしゅうな～。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それじゃあ
正午にまたよろしゅうな～。

engChrName: Where are you guys staying, by the way? You're my clients, so I'd like to know where to reach out in case something comes up.
engSearchText:
Where are you guys staying, by the way? You're my
clients, so I'd like to know where to reach out in case
something comes up.
jpnChrName: そういや、アンタらの拠点はどこだ？ 一応依頼主の連絡先くらい聞いておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、アンタらの拠点はどこだ？
一応依頼主の連絡先くらい聞いておこうか。

engChrName: The hotel in the North District. If you ever need me, you'll find me at their bar.
engSearchText:
The hotel in the North District. If you ever need me,
you'll find me at their bar.
jpnChrName: ああ、北街区のホテルだ。 地下のバーあたりに大抵いると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、北街区のホテルだ。
地下のバーあたりに大抵いると思うぜ。

engChrName: I hope we see you again in the coming round.
engSearchText: I hope we see you again in the coming round.
jpnChrName: うふふ、それじゃあ正午のゲームで 会った時にはよろしゅうな～。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、それじゃあ正午のゲームで
会った時にはよろしゅうな～。

engChrName: Whew... They may be friendly, but I always feel so tense around them.
engSearchText:
Whew... They may be friendly, but I always feel so
tense around them.
jpnChrName: はあぁぁ～……態度は気さくだけど どう考えても普通の人たちじゃないよね。
jpnSearchText:
はあぁぁ～……態度は気さくだけど
どう考えても普通の人たちじゃないよね。

engChrName: You always gotta watch out for those types, and that's especially true for the Oathbreaker.
engSearchText:
You always gotta watch out for those types, and that's
especially true for the Oathbreaker.
jpnChrName: ま、油断は禁物でしょうね。 あの“破戒”ってオジサンは特に。
jpnSearchText:
ま、油断は禁物でしょうね。
あの“破戒”ってオジサンは特に。

engChrName: Marduk has tentatively labeled him an SS-level threat.
engSearchText:
Marduk has tentatively labeled him an
SS-level threat.
jpnChrName: ……マルドゥック社の危険度評価は “ＳＳ？”となっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
……マルドゥック社の危険度評価は
“ＳＳ？”となっていますね。

engChrName: And I only say tentatively because his background and day-to-day activities are a complete mystery— even to us.
engSearchText:
And I only say tentatively because his background
and day-to-day activities are a complete mystery—
even to us.
jpnChrName: 謎めいた経歴も含め、今一どのような 活動をしているのか詳細不明だとか。
jpnSearchText:
謎めいた経歴も含め、今一どのような
活動をしているのか詳細不明だとか。

engChrName: I've heard bits and pieces, and they don't paint the most flattering picture, to put it nicely.
engSearchText:
I've heard bits and pieces, and they don't paint the
most flattering picture, to put it nicely.
jpnChrName: ……らしいな、庭園を抜きにしても 不穏な噂ばかり耳にはしているが。
jpnSearchText:
……らしいな、庭園を抜きにしても
不穏な噂ばかり耳にはしているが。

engChrName: I'll have to be extra careful around him, then.
engSearchText: I'll have to be extra careful around him, then.
jpnChrName: そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そうなんですか……

engChrName: I don't imagine he will cause you too many problems while you're working with them...
engSearchText:
I don't imagine he will cause you too many problems
while you're working with them...
jpnChrName: まあ、ヴァルターやレティと行動を 共にする分には大丈夫でしょうけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヴァルターやレティと行動を
共にする分には大丈夫でしょうけど……

engChrName: ...but you would do well to stay on guard around them all the same. Harwood especially.
engSearchText:
...but you would do well to stay on guard around them
all the same. Harwood especially.
jpnChrName: ハーウッドのオジサンにだけは 気を抜かない方がいいってのは正解ね。
jpnSearchText:
ハーウッドのオジサンにだけは
気を抜かない方がいいってのは正解ね。

engChrName: Both Walter and Retzy are formidable opponents...
engSearchText: Both Walter and Retzy are formidable opponents...
jpnChrName: まあ、ヴァルターやレティについても やり合う事になったら脅威だと思うけど。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ヴァルターやレティについても
やり合う事になったら脅威だと思うけど。

engChrName: ...but compared with Harwood, they don't hold a candle.
engSearchText:
...but compared with Harwood, they don't hold
a candle.
jpnChrName: ハーウッドのオジサンにはそれ以上に 気を抜かない方がいいってのは正解ね。
jpnSearchText:
ハーウッドのオジサンにはそれ以上に
気を抜かない方がいいってのは正解ね。

engChrName: That's not to discount the other two, of course. They probably outmatch him in raw power.
engSearchText:
That's not to discount the other two, of course.
They probably outmatch him in raw power.
jpnChrName: もちろんそれなり以上に鍛えてるし 修羅場を潜り抜けているのは確かだけど……
jpnSearchText:
もちろんそれなり以上に鍛えてるし
修羅場を潜り抜けているのは確かだけど……

engChrName: He's not a master martial artist like Walter, and he doesn't have any special powers like Retzy.
engSearchText:
He's not a master martial artist like Walter, and he
doesn't have any special powers like Retzy.
jpnChrName: ヴァルターのような超絶的な武術家でも レティみたいな“異能”も持っていないわ。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァルターのような超絶的な武術家でも
レティみたいな“異能”も持っていないわ。

engChrName: However, he's still an Anguis, and you can never be too careful around them.
engSearchText:
However, he's still an Anguis, and you can never be
too careful around them.
jpnChrName: それなのに使徒──結社の最高幹部を務め、 あの２人も含めた執行者を従えている意味。
jpnSearchText:
それなのに使徒──結社の最高幹部を務め、
あの２人も含めた執行者を従えている意味。

engChrName: I don't fully know what he's capable of, though, so that's about all the advice I can offer you.
engSearchText:
I don't fully know what he's capable of, though, so
that's about all the advice I can offer you.
jpnChrName: 私も彼の“底”を見通せてないから 迂闊なことを言うつもりはないけど……
jpnSearchText:
私も彼の“底”を見通せてないから
迂闊なことを言うつもりはないけど……

engChrName: But I will share one little-known fact: the Thousand Oathbreaker isn't his only title.
engSearchText:
But I will share one little-known fact: the Thousand
Oathbreaker isn't his only title.
jpnChrName: せめて《千の破戒者》以外の、裏の世界での 彼の“もう一つの”異名を教えてあげる。
jpnSearchText:
せめて《千の破戒者》以外の、裏の世界での
彼の“もう一つの”異名を教えてあげる。

engChrName: He's also known as the Savant Lawbreaker.
engSearchText: He's also known as the Savant Lawbreaker.
jpnChrName: 『犯罪の天才』──そんな風に呼ばれてるわ。
jpnSearchText: 『犯罪の天才』──そんな風に呼ばれてるわ。

engChrName: That sounds...ominous.
engSearchText: That sounds...ominous.
jpnChrName: は、犯罪の天才……
jpnSearchText: は、犯罪の天才……

engChrName: Any idea how he picked up that nickname?
engSearchText: Any idea how he picked up that nickname?
jpnChrName: ハン……またヤバそうだが どんな経緯でそう呼ばれてるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ハン……またヤバそうだが
どんな経緯でそう呼ばれてるんだ？

engChrName: Well, most groups that have stood in his way have reportedly—and conveniently—been silenced.
engSearchText:
Well, most groups that have stood in his way have
reportedly—and conveniently—been silenced.
jpnChrName: たとえば、これまで彼と敵対した組織は どこも少なからず“自滅”してるのよね。
jpnSearchText:
たとえば、これまで彼と敵対した組織は
どこも少なからず“自滅”してるのよね。

engChrName: Those cases were labeled as 'unfortunate accidents,' 'inexplicable internal strife,' or something else to that effect.
engSearchText:
Those cases were labeled as 'unfortunate accidents,'
'inexplicable internal strife,' or something else to
that effect.
jpnChrName: 不幸な事故、何らかの偶然、 あるいは突発的な“同士討ち”──
jpnSearchText:
不幸な事故、何らかの偶然、
あるいは突発的な“同士討ち”──

engChrName: One such case involved a company with criminal connections making a series of asinine mistakes, resulting in crippling debt and—ultimately—ruin.
engSearchText:
One such case involved a company with criminal
connections making a series of asinine mistakes,
resulting in crippling debt and—ultimately—ruin.
jpnChrName: 裏に通じる企業が、あり得ないミスの連続で 莫大な負債を抱えて潰れたこともあったみたい。
jpnSearchText:
裏に通じる企業が、あり得ないミスの連続で
莫大な負債を抱えて潰れたこともあったみたい。

engChrName: The authorities wrote off the deaths as 'cause unknown' or coincidental.
engSearchText:
The authorities wrote off the deaths as 'cause
unknown' or coincidental.
jpnChrName: どれも偶然か、原因不明の変死として 当局も片付けるしかなかったようだけど……
jpnSearchText:
どれも偶然か、原因不明の変死として
当局も片付けるしかなかったようだけど……

engChrName: But if you ask anyone from the underworld about it, they will tell you those assessments are patently false.
engSearchText:
But if you ask anyone from the underworld about it,
they will tell you those assessments are patently false.
jpnChrName: それを信じている裏の人間はいないわね。
jpnSearchText: それを信じている裏の人間はいないわね。

engChrName: So he commits all of these crimes, but he's never been charged with a single one of them.
engSearchText:
So he commits all of these crimes, but he's never been
charged with a single one of them.
jpnChrName: ……だから犯罪の天才、ですか。
jpnSearchText: ……だから犯罪の天才、ですか。

engChrName: A slippery eel, that one.
engSearchText: A slippery eel, that one.
jpnChrName: 真偽も含めて危険な男であるのは 疑いようもなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText:
真偽も含めて危険な男であるのは
疑いようもなさそうだな。

engChrName: His crimes will catch up to him sooner or later, right?
engSearchText: His crimes will catch up to him sooner or later, right?
jpnChrName: はい……猟兵とは違った意味で よく分からない“怖さ”を感じます。
jpnSearchText:
はい……猟兵とは違った意味で
よく分からない“怖さ”を感じます。

engChrName: Well, I should be getting back to the guild. They're completely swamped right now.
engSearchText:
Well, I should be getting back to the guild.
They're completely swamped right now.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ギルドの方も大変そうだし、 そろそろ手伝いに戻るわね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ギルドの方も大変そうだし、
そろそろ手伝いに戻るわね。

engChrName: I wish you all luck. Make sure you come back safely, all right?
engSearchText:
I wish you all luck. Make sure you come back safely,
all right?
jpnChrName: 正午からの第二フェーズ、 くれぐれも気をつけて当たりなさい。
jpnSearchText:
正午からの第二フェーズ、
くれぐれも気をつけて当たりなさい。

engChrName: We will!
engSearchText: We will!
jpnChrName: はい……！
jpnSearchText: はい……！

engChrName: Thanks, Renne.
engSearchText: Thanks, Renne.
jpnChrName: ありがとう──レンさん。
jpnSearchText: ありがとう──レンさん。

engChrName: ...What is it, Van? You look lost in thought.
engSearchText: ...What is it, Van? You look lost in thought.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……？
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……？

engChrName: Is something troubling you?
engSearchText: Is something troubling you?
jpnChrName: レン様の話で 何か気になることでも？
jpnSearchText:
レン様の話で
何か気になることでも？

engChrName: Yeah.
engSearchText: Yeah.

engChrName: That conversation reminded me of something I forgot to make very clear to our clients.
engSearchText:
That conversation reminded me of something I
forgot to make very clear to our clients.
jpnChrName: なんつーか、連中と組むに当たって 念押しし損なった事があると思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
なんつーか、連中と組むに当たって
念押しし損なった事があると思ってな。

engChrName: Oh?
engSearchText: Oh?

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: ……どういうこと？
jpnSearchText: ……どういうこと？

engChrName: Don't worry about it. I just need to go see 'em before the second round begins.
engSearchText:
Don't worry about it. I just need to go see 'em before
the second round begins.
jpnChrName: ま、いわゆる“保険”ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、いわゆる“保険”ってヤツだ。

engChrName: We'll drop by the hotel bar later.
engSearchText: We'll drop by the hotel bar later.
jpnChrName: 第二フェーズが始まる前に 北街区のホテルのバーを訪ねてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
第二フェーズが始まる前に
北街区のホテルのバーを訪ねてみるぞ。

engChrName: I'm down for that.
engSearchText: I'm down for that.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、何だか分からねえが 連中の拠点を見ておくのはいいかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ、何だか分からねえが
連中の拠点を見ておくのはいいかもな。

engChrName: We might benefit from another look around the area, too.
engSearchText:
We might benefit from another look around the
area, too.
jpnChrName: ならばこのまま一回りするついでに 必ず立ち寄るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
ならばこのまま一回りするついでに
必ず立ち寄るとしよう。

engChrName: Oh! Master Bergard!
engSearchText: Oh! Master Bergard!
jpnChrName: おや、ベルガルド先生。
jpnSearchText: おや、ベルガルド先生。

engChrName: So, you're with them now, huh?
engSearchText: So, you're with them now, huh?
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋たちもいんのか。
jpnSearchText: 裏解決屋たちもいんのか。

engChrName: Indeed. I am aiding the spriggan and his friends with their work.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I am aiding the spriggan and his friends with
their work.
jpnChrName: ふむ、『裏解決業務』というものを 手伝っている最中でな。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、『裏解決業務』というものを
手伝っている最中でな。

engChrName: If you guys're gettin' our master wrapped up in your criminal bullshit, I'll pummel your asses into the ground.
engSearchText:
If you guys're gettin' our master wrapped up in your
criminal bullshit, I'll pummel your asses into
the ground.
jpnChrName: てめえ、先生に何怪しいもんを 手伝わせてやがる！
jpnSearchText:
てめえ、先生に何怪しいもんを
手伝わせてやがる！

engChrName: Hey, we ain't criminals. We're just handymen who help those in need. And our door's open to you both, too—assuming you got cash to burn.
engSearchText:
Hey, we ain't criminals. We're just handymen who
help those in need. And our door's open to you both,
too—assuming you got cash to burn.
jpnChrName: アンタらも悩み事があるなら 料金次第で相談に乗るぜ？
jpnSearchText:
アンタらも悩み事があるなら
料金次第で相談に乗るぜ？

engChrName: Actually, I think I'd give you a sweet discount since you're fellow students of Master.
engSearchText:
Actually, I think I'd give you a sweet discount since
you're fellow students of Master.
jpnChrName: 一応兄弟弟子のよしみで 割引してやってもいいしな。
jpnSearchText:
一応兄弟弟子のよしみで
割引してやってもいいしな。

engChrName: 'Fellow' students? Sorry, but there's no way in HELL we'll accept you as one of master's pupils. Not now, not ever.
engSearchText:
'Fellow' students? Sorry, but there's no way in HELL
we'll accept you as one of master's pupils. Not now,
not ever.
jpnChrName: 誰が兄弟弟子だ── こっちは認めてねぇっつの。
jpnSearchText:
誰が兄弟弟子だ──
こっちは認めてねぇっつの。

engChrName: You needn't be so harsh on him—nor should you worry about me. I have been rather enjoying myself, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
You needn't be so harsh on him—nor should you
worry about me. I have been rather enjoying myself,
as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: ハハ、この活動も案外楽しいものだ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、この活動も案外楽しいものだ。

engChrName: My time with them has served as a sobering reminder that there is still much I have yet to see and do in this world.
engSearchText:
My time with them has served as a sobering reminder
that there is still much I have yet to see and do in
this world.
jpnChrName: この歳になってもまだまだ 経験しておらぬことが多いからな。
jpnSearchText:
この歳になってもまだまだ
経験しておらぬことが多いからな。

engChrName: Oh, by the way, where are Iscariot's people? I don't sense them anywhere.
engSearchText:
Oh, by the way, where are Iscariot's people? I don't
sense them anywhere.
jpnChrName: そう言えば隠密僧兵の人たちは見かけませんね。 気配も感じられません。
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば隠密僧兵の人たちは見かけませんね。
気配も感じられません。

engChrName: They are probably lying low as we speak.
engSearchText: They are probably lying low as we speak.
jpnChrName: あの人たちなら今ここにはいませんよ。
jpnSearchText: あの人たちなら今ここにはいませんよ。

engChrName: Damn cowards. I was lookin' forward to laughing in their stupid faces for getting booted from the game.
engSearchText:
Damn cowards. I was lookin' forward to laughing in
their stupid faces for getting booted from the game.
jpnChrName: ハン、脱落したことを笑ってやろうと 思ったが、またどこかに潜り込みやがった。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、脱落したことを笑ってやろうと
思ったが、またどこかに潜り込みやがった。

engChrName: We learned that they were beaten AND that there were two groups of them at the same time. It was a shocking one-two punch!
engSearchText:
We learned that they were beaten AND that there
were two groups of them at the same time. It was a
shocking one-two punch!
jpnChrName: あの隠密僧兵たちが同時に２チームが脱落したと 聞いた時には流石に驚いたけどね。
jpnSearchText:
あの隠密僧兵たちが同時に２チームが脱落したと
聞いた時には流石に驚いたけどね。

engChrName: Probably tried a pincer attack on some team and got their asses handed to them anyway.
engSearchText:
Probably tried a pincer attack on some team and got
their asses handed to them anyway.
jpnChrName: どうせ２チームで相手をハメようとしたら 返り討ちに遭っちまったんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ２チームで相手をハメようとしたら
返り討ちに遭っちまったんだろ。

engChrName: What a bunch of freakin' losers.
engSearchText: What a bunch of freakin' losers.
jpnChrName: ざまぁねえな。
jpnSearchText: ざまぁねえな。

engChrName: Not to defend them, but our battle may have contributed to their loss. I imagine they were worn out.
engSearchText:
Not to defend them, but our battle may have
contributed to their loss. I imagine they were
worn out.
jpnChrName: 彼らを弁護したいわけではありませんが、 それくらい僕たちとの戦いで消耗していたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
彼らを弁護したいわけではありませんが、
それくらい僕たちとの戦いで消耗していたのでしょう。

engChrName: If you go up against a team like Marduk with anything less than full strength, defeat is an inevitability.
engSearchText:
If you go up against a team like Marduk with
anything less than full strength, defeat is
an inevitability.
jpnChrName: それに、あの時の状況から鑑みれば、 下したのは恐らく例のマルドゥック社でしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
それに、あの時の状況から鑑みれば、
下したのは恐らく例のマルドゥック社でしょうし。

engChrName: So you believe they faced Marduk as well.
engSearchText: So you believe they faced Marduk as well.
jpnChrName: やはり、そうでしたか……
jpnSearchText: やはり、そうでしたか……

engChrName: They fought Kasim, then...
engSearchText: They fought Kasim, then...
jpnChrName: お兄ちゃんが……
jpnSearchText: お兄ちゃんが……

engChrName: Those guys sound like they're off their rocker. I'd love to throw down with 'em someday.
engSearchText:
Those guys sound like they're off their rocker. I'd love
to throw down with 'em someday.
jpnChrName: とんでもねぇ連中だな、 少し興味が湧くぜ。
jpnSearchText:
とんでもねぇ連中だな、
少し興味が湧くぜ。

engChrName: Of course, we are not here to pick fights with unassailable opponents. We have another objective.
engSearchText:
Of course, we are not here to pick fights with
unassailable opponents. We have another objective.
jpnChrName: 今回の僕たちの目的とは あくまで関係ありませんけどね。
jpnSearchText:
今回の僕たちの目的とは
あくまで関係ありませんけどね。

engChrName: Oh, that's right. You're looking for something, aren't you?
engSearchText:
Oh, that's right. You're looking for something,
aren't you?
jpnChrName: リオンさんたちの目的って、確か……
jpnSearchText: リオンさんたちの目的って、確か……

engChrName: As our master has no doubt informed you, the primary task of the Gralsritter is recovering and sealing away artifacts.
engSearchText:
As our master has no doubt informed you, the
primary task of the Gralsritter is recovering and
sealing away artifacts.
jpnChrName: 先生から聞いたと思いますが、 星杯騎士の仕事は主に古代遺物（アーティファクト）の回収と封印です。
jpnSearchText:
先生から聞いたと思いますが、
星杯騎士の仕事は主に古代遺物（アーティファクト）の回収と封印です。

engChrName: We assign top priority for cases like this—where they are being egregiously abused.
engSearchText:
We assign top priority for cases like this—where they
are being egregiously abused.
jpnChrName: 今回のような悪用されているケースは特にね。
jpnSearchText: 今回のような悪用されているケースは特にね。

engChrName: It'd be awesome if we could bring down Almata at the same time, but that's not our main goal here.
engSearchText:
It'd be awesome if we could bring down Almata at
the same time, but that's not our main goal here.
jpnChrName: アルマータの連中も一緒に片付けられたら 万々歳なんだが、ついでのようなもんだ。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータの連中も一緒に片付けられたら
万々歳なんだが、ついでのようなもんだ。

engChrName: That doesn't hold true for Iscariot, however. Their directive is the defeat—or rather, slaying— of heretics.
engSearchText:
That doesn't hold true for Iscariot, however.
Their directive is the defeat—or rather, slaying—
of heretics.
jpnChrName: 隠密僧兵の方はむしろ“外法”の討伐、 いいえ……殲滅こそが主な目的なんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
隠密僧兵の方はむしろ“外法”の討伐、
いいえ……殲滅こそが主な目的なんでしょう。

engChrName: The sword that mafia boss had in the video is an artifact, correct?
engSearchText:
The sword that mafia boss had in the video is an
artifact, correct?
jpnChrName: 古代遺物……マフィアのボスが持っていた あの禍々しい剣もそうなんだね？
jpnSearchText:
古代遺物……マフィアのボスが持っていた
あの禍々しい剣もそうなんだね？

engChrName: ...I certainly believe so. All evidence available to us points to that fact.
engSearchText:
...I certainly believe so. All evidence available to us
points to that fact.
jpnChrName: ………うむ、おそらくは。
jpnSearchText: ………うむ、おそらくは。

engChrName: If I'm not mistaken, Melchior's dagger and bombs, Olympia's angel, and Arioch's armor and halberd are artifacts as well, yes?
engSearchText:
If I'm not mistaken, Melchior's dagger and bombs,
Olympia's angel, and Arioch's armor and halberd are
artifacts as well, yes?
jpnChrName: それと、メルキオル、人形使いのオランピアに あの鏖殺のアリオッチの得物ですね。
jpnSearchText:
それと、メルキオル、人形使いのオランピアに
あの鏖殺のアリオッチの得物ですね。

engChrName: Think so, yeah.
engSearchText: Think so, yeah.
jpnChrName: ダガーとボム、天使人形、 斧槍と甲冑の古代遺物……
jpnSearchText:
ダガーとボム、天使人形、
斧槍と甲冑の古代遺物……

engChrName: Won't be easy to beat 'em with those things at their disposal.
engSearchText:
Won't be easy to beat 'em with those things at
their disposal.
jpnChrName: どれも一筋縄じゃいかねえだろうな。
jpnSearchText: どれも一筋縄じゃいかねえだろうな。

engChrName: Ugh. I thought artifacts were supposed to be rare. Feels like everyone and their mother's got one now.
engSearchText:
Ugh. I thought artifacts were supposed to be rare.
Feels like everyone and their mother's got one now.
jpnChrName: ったく、古代遺物のバーゲンセールかっての。
jpnSearchText: ったく、古代遺物のバーゲンセールかっての。

engChrName: Not wrong there.
engSearchText: Not wrong there.
jpnChrName: 言っとくが本来ならそんな ポンポン出るようなもんじゃねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
言っとくが本来ならそんな
ポンポン出るようなもんじゃねえからな？

engChrName: One artifact's usually bad enough, so the thought of dealin' with upwards of four is giving me a splitting headache.
engSearchText:
One artifact's usually bad enough, so the thought of
dealin' with upwards of four is giving me a
splitting headache.
jpnChrName: 組織単位でも一つ持ってりゃ十分な脅威だ。 舐めてかかると痛い目では済まねえぞ。
jpnSearchText:
組織単位でも一つ持ってりゃ十分な脅威だ。
舐めてかかると痛い目では済まねえぞ。

engChrName: Ordinarily, I would urge you to stay away from those miscreants, even if you emerge the victor...
engSearchText:
Ordinarily, I would urge you to stay away from those
miscreants, even if you emerge the victor...
jpnChrName: 僕たちのような対抗する“力”を持っていない 限りは相手をするのはおススメしませんが……
jpnSearchText:
僕たちのような対抗する“力”を持っていない
限りは相手をするのはおススメしませんが……

engChrName: However, we do not have the luxury of choice right now.
engSearchText:
However, we do not have the luxury of choice
right now.
jpnChrName: もはやそんなことを言っている 状況でもないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もはやそんなことを言っている
状況でもないでしょう。

engChrName: I don't think we gotta worry. Our master's with 'em, so they're in good hands.
engSearchText:
I don't think we gotta worry. Our master's with 'em,
so they're in good hands.
jpnChrName: それに先生もついてるしな。
jpnSearchText: それに先生もついてるしな。

engChrName: I'm not sure if I can compete against them without my Stigma, but I will do all that I can.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure if I can compete against them without
my Stigma, but I will do all that I can.
jpnChrName: 聖痕がない身でどこまで抑えられるかは 分からぬが、力を尽くすつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
聖痕がない身でどこまで抑えられるかは
分からぬが、力を尽くすつもりだ。

engChrName: However, regardless of how this game pans out...
engSearchText: However, regardless of how this game pans out...
jpnChrName: しかし、この先で“ゲーム”が どう転ぼうと──
jpnSearchText:
しかし、この先で“ゲーム”が
どう転ぼうと──

engChrName: ...we will need your help in recovering and sealing away the artifacts at the end.
engSearchText:
...we will need your help in recovering and sealing
away the artifacts at the end.
jpnChrName: 最終的に古代遺物の回収と封印には お主らの力が必要になるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
最終的に古代遺物の回収と封印には
お主らの力が必要になるだろう。

engChrName: I will be depending on you when that time comes.
engSearchText: I will be depending on you when that time comes.
jpnChrName: 頼りにしているぞ。
jpnSearchText: 頼りにしているぞ。

engChrName: Of course, Master.
engSearchText: Of course, Master.
jpnChrName: ええ、お任せください。
jpnSearchText: ええ、お任せください。

engChrName: We won't let you down!
engSearchText: We won't let you down!
jpnChrName: ハッ、先生に失望はさせねぇぜ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、先生に失望はさせねぇぜ！

engChrName: (He really is loved, ain't he?)
engSearchText: (He really is loved, ain't he?)
jpnChrName: （やっぱ慕われてるな、師父は。）
jpnSearchText: （やっぱ慕われてるな、師父は。）

engChrName: Huh? Isn't that Agnès over there?
engSearchText: Huh? Isn't that Agnès over there?
jpnChrName: あっ、あっちにアニエスさんが……
jpnSearchText: あっ、あっちにアニエスさんが……

engChrName: Huh? Isn't that Agnès?
engSearchText: Huh? Isn't that Agnès?
jpnChrName: あっ、あれはアニエスさん……？
jpnSearchText: あっ、あれはアニエスさん……？

engChrName: All right. I'll help explain everything to the children.
engSearchText: All right. I'll help explain everything to the children.
jpnChrName: それでは、子供たちには 私も一緒に説明しますね。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、子供たちには
私も一緒に説明しますね。

engChrName: That would be best. As for the other sisters...
engSearchText: That would be best. As for the other sisters...
engHtmlText: シスター・ベアトリス
jpnChrName: はい、その方がいいでしょう。 他のシスターには………
jpnSearchText:
はい、その方がいいでしょう。
他のシスターには………

engChrName: I wonder what she's doing with one of the sisters of the church.
engSearchText:
I wonder what she's doing with one of the sisters of
the church.
jpnChrName: 隣にいらっしゃるのは 教会のシスターでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
隣にいらっしゃるのは
教会のシスターでしょうか。

engChrName: I'm more curious about what they're talking about.
engSearchText: I'm more curious about what they're talking about.
jpnChrName: 何を話しているのかしら？
jpnSearchText: 何を話しているのかしら？

engChrName: Probably about whatever plan she's brewing.
engSearchText: Probably about whatever plan she's brewing.
jpnChrName: 例の試したいことってヤツか？
jpnSearchText: 例の試したいことってヤツか？

engChrName: It's probably about whatever plan she's come up with.
engSearchText: It's probably about whatever plan she's come up with.
jpnChrName: 例の試したいこと、かな？
jpnSearchText: 例の試したいこと、かな？

engChrName: Well, let's leave 'em to it. We don't need to get in her way.
engSearchText:
Well, let's leave 'em to it. We don't need to get in
her way.
jpnChrName: ま、あいつなりの考えがあっての行動だ。 邪魔しない方がいいだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、あいつなりの考えがあっての行動だ。
邪魔しない方がいいだろ。

engChrName: Yes. That would be best.
engSearchText: Yes. That would be best.
jpnChrName: うむ、それも送り出した者の責務であろう。
jpnSearchText: うむ、それも送り出した者の責務であろう。

engChrName: A monster extermination request?
engSearchText: A monster extermination request?
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣か。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣か。

engChrName: And in the underground labyrinth...
engSearchText: And in the underground labyrinth...
jpnChrName: 場所は、地下遺構……
jpnSearchText: 場所は、地下遺構……

engChrName: A monster extermination request?
engSearchText: A monster extermination request?
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣か。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣か。

engChrName: And in the underground labyrinth...
engSearchText: And in the underground labyrinth...
jpnChrName: 場所は、地下遺構……
jpnSearchText: 場所は、地下遺構……

engChrName: A monster extermination request?
engSearchText: A monster extermination request?
jpnChrName: 手配魔獣ですか。
jpnSearchText: 手配魔獣ですか。

engChrName: And in the underground labyrinth...
engSearchText: And in the underground labyrinth...
jpnChrName: 場所は、地下遺構……
jpnSearchText: 場所は、地下遺構……

engChrName: We can go there whenever we want now that round three's over and done with.
engSearchText:
We can go there whenever we want now that round
three's over and done with.
jpnChrName: 第三フェーズが終わったと共に アルマータが封鎖を解いたようだ。
jpnSearchText:
第三フェーズが終わったと共に
アルマータが封鎖を解いたようだ。

engChrName: And since the game is no longer taking place there, it has likely been released from the Genesis' control.
engSearchText:
And since the game is no longer taking place there, it
has likely been released from the Genesis' control.
jpnChrName: 既に“ゲーム”の舞台ではありませんから、 ゲネシスの管理下からも外れたのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
既に“ゲーム”の舞台ではありませんから、
ゲネシスの管理下からも外れたのでしょう。

engChrName: I'm pretty sure we're the only ones who can enter the palace, but the rest of the groups are probably free to go down there now.
engSearchText:
I'm pretty sure we're the only ones who can enter the
palace, but the rest of the groups are probably free to
go down there now.
jpnChrName: さすがに王宮に入れるのは俺らだけだが、 地下遺構の方は既に各勢力の捜索が入ってんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
さすがに王宮に入れるのは俺らだけだが、
地下遺構の方は既に各勢力の捜索が入ってんだろ。

engChrName: Doesn't that mean civilians could get in there, too?
engSearchText: Doesn't that mean civilians could get in there, too?
jpnChrName: そこで“強力な魔獣”が現れたってわけね。
jpnSearchText: そこで“強力な魔獣”が現れたってわけね。

engChrName: It's possible, which makes it all the more dangerous to let those monsters roam free.
engSearchText:
It's possible, which makes it all the more dangerous to
let those monsters roam free.
jpnChrName: ふむ、放置しても他の勢力が “掃除”するかもしれぬが……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、放置しても他の勢力が
“掃除”するかもしれぬが……

engChrName: Though I'm certain other groups will deal with them should we decide to pass on these requests.
engSearchText:
Though I'm certain other groups will deal with them
should we decide to pass on these requests.
jpnChrName: 封鎖を解いた今、 万一観光客が迷い込んでも厄介だ。
jpnSearchText:
封鎖を解いた今、
万一観光客が迷い込んでも厄介だ。

engChrName: Yeah, but we probably have the best lay of the land out of everyone here.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but we probably have the best lay of the land
out of everyone here.
jpnChrName: 念のため退治した方が良さそうね。 地下の地形とかはある程度把握しているし。
jpnSearchText:
念のため退治した方が良さそうね。
地下の地形とかはある程度把握しているし。

engChrName: Fair point. We don't have much time, but if you guys want to take these on, I'm game.
engSearchText:
Fair point. We don't have much time, but if you guys
want to take these on, I'm game.
jpnChrName: そうだな、時間が限られてるから 全部とはいかないかもしれねえが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、時間が限られてるから
全部とはいかないかもしれねえが。

engChrName: I'm sure our other allies would like to join in on the fun, too.
engSearchText:
I'm sure our other allies would like to join in on the
fun, too.
jpnChrName: 協力してるあいつらにも声を掛けて 軽く魔獣退治といくか。
jpnSearchText:
協力してるあいつらにも声を掛けて
軽く魔獣退治といくか。

engChrName: Hey, you're Amalie, right?
engSearchText: Hey, you're Amalie, right?
jpnChrName: アマーリエさん、だな。 少し話を聞かせて貰えるか？
jpnSearchText:
アマーリエさん、だな。
少し話を聞かせて貰えるか？

engChrName: Umm... Yes? And who are you, exactly?
engSearchText: Umm... Yes? And who are you, exactly?
jpnChrName: 貴方たちは……？
jpnSearchText: 貴方たちは……？

engChrName: We're reporters. Local paper wants to do a piece on the upcoming recital at the opera house.
engSearchText:
We're reporters. Local paper wants to do a piece on
the upcoming recital at the opera house.
jpnChrName: 俺たちは今度オペラハウスで行われる 声楽会について取材をしているモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは今度オペラハウスで行われる
声楽会について取材をしているモンだ。

engChrName: We'd like to ask you a couple of questions, if you don't mind.
engSearchText:
We'd like to ask you a couple of questions, if you
don't mind.
jpnChrName: 出演者からも、ぜひ話を聞きたくてね。
jpnSearchText: 出演者からも、ぜひ話を聞きたくてね。

engChrName: Oh, all right. I suppose that makes sense. Our school's annual recitals always attract a lot of attention.
engSearchText:
Oh, all right. I suppose that makes sense.
Our school's annual recitals always attract a lot
of attention.
jpnChrName: なるほど、記者の方たちですか。 我が校の発表会は例年注目されていますからね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、記者の方たちですか。
我が校の発表会は例年注目されていますからね。

engChrName: (So that's the story he's going with this time.)
engSearchText: (So that's the story he's going with this time.)
jpnChrName: （……今度はそういう設定か。）
jpnSearchText: （……今度はそういう設定か。）

engChrName: (The fact that I'm getting used to this is a little frightening.)
engSearchText:
(The fact that I'm getting used to this is a
little frightening.)
jpnChrName: （段々慣れてきた自分が怖いです……）
jpnSearchText: （段々慣れてきた自分が怖いです……）

engChrName: I'd be happy to oblige. Ask me whatever you'd like.
engSearchText: I'd be happy to oblige. Ask me whatever you'd like.
jpnChrName: いいですわよ、なんでも聞いてちょうだい。
jpnSearchText: いいですわよ、なんでも聞いてちょうだい。

engChrName: Well, let's get right into it, then. Could you tell us how the preparations for the recital have been going?
engSearchText:
Well, let's get right into it, then. Could you tell us
how the preparations for the recital have been going?
jpnChrName: ありがとう、じゃあまずは発表会の 準備の進捗を教えてもらっていいかしら？
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう、じゃあまずは発表会の
準備の進捗を教えてもらっていいかしら？

engChrName: Quite well, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText: Quite well, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: ええ、準備なら順調ですわよ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、準備なら順調ですわよ。

engChrName: This year's performance is shaping up to be even better than the last.
engSearchText:
This year's performance is shaping up to be even
better than the last.
jpnChrName: 今年もよい舞台に仕上がることは間違いないかと。 ぜひ楽しみにしていて下さいませ。
jpnSearchText:
今年もよい舞台に仕上がることは間違いないかと。
ぜひ楽しみにしていて下さいませ。

engChrName: Nice to hear.
engSearchText: Nice to hear.
jpnChrName: そりゃ良かったな。
jpnSearchText: そりゃ良かったな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Someone told me this year's leading lady is a Central Eastern gal. That true?
engSearchText:
